content: I anxiously awaited the release of the Echo Spot, and I wasn’t disappointed at all. I already had  the Alexa dot and was a big fan of it. The Echo Spot expands the Alexa so much further . It is a amazing device it visually displays the weather gives you news trends throughout the day. I like the fact you can customize it by uploading pictures on it. I purchased the stand for it and recommend highly in purchasing one for it gives an outstanding look.

author: erobertson
title: Love, love, love this little Echo Spot.
content: Use this as an alarm clock, a timer, weather reports, listen to music and audible books as well as asking Alexa questions.  It is one handy little gem.  Really enjoying it and have already recommended it to others.

author: MH
title: Perfect in the bedroom
content:
I was worried that the screen would be too bright for the bedroom at night.
Fear not! The screen gets really dark and is not at all intrusive at night.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Compact design
content: It was a Christmas present. I use it with my mega blast speaker.

author: Joe
title: Five Stars
content: Great new alarm clock.....love the way it adjusts to the light in the room.

author: Bowen390
title: Nice product, great replacement for alarm clock!
content: Typical Alexa device, connects and works great. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the drop in camera does not work reliably, no picture frequently when trying to use it...

author: Hal
title: It’s really nice but sometimes turns on without the wake word
content: I really love this. Does all sorts of functions, alarm, music weather, some really corny jokes and even telling you goodnight. It’s pretty and had some weight to it so I don’t worry about it getting knocked over. The only issue I have with it, is that sometimes it turns on even without the wake word, sometimes when the room is silent. I start wondering “maybe it’s bored or something?” Lol. But otherwise it’s great. You have to download the Amazon Alexa app on your phone to customize it and set it up by it’s not hard. I ended up getting this for my self after getting the Echo Shows for family members. I’m not a fan of the huge square one so this small round version is great. When I’m not using the camera I put a little sticky note or something over the camera; which is a cheap alternative to the screen protector with a cover for those that are worried about accidentally video calling a friend when you’re changing or something.

author: Goldenhair
title: You need this device
content: Absolutely love this echo device.  Bought this to replace a large bulky alarm clock but it is so much more.  I can drop in on other devices I own and can get anything I can with my Alexa device . The video is so clear and bought 2 more for my other bedrooms.

author: A. Chapman
title: Five Stars
content: Love this prodouct.  I listen to Audible, use it for an alarm clock, play music; fabulous!!!!

author: Natalie Mason
title: I love my Echo Spot!
content: I absolutely love this! Very user friendly and I got the Kasa Cam to go with it to monitor my living room. Super easy to set up and operate. I only wish it actually came with the camera privacy cover and pivoting stand which you can buy separately. I’m looking forward to future software updates for different clock faces. I like digital but I miss the colon in between the hours and minutes on most of them. I’d also like to see more celebs jump on board for the alarm voices. I really have no complaints, I’m being nit picky at this point. Worth every penny!

author: KatherineH
title: Five Stars
content: Bought it for hubby office, and he Looove it, play music,  news, weather... everything!

author: R. SMART
title: price
content: i like the features, all is well for now. what i dont like is the smallness. Could be bigger.

author: Bonnie J
title: Makes my life easier 😜
content: Love this item. No longer have to stretch to read my clock in the morning. I just ask Alexa. Perfect for my purpose.

author: Marykp
title: Five Stars
content: Gave this to my daughter for graduation. She loves it!

author: Karo
title: Love this!
content: The Echo Spot is amazing! Best technology present I've ever had. I received this product quickly, and it was in perfect condition. No issues with this product or vendor.

author: Steve Naz
title: It can't do the one thing I wanted
content: The only reason I bought this was to enhance my SiriusXM radio experience by displaying album art, song titles and artist information. It can't do that. Instead, it shows the channel logo all day long while the music plays. Good-bye Spot, you are going home to Amazon.

author: JimmyM
title: Flawless
content: Replaced an old alarm clock in the bedroom.  Don't know why I didn't buy it sooner

author: J.R.H.
title: Needs improvements
content: Could be great but like others have said things to try is annoying.

author: jessica e lager
title: Echo spot is great if you can’t be together everyday!
content: My mom,son, and I love our echos!  It’s a great way to keep in touch

author: D Salcido
title: Awesome
content: Love the flexibility to listen to music 🎶 and be hands free. So much fun!!

author: Barbara Slater
title: It is great at recognizing my voice.
content: I love the Alexa products right now I don't mind the small screen but it would be better if I could ask the Spot to brighten the screen certain times of day.

author: Buck
title: I bought this in a whim during the super bowl. Delivered the next day
content:
I bought this in a whim during the super bowl. Delivered the next day......I love it. Make calls, video calls, and it prompts you with stuff to ask. Easy set up.
Why do I like it so much? idk. But I do.

author: Joe-annis Iodice
title: Alex said to the rescue
content: Absolutely love this gadget I am so totally dependent on it now and addicted are you happy?? I know you’re listening to every word I say I keep thinking to myself it doesn’t matter if the killer ever comes Alexa will save you right?

author: GWS III
title: Great addition to our Echo home
content: Great addition to our Echo home.  The screen is a nice bonus and it gives you display options for what you see when the Spot is just sitting.there.

author: ROBERT T.
title: The size is great to have a camera and screen
content: The size is great to have a camera and screen. I prefer the white one but disordered the black.

author: M. J. O'Neill
title: It has ONE Job and Fails
content: I set up a Routine to wake me up each day and without fail, it wakes me 1-3 minutes late every single day.

author: CHRA
title: I let it collect collect dust
content: I originally bought this for my nightstand as an alarm clock and ended up not using it very much all. I let it collect collect dust for a few months before I moved it on to my desk downstairs and now it's become invaluable once linked to my calendars and reminders, etc.

author: Barry P. Sullivan
title: A.I.  Alarm Clock
content:
Love this Alexa product !!
We already have 2 Dots and 1 2nd Gen Echo.

I just don't care to use my cell phone for an alarm. It interrupts my sleep.
The Spot is the first truly revolutionary hi tech alarm clock.
Great design. Good sound. Nice screen. Even sleep sounds !
Alexa smarts !
I disabled the camera... don't care for that option !
But it fits on the bedside table with style, and allows for a nights sleep with it's night time dim screen.
Suggestions for Gen2: battery backup, and usb charge port.

Love it !

author: Daniel S.
title: Great bedside clock
content: This makes for a great beside alarm clock. Can set alarms as needed from anywhere as my plans change from day to day. I don't have to wait to get home when I might have forgotten. It's also good to have Alexa right next to you as needed and be able to play some my l nice relaxing music (or whatever you want) by just asking.

author: Carrie Bryant
title: Great addition for Echo home
content: I am loving the spot! I have it positioned to point towards my dogs crate as I can drop in and see him during the day. I also used it for a video chat with my boyfriend while I was out of town. So happy, will add another to the house!

author: Roy
title: Very sweet video version of echo dot
content:
i had a couple of echo dots previously - bought these _SPECIFICALLY_ for the Ring doorbell video / cloud cam display / interface capabilities. WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED. Love the fact that I can ask to see front yard / back yard / front door, etc.

the video chat with the other rooms is also quite cool.

BONUS: “Alexa show me Ant Man trailer, etc”

i know this can all be done on laptop/desktop, but it’s cool now having an ‘appliance’ that’s always just there, and it doesn’t interrupt what i’m doing.

author: kia carpenter
title: I love this!
content: I am so happy with this purchase!!  I have a few clients that have these in their homes.. they allow us to play music on while we work. I ended up getting one for myself. Aside from music and the weather my favorite thing about this is telling Alexa to set my alarm when I forget and I'm already in bed. This thing is great 😂

author: Dan
title: Excellent... once you turn off the annoying ‘Things to try’ notifications.
content:
Works great, overall setup wasn’t bad. I’d prefer o set it up on the app like the Dot because I kept hitting the OK button while trying to shift between letters/caps/symbols while entering password.
As has been undoubtedly been seen elswhere here, the constantly rotating ‘Things to try’ feature is easily the most hated thing. I found how to turn it off and really like using the Spot since.  Really now, when I look to find the time or temp, I really don’t expect to see “Alexa, tell me a banana joke”.  OK for the kids’ rooms, but I get this same information in FAR too many emails. I’ll probably buy a Show if I get a similar deal.

author: Elise
title: Great and convenient unit for my mother
content: Great and convenient unit for my mother. We can drop in from anywhere around the world and see her as well as set up reminders for her remotely.

author: Saul Rodriguez
title: The Echo Spot has been wonderful so far
content:
The Echo Spot has been wonderful so far.
Pros
1. Speaker is loud but quiet enough not to disturb others.
2. Fits just about anywhere and is very sleek.
3. The mic has a good range, of course don't expect it to hear you from another room.
4. Alarms and remainders are perfect for those who only need them at home and not on the go.
5. Routines is one of my favorite features, still very limited but I am sure with updates more customization will be allowed.
6. Amazon orders are tracked and you get notified when they ship and delivered.
7. Major music services are supported.

Cons
1. No Youtube support but you have Google to blame so you can't blame the Spot.
2. Mic is a little sensitive, my tv has activated Alexa without anyone saying "Alexa".
3. Very limited choice in themes for the clock.
4. Limited choice in "wake" words.
4.
2.

author: linja
title: Can hear and see items
content: I am only using it at one location for now and like it. I already had the other echo dot and large echo but I like that this one shows time , weather and your schedule, I also use it as an alarm clock, I plan on getting a second one for my long distance friend so we can talk.

author: TR Dunne
title: Would Buy Again
content: More expensive than it should be, but it works great! You can play music on it and setting the alarm is silly easy, just tell Alexa what time! Small footprint and looks great too.

author: D. Duguid
title: Loving it
content: I love this! It’s my bedside wake up. It controls my lights. Reads me the news. Etc. great addition to my automated home.

author: RRSinger
title: Blends With Every Decor!
content: I wasn’t sure about wanting or needing a screen, but it took no time to appreciate it. Weather reports, lyrics to songs, photos of products all right there for you!

author: toshidon
title: Can’t turn off “Things to Try”
content: The product is attractive and somewhat useful, BUT, Amazon chose to force users to view their “things to try” and Trending”.  This greatly depreciates the value of the product.  Do not buy unless you are willing to view a billboard from Amazon.

author: Diane DeHart
title: Cute little genius
content: Love this little "clock radio/player/Alexa friend"! I was going to buy a 2nd Dot to replace my clock radio, when I saw this and realized it would work great for what I needed. The clock face can be customized and I have an alarm set for every weekday, so I never have to change it for weekends. I can also play music or "sleep sounds" to go to sleep by and set a sleep timer for how long to play. It wakes me to an alarm or a local radio station on Tune-in. The time display can also be customized and is easy to read in the middle of the night. This little guy does everything the big ECHO and little DOT do and it's even cute. Alexa has only played one trick on me, when she told me the definition of the word "dog" (verb and noun) at 6:10 a.m. None of my 3 dogs sleeping with me would confess it was their doing!

author: Sunshine
title: Super helpful and I love the customizability - I get ...
content: I have this placed in my living room and ask Alexa to give me the weather/news update while I clean/cook/idle/etc. Super helpful and I love the customizability - I get to look over and see myself and my significant other. No complaints overall.

author: Professional Shopper
title: Music To MY Ears
content: I LOVE it!!! I've been looking for a radio alarm clock for several years.  The Echo Spot far exceeds my expectations and is leaps and bounds  ahead of the standard traditional alarm clock, that I thought I was looking for.  Now I can set an alarm to wake me to Watercolors on SiriusXM.  In addition to the alarm clock, there are tons of other AMAZING skills!

author: Robert L. Elliott
title: Five Stars
content: For the price this is a great piece of Hardware / Software. I wholeheartedly recommend.

author: Matthew Dadey
title: Works Great as an alarm clock
content: Works Great as an alarm clock.  Speaker isn't as good as the Echo, but it's just in our room so it's just for playing music while we are getting ready.  I like that you can view ring and cloud cams on it.  Would be nice to have the interaction feature added to both of those products in the future.

author: Bryar B.
title: The only Alexa device I'll allow in my Google household
content:
This is sort of a back handed review, but I want to be honest. I really have never been a fan of the Echo line of products...they're beautifully made and functional from what I hear, but they've just never been all that helpful to me seeing as my main use for smart stuff is asking questions and scheduling. Google always just seemed better at day to day, non house related things. Still is. I had a Dot a few months back and literally just gave it away because it was useless and all the skills were too much work. I'm lazy. Which is why I need an alarm clock.

SO, when I saw the Spot I was like "oh I need that, that's going to look so good on my nightstand."

My old costco alarm clock was falling apart so I decided to invest the money. I figured I'd get a reasonable speaker and a cute custom clock and it was on sale so whatever I picked it up.

As an ALARM CLOCK its great.
-looks great
-great for playing music to wake you up or help you sleep
-tells me the weather so I can dress accordingly
-great for timers when I'm doing face masks, treatments and things
-great for shopping lists and reminders when I think of them while wandering around the house
-added perk of being able to track my amazon shipments

It can't answer any hard questions and it will never be all that helpful outside of the bedroom for ME PERSONALLY. I can't speak on integration with other products and I covered the camera because I have nobody to video chat with. But its a great little clock and I'll probably end up giving one as a gift to my parents in the future.  I'd also argue its the nicest looking Echo device. My only complaint is that it can't play Youtube videos independently anymore so I have to use bluetooth, but that's nobody's fault. Hopefully it can in the future.

author: Ariosvandre T.
title: The better stuff to help you to turn on light, know about whether, about news
content: The better stuff to help you to turn on light, know about whether, about news, and receive calls. I used to see my children's, to play musics and videos, and to play white noise, sounds of rain and ocean sound.

author: ShibKaixer
title: I love my echo spot
content:
I have it on my bedside table and waking up
In the morning and and ask Alexa about the weather before I’m fully awake is perfect. Getting current events in a flash briefing is a small perk as well that I have become accustomed too. Great for music and sleep sound machine! I almost forgot or a second how addicted I am to the sleep sounds available!!!

author: MH
title: Love it
content: I’m so glad I finally got this! I love it!

author: Captain Paul
title: Nice little screen!
content: I have three Dots and a Fire HD with show.  The Spot is my favorite.  This one is setup in the bedroom and it allows me to view my front door using the Netvue doorbell and it has replaced my alarm clock.  My next purchase will be the Alexa Show.

author: Mike60076
title: works great
content: What I expected from Amazon Spot. Still trying to get the bulb to pair with my phone so I can control lights with it. That is pretty challenging. Go to Youtube to get help setting up the bulb, super helpful.

author: Lacey
title: Just ok
content: If your going to spend the money go with the show. The spot is just a glorified clock.

author: defrue
title: Works Great
content: Works great, love that you can actually turn the the screen off. Still learning everything I can do with Alexa, but expect to really enjoy having the Spot around.

author: ~TomC.
title: Still doesn't allow disabling of "Things to Try"
content:
Hard to believe you still can't turn this off... with all the users/owners complaining about this you would think the sales department might thing it's depressing sales?

So far so good, with the exception of above...

author: Sam D.
title: I give up. Amazon has ruined a decent device.
content: Amazon has officially ruined this device. I have recommended this device, in conjunction with the Amazon Cloud Cam for months. The best reason to own this device is to use it as a baby monitor. With recent changes to the display, it is useless. It now has an on-screen display 100% of the time, without the ability to remove it. You used to have to tap to bring up these buttons so you could use 100% of the display, now you can't hide them. Amazon: take a note;. When you have 3 inches of screen real estate. It's all precious. Don't put up onscreen display that you can't hide. Stay away from this device until they fix this problem.

author: Lacbrit
title: Love it. Great for bedside with changeable face
content: Love it.  Great for bedside with changeable face.  Alarm. Ambient sounds to sleep. Plus access to the other alexa devices and smart home for security

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love! Great addition to our other Echo devices.
content: Decent quality sound/picture. I love having this as an alarm clock/sound machine while I sleep. We have the Echo Show, Echo Plus with built-in Hub in addition to this and I love this one for the price. I would like another to put in our basement play space. Nice to have the picture if i want to quickly check the cameras we have set up (who's at the front door, etc).

author: Charles J. Nixon
title: Sound quality disappointing
content: Disappointed in the quality of the sound.  Need to find out how to fix the screen display so it just displays the time.  Shouldn't have to spend time to figure out.

author: Lewpro
title: I LOVE the Echo Spot
content: I LOVE the Echo Spot.  Keep it on my bedside table - news, music, talking with family and friends, controlling all my gadgets - it's the BEST!

author: Jlb
title: IT JUST WORKS
content: This is really great I can just Alexa what is the weather or dim the living room lights it just works I can drop in on it from my iPhone n see what’s goin on at home

author: Catherine Williams
title: Easy to use
content: I love it! I have the show as well and both products work perfectly for video calls. This one is nice and compact and is a great alarm clock.

author: Jason F.
title: Super upgrade to the Echo line.
content: Love it, love it, love it. Bought for bed side. Time, alarms, music, scheduling, etc. Have the original Echo, 2 dots, and now the Spot. Love these things.

author: Betsy A Primrose
title: got this because I like the smaller screen and the clock face
content: Had an Echo Show, got this because I like the smaller screen and the clock face. Very happy

author: Sergio Naranjo
title: This is the best Alexa enabled device you can get
content: This is the best Alexa enabled device you can get, it is so versatile and useful. It sound way better than the dot but not as good as the regular echo. The screen makes all the difference in the world.

author: nm
title: I love the echo spot
content: I love the echo spot!  I like how it shows pictures of the things you ask alexa about, and how it shows lyrics to music, among many other things it can do!  I may upgrade to the echo show later.  For now for the price this is an amazing device and what it's capable of !  Would highly recommend!  Great to be used as an alarm clock as well!

author: Drea from So Cal
title: It’s reliable and I love it!
content: I love it!  I have no complaints. I tell it what time to wake me up and it does!  I ask it to play different types of music and it does....and it picks really great songs too!  I love how it dims when I turn my lights off, so I fall asleep without having to turn it around. It has a good handful of faces to pick from. And I really appreciate the weather that’s always displayed. As far as the “suggestions” or “banners” that most have complained about, well I don’t sit and stare at it so honestly, it does not bother me one bit!  In fact, sometimes I do see some great suggestions or interesting things to look up. I would most definitely recommend this to anyone that asked me. I haven’t tried the phone calling yet, so unfortunately I don’t have a review for that.

author: Kindle Customer
title: The visual interface is a useful feature
content: I'd like to replace all my DOTs with the Spot - but will one at a time. These have all the features of a Dot, with a visual face which, among other things, replaces the need to have a clock on my desk. I have not used the device for visual communication, as I have only one at present.

author: Liz Bojtos
title: Excellent gift
content: Fits anywhere ....

author: PeterRRRRR
title: Very good, could be better if ...
content:
Agree with most reviews, a really great addition to our Echo family. Would be Five Stars if:
• The Night Mode -> Schedule should have Starts at Sunset, Ends at Sunrise feature, maybe with an offset.
• Add a Clock Face that shows seconds in digital display. Would be great for setting other clocks, watches, etc.
• For the next hardware version, adding a USB charging-only port would make this a perfect bedside device. Plug in your phone and be fully charged the next day!

author: Steve Holland
title: Another excellent Amazon Alexa product
content: Super cool. Clock face is beautiful. The video feature is the best. Although the sound is good as well. Looking forward to hooking it up to a video camera system.

author: primo
title: This was a gift
content: This was a gift & I haven't heard of a complaint? No news is good news?

author: Patricia Perry
title: Love my Spot!!
content: Our Spot sits on our kitchen table and we listen to our News Flash Briefing every day.  It's also part of our home group, so I can hear music both in the kitchen and Living Room (Echo).  Also, helps me with recipes.

author: D. Zellous
title: Fantastic gadget for the money.
content: I love this Echo Spot.  I use it to keep track of my calendar appointments, grocery lists, etc.  I no longer have to keep paper lists and appointments on the fridge. I can get answers to basic questions, play music, etc.  Great gadget!

author: Liberty
title: Future
content: Convience and ease of use. I see value in this product for those who may have loved ones who live alone.

author: bobbiemagee
title: Love the display.
content: Love the display game scores  weather time date what ever you want to see. Sounds not as good as Echo.Stil great for all your apps.

author: Benedict Lee
title: you need to be in US before you could enjoy more music.
content: wonderful! love it...

author: J4
title: Most complete lower priced echo device
content: Extremely happy with this purchase, I wish this came out when the new Echo’s were available.  I would have returned the Echo’s I bought and got a few of these instead.  The camera isn’t great but definitely works well, there’s just other camera options out there at the same price point with clearer images, however I’m sure most people aren’t buying this for the camera option, that’s just a bonus.  You still get all the previous amazon echo features, and the other added bonus of a small screen now.  Display weather time appointments etc... and I haven’t even fully gotten into other options for this yet.  My first take is extremely impressed and wish I had gotten a few of these instead of the other echo devices.

author: babydoc
title: It's an ECHO with a screen and a camera! Small and handy.
content: Like all Echoes, it's great. The screen is very handy, as is the camera, and it takes up less room than my Echo SHOW (but the speaker is not as good. I can see my security cameras without getting up and answer the phone too.

author: R. Taylor
title: Echo Spot - White
content: Love it. It's the perfect size for a bedside clock with extras.

author: Kirk L. Olson
title: Echo Spot on
content: Liked everything about it.

author: Mr. Fingerz
title: A great Sleep-Aid companion.
content: I hate sleeping in total silence; I like background noise. Aside of having sound-effects, like Thunderstorm and Rain sounds, I love the fact that I can stream a whole season of the Twilight Zone, if I prefer to hear "Talking" in the background instead. With the Lit-Screen showing the Video, it also comes across as a Nite-Lite which illuminates my room quite nicely. I highly recommend this for your Night Stand if you don't have enough space for the Echo Show.

author: Keaton
title: Great sound from such a small device.
content:
I love the sound and being able to use Alexa.  The device, itself, is beautifully designed.  Looks like an
Apple product.  Only thing negative is that it needs a little stand (which I bought and which looks quite nice with it), but the stand is ridiculously expensive for a tiny peace of plastic.  I love my Echo Spot!

author: Daria
title: Retro looking amazing spot!
content: I am using the spot in my bedroom.  I love the size of it as it doesn't take up much space on my nightstand. It has all of the features of the Echo show, just condensed. The little stand you can put it on helps direct the angel of the camera when you use the video calling feature. Sound quality is very good also.

author: Yvette rodriguez
title: The best of the Alexa family!!
content: Honestly I own 2 echo dots, 2 big Alexas and 2 echo shows (1 & 2) so I ordered the echo spot just to add to the family, but wow I am loving the spot more than the others. So cute (I got the stand for it) it is on my bedside table and with the new routine feature I set my alarm for weekdays and it turns on my lights and tell me the weather all while showing me the time and fun fact of the day.  Now i ordered another spot for my office. I highly recommend the Spot to replace your alarm and for the beauty of it. I was afraid I could not see the time clearly but don't let the size fool you.  I love love love it!!

author: Jermaine Smith
title: Alexa is Great!
content: Alexa works great, but sometimes she doesn’t understand. I would recommend this product to everyone! I wish the stand or a stand would’ve came with it for the price you pay.

author: Milind
title: Requires charing cable, cannot use video cam
content:
The advertisement is misleading.
1. It does not run on a battery, it should always be plugged into the AC main.
2. The video call is only with other Echo spot users, you cannot use iphone facetime.
3. The voice commands do not maintain a context of speech.
4. The voice recognition software is flaky.
5. The music search is irritating and does not find the song even if it is on Amazon music.

author: FREDERICK W SMITH
title: I love Alexa, I wish she was a little smarter ...
content: I love Alexa, I wish she was a little smarter though.  The echo spot is like the echo dot of the Alexas with displays. Sound quality isn't great, but is far better than the echo dot. One downside to the rounded design is that when watching a video in full screen you loose a good portion of the video to the lack of corners. I think it's perfect for night stands , as long as you don't mind potential hackers acessing the camera 0.o . Overall I'm satisfied.

author: Luv my kindle
title: Another great Alexa product
content: I love the size of the echo spot. It fits on my nightstand but has all of the capabilities of my echo show. I like going to sleep with the lightening storm. The images along with the sounds are very relaxing. The calling and messaging feature is great. It’s small enough to take with when we travel. I love and own most of the Alexa products. Our whole family uses them.

author: bug
content: Arrived in perfect condition!  Can’t wait to open it!

author: G. Scott
title: Love this thing
content: Love this thing. Sitting on my desk and loving how it displays my calendar events. Very slick and much nicer display than I had imagined. Will probably end up getting a couple more when its all said and done.

author: Marware
title: My New Little Buddy
content: This replaced my clock radio next to my bed. It's a fun and very useful device, as well as very cute and non combersom on my bedside table. The white has created a nice bright look!

author: Salem Alkhaldi
content: Love it great quality easy to use I have also echo show 😍👍🏻

author: Michael G.
title: Gives You More
content: I purchased the Spot at the same time I purchased two Echo Shows, thinking this would be a good alternative where space is limited.  I have found it to be useful for some things such as setting reminders, kitchen timer, weather reports and more.  It is more than the Echo Dot because the screen gives you more information or makes working with it easier.  An example would be when you ask for weather the audio give you some information for the screen gives additional information like the weather for the next few days.  I haven't used it enough to compare to the echo show, so the jury is still out.  The price does make it attractive.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Works about 90% of the time
content: Doesn't work all the time

author: Norma L.
title: Video
content: Love my echo spot. Got a black one for my son who lives in Georgia so I can video call the grandkids.  They loved it too! Also,  it plays my amazon playlist with great clarity.

author: David Hagermann
title: Excellent
content: It’s fits excellent on my sons dresser

author: Jeff L. Fournier
title: Maybe, maybe not
content: Have resisted going down the smart speaker and app route for a while but bit on the Echo recently and am underwhelmed. It does recognize my voice and provides most of expected responses ok, however all of the apps that I want to work only do so about 20& of the time. Example is Nissan Connect Services. Worked once and cannot get it to work  again. Keeps losing the link to my Nissan Connect account and now just tells me that I have to go to the app even when asking to open the app. I know Nissan tech in car and out is not the best but why would the app and skill work once or twice but not more than that.  Just seems like a big so what but I am sure that there are some smart home controls that work fine. Time will tell if Alexa will do it for me.

author: Telmo Quiroz
title: Be Careful - Nursery
content: I bought this product to monitor my baby. However, when you connect to the Amazon Cloud Camera you have the video and two huge icons that never disappear!! (nor waiting, nor clicking on the screen) It has no sense!!!! You cannot see 50% of the image. I have already asked  Amazon and they have no idea... Consider this.

author: Peter M
title: Excellent, Versatile, Useful, Not Just A Gimmicky Gadget
content: This device is terrific!  I am able to do so much by voice command--add calendar items, make a shopping list, etc.  One of my favorite electronic devices I have ever bought.

author: taf
title: I like it, but have some issues.
content: This is my third echo device, I really like Alexa. But the Spot doesn't seem to hear me as well as the other devices. I got it to replace the Tap I had been using as an alarm clock. It makes a decent alarm clock. I do have a couple of issues with the spot. The first is and most annoying problem I have run into is waking Alexa up, I have the wake word set to Echo and it frequently fails to recognize the wake word, Once I find a spot for the displaced Tap, I will change the wake word back to Alexa and hope that fixes the first issue. The second most annoying issue I have run into is actually turning the alarm off. I frequently turn the snooze function on instead of the alarm off, then I end up yelling at 6am from the shower to turn the darn thing off. It's only funny the first time. My other issue is choice of clock faces, I have the largest digital clock face set but I can't read it without my glasses. So if you have perfect diction, hand eye coordination, and eyesight this might be the perfect alarm clock for you.

author: Betty Sweet
title: All the features you need in a great size!
content: Love the size! Fits the space better than the Show did. I have it in my living room but it would be great in a bedroom.

author: Lindsey deMont
title: really more hassle than its worth. I believe amazon ...
content: really more hassle than its worth. I believe amazon view would be the way to go if you are in need of any screen capabilities. it definitely hears you from two rooms away however

author: URICHJ
title: do not depend on this as a typical alarm clock ...
content: do not depend on this as a typical alarm clock as I have. If it loses internet connection so goes your alarm. I had a lot of trouble really getting it set up in the first place. I'll have to continue my look for an actual alarm clock. Also the fact that it has a camera on it is a negative because I don't want a camera in my bedroom.

author: Lance G.
title: Perfect for intended use
content: Perfect for intended use. If you are going to use the "drop-in" feature, it is very faint if you aren't within 5 feet of it, have the volume way up, or yelling to it. I love the drop in feature tho and don't mind that it is faint sounding

author: PBcup
title: Perhaps the best Echo device yet. But an unreliable alarm clock.
content:
This is a pretty cool device. The hardware seems really good. Screen quality is wonderful, auto dimming works great, audio playback and pickup is quite good for the small size and thumbs up for adding the 3.5mm output so that this device can be used with external speakers for multi-room streaming. Also love the photo slideshow.

However, you can't manually set the time, the alarms or anything else without being connected to wifi and generally using the voice interface. I'd love for most if not all features being duplicated as on-screen options so you don't have to talk to it and wake your partner up to set or modify an alarm. A larger clock option would be nice so you can read the time from more than 10 feet away.  Also, if your internet or power cuts out this device basically turns into a pumpkin. Which I found out when my internet dropped out last night and the clock got stuck 6 hours off. So I didnt wake up on time today. See photo. Would like to see some sort of small backup battery and offline capability in the next gen to make sure that alarms still go off.

author: Leilani sims
title: Awesome investment
content: Love how easy the set up was love that my alarm is music love that it can set up to Apple Music love that it connects and shows me my cameras

author: beccalee
title: Alexa is the best personal assistant!
content: This is the best thing ever!! I bought Alexa because I was having trouble remembering to set my alarm. With Alexa, I simply tell her what time to set my alarm(s) and it's done. She can order  items for me on Amazon, she can play music, she can play movies, just about anything you can think of, Alexa can do. And, watching movies on her little screen is surprisingly good! My only wish is that they would make a version with LTE! Then I could take my Alexa anywhere I went.

author: Susan Curran
title: Great Purchase
content: Love it. Can't imagine life without it. So versatile. Clock. Music and phone. We haven't tipped the iceberg of possibilities.

author: Michael Clark
title: Spot is awesome but two things need fixing
content: The spot is a lot better than the dot in my opinion, but the only negative items which are when you say Alexa, command. It takes a few seconds to do it, there’s a slight delay. On the dot you say a command it does immediately. So overall I like it more than the dot. Second thing is for the screen to rotate to clock and weather only and take out things to do. Fix those two things and it would be a 5 star.

author: Elizabeth Jackson
title: It does not work
content: After only a couple of days Alexa did not answer. I have disconnected and will see if it does any better after reconnecting.

author: Kevin H
title: Useful display, compact size
content: For me this is Echo in the just right zone. Useful display, compact size, decent audio. Very happy and wife approved!

author: William Kesel
title: It works well
content:
Everything I expected it to be, the white color looks great on the kitchen counter. I've pulled up recipies, album art is displayed when music is playing... I have one in my bedroom for Alarm clock (also works well) and I have absolutely no problem with the brightness, it adapts to the ambient light of the room l, and dims shortly after the lights go out.

Only thing I really dislike, is it's WAAAYY more sensitive then the other echo devices to voice. If I'm in the living room it picks up me speaking to my Echo Plus before the Plus does... Which just confuses them both.

author: Porto
title: Yes baby!
content: Love it.

author: Locke Webster
title: Outstanding Echo with a HUGE Caveat
content:
I love the Echo Spot. I love it's size. I love the build. I love what it does. BUT I CANNOT STAND THE "Things to Try" TAB. Even turning off the screen rotations to minimize the existence of the "feature" is not a true fix to remove it. It still shows up once, after every time you give the echo a command.

It wouldn't be such an annoyance if the "things" they wanted you to try were helpful, as opposed to mere ways to buy more things from the Amazon ecosystem. Such as "What is the most popular toy", "Add Bruce Springsteen to my favorite artists" etc. It's so stupid, and obviously fixable on Amazon's end.

COULD YOU EVEN IMAGINE IF YOUR OTHER ECHOS DID THIS AUDIBLY?!?!?!

I'm not sure if it's a dealbreaker for me yet. I tolerate it on my kindle, because I don't look at my kindle every 5 minutes to check the time. But this is often an annoyance that stands in the way of me ever using the "rotate continuously" feature on it.

author: James N. Bryant
title: Love my spot
content: I love my echo spot,  I use it for music, timers alarm, weather, news and a lot more

author: A Dude
title: Just a dot with a display...
content: Besides being a nice night stand clock, it's an overpriced dot with a display. I was hoping to get more features in conjunction with my Ring Pro doorbell, but all it does is showing live whatever the Ring captures and that is only if you ask it to do so. It will not turn-on the display if you have activity (motion or someone ringing).

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love it
content: I fought getting the house on AI but I find I love it. Easy to talk to everyone in the house.

author: K. Barlow
title: but I love this one
content: I own an original echo, two dots and two shows. It was hard to justify buying yet another addition to my echo family, but I love this one. I would trade the two shows for two more spots easily. I'm happy with the shows but they are bulky and not overly attractive. The spot works flawlessly, nice size and works perfectly on a nightstand or office. Sound is decent especially for its small size.

author: Kevin T.
title: which is incredibly annoying. There is a setting where you can opt ...
content:
This product currently has two related software flaws that make it completely unusable:

1) There is a "card" on the homescreen called "Things To Try" -- it's an ad for other Alexa services you can try. You can turn off all the other homescreen cards, but not this one.

2) By default, the homescreen cards "cycle" automatically, which is incredibly annoying. There is a setting where you can opt to have the cards only "cycle once" instead of "cycle continuously", but critically *this setting does not work*. My unit has been set to "cycle once", and the cards still continue to cycle all the time. Have rebooted the device, re-set, etc etc.

Until these two obvious software issues are fixed, in my opinion the product is useless.

author: Sheryl Oreiro
title: Love it!!
content:
Great way to keep in touch with family far away and I love being able to have it call my phone when I can't find it in the house!!
So many uses.... alarm clock, music,  weather, information. I'm finding new ideas everyday!

author: jodyredrose1
title: Convenience
content: that was the easiest to hook up to the Internet it actually walked itself through it I love it and it's awesome better than any other device I have in the home so far

author: Jose Barrientos
title: Not as integrated as you would think.
content: I like the screen feature and all that. But it feels like just a bunch of bells and whistles. I was going to replace my google assistant for this one but am thinking twice. I wanted to pair this with my fire stick but it won’t. It also doesn’t play Spotify playlists that are “made for me”. So I have to use my phone for that which I didn’t have to do with the google assistant. Not worth the price in my opinion and will prob go back to the google assistant.

author: bu
title: Love!
content:
I listen to music all the time but just realized I can watch a movie on it.
Love!

author: Lexus Driver
title: Spot On
content: A really useful device.  Not only is it an attractive clock with several options for the clock face, but it provides a variety of information and announcements on the clock face intermittently.  It sounds pretty good as well for such a small speaker. Very pleased with the Echo Spot.

author: Chad Johnson
title: I like it so far
content: I like it so far, but anxiously awaiting more home screen and clock customizations. I wish you could put more than just the time on the digital clock face, for example.

author: Madison
title: Fun but expected a little more...
content: I wanted to love the Echo Spot as much as my Echo Dot. But, although I like the Spot, it doesn’t “behave” as well as the Dot... Especially for the price difference. The Spot often hangs up or is silent when it should be talking. It doesn’t always respond to my voice. It seems like the data gets hung up in the cloud. And blue ring is not as vibrant as the Dot when it’s listening or responding to me. On the positive, the Spot has great sound and I really enjoy listening to music on it. Also, it was so easy to set up! This was my 2nd Alexa and it almost installed itself. All in all, I like it but I expected better performance from it.

author: S  Bergeron
title: A step up
content: I really like it. I love that you are able to make video calls from it,  but I  feel that it should have more ability to use the touch screen.

author: Sumnfun
title: Good product
content: Can get it to connect to a bluetooth speaker which the echo dot it replaced was able to do so.  Other than that it's great!

author: Gene
title: really wish I could increase the microphone. to many ...
content:
really wish I could increase the microphone.  to many times I am having to repeat my self just to have it acknowledge.
works okay in the tasks I ask it for.

author: Timothy M.
title: Echo spot
content: Love it for the many features it has and great alarm for my daughters room

author: Silverwolf341
title: Great device.
content: Great to have the screen. Great sound and size. Very easy to setup.

author: Nitrousbird
title: Great but a little pricey
content:
I hate the price, but love my Spot.

I purchased this for my nightstand as I wanted to get a new alarm clock, as my old one was long in the tooth.  I also needed an Alexa device in the bedroom to control my lights/ceiling fan for my home automation.

It looks great and works very well as an alarm clock.  I would never watch video or do stuff like that on it.  I would have been happy with a cheaper display/speakers for a lower price.  I needed a dot with a clock - this is beyond that.  Speakers are better than expected but I wouldn't use it for music.

It dims very well for night use.  The snooze is almost too easy (just touch the screen...don't even need to look at it).  Only flaw in the alarm clock process was when I had a night when my ISP was down due to the weather.  No internet connection = can't set the alarm.  I always keep a battery powered alarm just in case so it wasn't a big issue, but just something to think about.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Cute, but missing some obvious features
content:
The Echo Spot is missing some seamingly obvious features.
- The font for the clock is small, and nearly unreadable unless you are very close. This would be fine if it was possible to increase the font size, but you can't. You are stuck with the default, small font. There is a "magnifier" accessibility option where you can manually "zoom in" by pinching and tapping your fingers on the screen, but this causes all of the menus to be too big. It seems that Amazon's developers just assumed that everyone would have their alarm clock on a night stand, inches from their face.
- You can't coordinate your Echo alarms and reminders across multiple devices. So, if I set a reminder from the bedroom, ONLY the echo in the bedroom will announce the reminder. If you happen to be in another part of the house, you'll never hear the reminder -- and the other Echo devices won't remind you because reminders and alarms are all on a per-device basis. Obviously, you might not always want every reminder to be announced on every device, but it should be at least possible.

author: Amazon Customer
title: The clock changes color at night, to a neon green, and back to blue in the morning.
content: I love that it changes color at night to a softer green. Of coarse Alexa is amazing as ever giving you not only the time but date and temperature as well. Just ask her to set an alarm and its done. I have three Alexa's in the house and I love them all.

author: Fry Daddy
title: Perfect
content: Perfect

author: 19photos
title: Echo Spot  !!
content: This is as impressive as the original and the 2 spots I have at home. I'm using this at my desk. Just a lot of fun and useful, again at my desk.

author: Thomas Schoot
title: Information at your fingertips.  Great kitchen assistant.
content: I hung my spot on the wall in my kitchen and use it for my morning briefs and for different recipes.  I sometimes even listen to music to cook by.  I think my biggest issue would the size. Of the screen.

author: Rich
title: Great bedside alarm clock
content: I don't use it much to watch video clips much or to learn the words of songs, although sometimes I do. But i really like it for a bedside alarm clock. A lot. I use the sleep sounds skill (ocean noises) and I like the speed and flexibility of simply telling Alexa when to wake me up. With the spot, when you roll over or get up you can see what time it is. I use the analog face as it is easier to see at night. Heading the flash briefing in the morning is nice. I suppose I'll start to use it for video calls at some point, but haven't done that yet.

author: Ex Library Worker
title: Great product, just be aware of the limitations
content: Works as advertised. I've installed several different skills and they work well for the most part. My daughter loves using the drop in feature to talk with me. I wish the speaker was a little better, but I knew that going in, so not a knock against the product.

author: Jenny
title: Love
content: Love! Great alarm clock!

author: Paula Damasceno
title: I loved everything about my echo!
content: Once you download your photos on Prime photos, Alexa can background your pictures while you listen your favorite songs.

author: Marlis W.
title: How to connect it to new wi fi s
content: I loved this item and used it at my daughters home.  Now that I’m home, I cannot get it to connect to my WiFi.  I was hoping to use this item when traveling in RV but it seems to be an issue at this time.

author: Suzy
title: Download App
content: Learning more every day; greatest Christmas gift!

author: DB
title: Four Stars
content: I purchased this for me and I love it. Responds Greatly to voice command. Completely hands free

author: David Cleveland
title: Loved the ease of setup
content: Loved the ease of setup.  Alexa is awesome.  Just ask a question and it gets answered.  Give a command and it gets done.  Would recommend for anyone.

author: sophie hunt
title: Its fun but could be alot better
content: I love this BUT it doesnt do much and is super limited if you dont have amazon prime

author: J. Johnson
title: Household helper.
content:
Best Amazon purchase ever. Have had an Echo since they first came out. Love them. Got the spot and am so happy with it. Hubby loves that it shows the lyrics when he listens to music. Fun. Games... information.displays the Time and weather.
And ideas of new things to try.
I can video chat with hubby from the other side of the house. It is just plain awesome.
Does everything my Echo and Echo dots do and more.

author: EFK
title: Easy to use
content: Easy to use  . Needs battery back up. Don’t like the way you have to turn off the alarm

author: Ray Subias
title: Echo Spot
content: I like that it fits perfectly on our bedroom nightstand and having the power of Alexa in our room. Nice form factor and like that I can see my cameras from the screen and that I have the option to use it as a camera to see inside my room. I don’t use it but is a nice option if I do in the future.  The only thing is that the screen is a bit small. I would prefer a slightly bigger screen. Maybe 3.5 inches

author: Tim G.
title: This addition of the screen is pretty cool and it look nice with the clock and ...
content: Purchased this for my wife as a gift. We already own a couple of the Echo devices. This addition of the screen is pretty cool and it look nice with the clock and weather. Very cool design. It doesn't look out of place anywhere you place it.

author: Collin
title: Truly a wonderful piece of tech
content: Truly a wonderful piece of tech. My phone alarm is not all that reliable. I needed an alarm clock that would repeat on specific days, but I wanted the convenience of simplicity. This product delivered everything that I wanted and more. It sounded the alarm for work perfectly. What really impressed me was it's flexibility. I have made a routine for when I wake up to turn on the lights automatically, give me the weather, traffic, and news as I am getting ready. Some people are bothered by the camera on it, but I don't do anything shady. If the NSA wants to spy on me, god help them when they see me walking around in my birthday suit. The only thing I would suggest is for the option to add music to the list of options for the routine feature. Other than that, it is amazing and I don't see myself getting bored with it. I will be getting another Echo device for the living room for sure.

author: kwkarth
title: Five Stars
content: Great build quality, good sound quality with built in speaker and great bluetooth sound quality.

author: LCA
title: Loving It
content: I can play karaoke with my alarm clock. I freaking love it.

author: S. Alvarado
title: Has exceeded my expectations.
content: I have been loving this device. Video chat is great quality. I have it connected to my ring cameras which makes it easier for my family to see who is at the door. I can control my ecobee thermostat upstairs with it. I love also watching my video podcast and flash briefings in the morning while I am in the kitchen.

author: Ray
title: Great upgrade for our digital clock....
content: My grandkids (5 yrs and 20 months old) love Alexa, they love talking to it and playing the music they love.  I like how I can tell her to set the alarm and wake up to music and to the music that I like either Amazon music, Pandora, or even iHeart Radio.

author: Theresa h.
title: for me, music whenever I want ... and takes up no space
content: I like that Alexa reminds of my pills, I like that I can hear music any time I want, the artists I like best. No more cd’s for me hard to believe. Check the weather, answer trivia questions, she’s smarter than I am for sure.

author: Madison Taylor
title: It's a good start, but definitely will need some improvements.
content:
It's a good start, but definitely will need some improvements.

Pros: all the function of Alexa but with a touch screen that opens up some new functions.

Cons: Amazon's battle with Google. **Biggest down side** You are not able to watch YouTube (which is owned by Google) .  Listen to Google play (understandable, still an annoyance.)It would also be nice to see the lyrics from any music app that is being played. Along with being able to watch other apps like Netflix would make this a fantastic product.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Best purchase this Christmas!
content: Best gift this Christmas!! We gave this to my 10 year old old ADHD daughter who can be a challenge to get out of the house in the mornings and this thing has changed our lives!! No more yelling and tears!! Alexa is my favorite person on school mornings! Plus in the app I can give her reminders as she is getting ready so she doesn’t lose track of what she should be doing. She agrees this has helped so much.. plus she loves music and all the fun facts she can learn, so it’s a win-win!!

author: Donald McDonald
title: Love the large red LEDs
content:
We purchased this to replace a 30 year old SONY DreamMachine analog alarm clock.  A real war horse.  Of course never did husband and wife alarms.  Her alarm went off at 5am and I had to hit the "snooze" and then reset it for 7am.  Every morning for decades.  We never used the radio, ever.  Love the large red LEDs.  While getting ready in the morning I could duck my head in the room and see the time easily from across the room.  This was my biggest fear with this Echo Spot.

So far have not missed the old clock radio.  This Spot is the BEST.  We can set both alarms and at 5am my wife says, "Alexa stop" and it goes back off at 7am for me.  And we don't have to turn it off for the weekend because we set "weekdays at 5" and "weekdays at 7" alarms.

No rolling over to hit the snooze bar or the reset button.  Love it. Well worth the $$$.

And we don't use half of what it can do.  It can play music, has a touch screen and can do video phone calls.

author: Al
title: Guess I got a lemon!
content:
Had this unit since April 2018
Now doesn’t respond to requests. Checked all possible issues with wifi etc! Guess its a lemon!  Unable to get it to work!!

author: mike_fl
title: Wall mount sold seperately
content: Installed on my back porch, works very well!  I did have to get the wall mount for it, which also works well.

author: Ashlee
title: I love Alexa!
content:
I absolutely love my amazon echo! It works so good. I love being able to ask Alexa questions about the weather or asking her to set my alarms. She is good at listening that is for sure! Check out my video of me asking her questions! She’s a quick learner too! :)

Pros:
•Alexa knows a lot
•Alexa is a good listener
•volume can get super quiet or loud
•unlimited amount of features available
•the app is a must have!

Cons:
•Hard to figure out how to actually reset or update the internet WiFi

author: jficke
title: NOT a good baby monitor (proof)
content: NOT a good baby monitor. Image covered by zoom and voice button that cant be removed. See picture.

author: Flying Girl
title: Works great
content: Works as advertised!

author: MissA
title: Awesome little thing
content: I like the screen on it. It shows you the weather, lyrics to a song, answers to your questions etc. It's pretty cool!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Easy to use
content: I can do some things faster with this than my computer such as making phone calls.  I replaced the clock in my bedroom with it and I have one in my office.  I really underutilize the functions that it has.  Easy to use, I really like it a lot.  Lou

author: BJJones
title: Love the Echo Spot
content: It is great for a bedside clock and alarm.  The warm lighting does not disrupt my sleep, yet I can see the time (I am pretty blind without my contacts).  I love that I can be woken up by my favorite song, and then find out the temperature for the day.  I am sure I have not yet used it to it's fullest potential yet.  And look forward to finding out what else I can do!

author: Colleen Crowe
title: Works great!
content: Works great!

author: Crystal Zech
title: Four Stars
content: i really like this one I have 2 different models but this one fits in bedroom very nice

author: T.H.
title: World's greated radio
content: This is the greatest radio ever in addition to everything else it does.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice little Alexa electronic
content: Got this when it was on sale and I love it! I probably don’t use all it’s features but the speaker and screen works nice for me! I like this better than the other Echo because of the appearance too

author: Kaitlyn Cartier
title: Great gift!
content: I bought this as a gift for my “senior” father who’s 65 years young so he could video call his grandchildren. In his words he is tickled pink by it. I had to assist with set up, but he managed 90% off it on his own, technology is not his thing, so I found that impressive he got that far. The other 10 percent was linking my music account to it for him.

author: G. Smith
title: Good device, but Amazon's greed hampers its usability somewhat
content:
The device itself is five full stars -- its voice recognition is top-notch, its sound quality is quite decent for such a small object, it makes an attractive clock for a tabletop, its commands are logical, and it is very versatile.  It is extremely easy to connect up and get onto a wireless network, and I have one running through my Sony 1200 Watt/Channel 7.2 AV receiver where it provides excellent quality reproduction, equaling the sound quality of a CD.

I would also give five stars to Amazon's Unlimited Prime Music service but for one little (well, not so little) problem, to wit:  While for Prime members who purchase this device it only costs a reasonable $3.95/mo., we bought two of them under a special discount deal from Amazon, one for our bedroom and once for our living room.  Unlimited music is quite extensive and I have been able to find many quite obscure items that suit my rather eclectic tastes (I tried to fool it by asking for Harry "The Hipster" Gibson's "Who Put the Benzedrine in Mrs. Murphy's Ovaltine," a scat song from 1947, and it didn't skip a beat).  While the unlimited music works on both devices (and the same content can play on both Spots simultaneously), it can only play one song or album at a time.  Amazon will not sell us a second service for $3.95 for the other device, which we would purchase if we could.  We would have to go to the $14.95/mo. "Family Package," which is too expensive to be worth it, so we have to live with the limitation (and Amazon will have to make do without our additional $3.95 a month, but Jeff Bezos probably has enough to eke out a meager existence without it).

author: mbail
title: Great alarm clock
content: This is a great echo device.  I wasn't looking for another echo because we have an echo (first generation) or echo dot (second generation) in each room.  I had been interested in the echo show, but the price seemed high for a replacement echo and it seemed bulky for the places I would use them.  When they echo show popped up, I could justify the price and size.  I decided I wanted to use it as an alarm clock in my bedroom and I have been happy so far.  It replaced an echo (first generation).  The microphones work fine even all the way across the room.  The auto dimming at night works well so no glaring clock on my nightstand at night.  I use the sleep sounds skill as a white noise generator and the speakers sound good.  I like that I can pull the video for outside Arlo cameras and the picture is very clear, yet small.  When I pull traffic and weather it shows me all of the options for traffic and the full weather forecast on the screen.  My only gripe is the repeating alarms need to be more customizable.  If I want to cancel an alarm for a repeating weekday alarm for one day, I need turn off the whole alarm.  I then need to remember to turn it back on.  There doesn't seem to be any indicator on the clock face that the alarm is off to remind you to turn it back on like a regular alarm clock.  Correction: it does show the alarm setting on the clock face, including the time it's set for, so I upgraded my rating to five stars

author: L. Ramírez-Márquez
title: Five Stars
content: Love it! It was easy to install.  All features are awesome.

author: Kristin Langworth-Szygiel
title: Disappointed.. would not recommend
content: I bought 2 of these somy parents and kids could see/talk to each other frequently when my parents moved away from us. We’ve used the product only twice because when we did, the screen either froze or was blurry. Also we had to stand awkwardly to be seen on the screen. Would not recommend

author: JetCityPD
title: Perfect execution of a device yet mature.
content: Amazon nailed this one. The design is awesome. Alexa is far from mature and is years away form being a search engine but she really helps with home automation. We have her as fully integrated with our Nest and Sonos as currently allowed. She even turns our lava lamp on and off. Sure, sometimes she misses the ask or doesn't understand but life with her is nicer than life without.

author: Utah Reviews
title: Works Great on My office desk
content: Already have the Show,  purchased this for my desk.  Great add on,  took me sometime to not have it flashing news events etc.  I just have it for a clock on my desk and I use it as a phone to call people,  reminders and a timer etc.  Great add on

author: YW
title: Love My Black Echo Spot!
content: I love the fact my Black Echo Spot blends in with my dark furniture. It has a personal assistant named Alexa. She gives me the latest news, traffic and weather updates, and keeps me posted about what's on my Grocery list. Alexa sets my alarms, shows me the time, and she plays relaxing noises like "rain sounds" by Invoked Apps LLC. She does a lot more through Alexa skills that can be added. Alexa even responds to "Alexa, thank you". I love it!!!

author: tinnecm
title: This is our first “Alexa” piece of equipment and so ...
content: This is our first “Alexa” piece of equipment and so I have nothing to compare it with. However, it seems to be an expensive way to hear a joke!  I have not mastered the art of turning lights on and off, but having always done that manually for free in the past and so I’m not sure why I would spend hundreds of dollars to do it remotely?

author: james s whittaker
title: Don’t really like this one
content: Don’t really like this one. I would stick with the echo if you want to use it for music.  This speaker is weak and sucks. The screen is hard to see/tell when Alexa is listening. Had to turn on the audio tone when she answers.  It is at a very weird angle so the video is not all that great if you put this on a counter. I think amazon wants this to be a nightstand unit,  it a camera in the bedroom is not what we want.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great product making a day at work more fun with music and many other fun features.
content: I purchased this as a gift for my husband new office. He was like a kid on Christmas day playing with his new toy. Testing all Spots bells and whistles.

author: Kirsten
title: Great piece of house technology
content: Rellly like the Echo Spot. Love how it works with the kids Echo Dot. I am sure it has 100 more features we have yet to explore but it serves the purpose we purchased it for.

author: Amber Lee
title: Well worth the purchase!
content: I bought two of these for my small apartment, and absolutely love them. They arrived within days of purchase, and were extremely easy to setup. I recommend them with smart plugs at the very least, and have enjoyed getting to know Alexa and all she can do for me!

author: rac927
title: Get the stand! Helps with voice recognition
content: Love this! It's a mini Echo show with a better clock display!

author: Cass Wheeler
title: Quick and easy to connect
content: Instantly loved giving verbal commands to lights, thermostat, etc. so much that I bought a second one a couple of weeks later.

author: Quince
title: Excellent
content: Really good device

author: Joanne Ardary
title: Convenience
content: Love it, love it. Still learning how to use all the features. Just connected phone so it will answer phone. Live in independent Senior living and it will call front desk from anywhere in apartment in case of emergency. Do not have to be near a pull cord.

author: Jaburk
title: Love the clock feature
content: I was worried that the Spot would note have a good speaker- but I find that it is almost as good as the original Echo.  I like the clocks and the temp display

author: Tom Quinn
title: It’s OK, but not amazing
content: I wish the inactive display could just a clock or photo or something and not constantly push other stuff or echo commands on the screen.

author: Jason zornek
title: Makes Alexa useful.
content: The screen, regardless of its tiny size, actually makes Alexa and the whole “dot” concept useful. I have played with the echo and echo dot in the past and got bored with it pretty fast. Found them to be a novelty that was more fun than function but the spot changes everything.

author: Slaphappy
title: Great product.
content: Kinda fun.

author: Drew J
title: VERY AWESOME!
content: I wish I would have bought more of these rather than the Echo Dot.  VERY COOL!

author: SteveR~
title: Love the Echo Dot!!
content:
Love the Echo Dot!!
Good looking, good sound quality for the size. It does everything you would expect.
Buy the stand for it though. You will like it even more!

author: Jason
title: Like it better than the show
content: What a wonderful little Alexa enabled gadget at like the analog clock face the best

author: Mike Kirkpatrick
title: Super!
content: Lot of fun having such a knowledge base at you beck and call.

author: Deon N.
title: wish screen was larger
content:
I had to pay a return shipping on 2 units because amazons discount on 2 doesnt show up until you finish paying so I had canceled the order and redid it...only to have 4 show up, then charged to return...
I also dont like the screen way too small...and since its a circle it doesnt fit video well....should have done something different

author: M. Meyer
title: Love it!
content: I really like it, it was a gift from one of my boys and I use it everyday as an alarm and to listen to music .

author: hannon
title: A more refined DOT
content: This is my sixth Echo product.  I have Dot's throughout the house, one of the first Echo's (first gen) as well as one of the first Dot's (had to order via voice on the Echo.  So, all that said, I love these things.  This looks great, the size is very nice and it functions just like one of the DOT's.  My issue comes from the video screen.  It is so small that trying to watch any video is near impossible.  And I know the drop in feature may be nice in the future, but it would be really nice to video call via this now.  It has a camera and a screen, so I don't know why this couldn't do facetime or Skype.

author: Jeffery L. Price
title: Clock Radio Replacement
content: My ancient bedside clock radio died.  Since I already owned Echos and Dots I bought the Spot to try as a replacement and I was NOT disappointed at all.  Display, timers & alarm all all settable via voice command along with snooze (I use this too often).  The Spot has proven to be a great programmable replacement for this use.  Get one, you'll enjoy it!

author: Jeremy P.
title: Hate the camera, great otherwise.
content: Overall great product. I use it as an alarm clock in my bedroom. It fulfills that role perfectly, especially since I can set custom music playlists to play as the alarm. Only true downside is it has a camera built into it, be nice to have an option that didn't include the camera, especially since this is marketed as a smart alarm clock. Only other thing I can say which is neutral is that you can't edit the alarm music from the app, and specifying the alarm music through voice commands can be a bit finicky.  She will sometimes understand what you said and list the correct playlist as the alarm other times not so much. In the end it means just deleting the incorrect alarms and repeating the commands a few times till she gets it right. I marked this as neutral as I think this will improve with time.

author: William
title: Could be great.  Wait until version 2?
content:
I like this alarm clock.  I know it does more, but that's pretty much the main function of it for me.  Its convenient to be able to set and cancel alarms by speaking to Alexa rather than messing with buttons & dials.  The quality of the speaker is pretty good too for such a small thing.  Its also nice that the screen brightness is auto dimming and I like asking Alexa the day's forecast and such in the morning to prepare for the day.
There's a couple issues that I have with it that makes me want to wait for a revised version.  First and foremost is the lack of an internal battery back up.  That is obviously not an issue most days, but it already almost made me late one night when the power went off.  So, if you really need to be sure you'll be up on time for a flight or other important event, you need so set your phone's alarm clock or similar back up device.
The other small issue I have is that if this device is on your partner's side of the bed, its really hard to see at night!  I like the fact that the screen dims almost to the point of being off, but I wish the light of the time (digits) was a little bigger or brighter (I know the brightness is adjustable, but it's still hard to see even on higher settings).  I feel the need to have another device on my nightstand to see the time when I wake up at night.

author: K. Fitzharris
title: Arrived less than 12 hours from ordering...amazing!
content: Great experience overall.  Would have been nice to have some bubble packing inside, as the product box was smaller than the shipping box, but that's a minor gripe.  Overall very nice job

author: Jab
title: Great product
content: I got it to work with my Ring door bell.  I was surprised how well it was built. It is much louder than my echo dot. I was able to set it up with Amazon classical music  for a ring.  I can call my friend who lives across the country. I like to have books read to me at night.  I am amazed how many useful things it can do.  Great for a senior citizen.

author: yougotmyworld
title: Two major flaw
content: it can't show you time and weather at the same time and hold screen, there is second screen but it times out and leaves you with only clock and little date but leaves weather info which is critical. i am not returning it because i like flashnews feature little videos etc. but disappointed for sure due to this. also i would prefer such screen to show one large clock and little outdoor weather, not the other ways around which is on temporary second screen. current temporary screen shows very small clock and then large weather. i spent lot of time reading several reviews many people complaining about this missing feature, but i don't understand why amazon not providing this feature, instead we have to keep asking alexa for weather all the time. I am thinking may be keep some old cheap android phone with good widget show these information all the time and issue will be solved. but at this price point i do expect amazon to provide this feature.

author: hoagie64
title: Five Stars
content: I like using my smart plugs I have lamps plugged into.  Just ask and she’ll tell us

author: theresa gadalla
title: Alexa, play Happy Birthday!
content: This was a Birthday gift for me from the hubby. I really enjoy it. Playing trivia, music. The sound quality is very good. My 5 year old granddaughter really enjoys asking Alexa lots of questions. She also asks her to play her favorite songs, like the Christmas music from her program at school so she can practice (watching my granddaughter perform with Alexa makes this worth any price).

author: Kristine Webb
title: What a gem!
content: I received my Echo Spot yesterday and absolutely love it! This is the first Echo device I've ever owned and I can't stop telling my friends how much I love it.

author: hepua
title: I am so in love!
content:
I mostly use this as a clock.

Iʻve used this as an alarm clock, to watch prime videos before I go to sleep, to play music, listen to podcasts, and as an occasional timer.

Itʻs a lot of fun and I know there is so much more I can do, which makes it even better.

author: Daniel B.
title: Love my Spot
content:
Love my Spot, I will say it was pretty cool to see it display my name, but felt a little creepy at the same time when I had plugged it in and not connected it to any source of data.
It’s the most useful device I use, and I’m a harcore Apple enthusiast. Alexa is very responsive and so far I haven’t had to repeat myself when asking Alexa to perform the requested function.
The screen is bright and color is perfect. This is a great device. You won’t be disappointed. I do recommend connecting this device to a larger Bluetooth speaker or connecting it to a pair of speakers via the 3.5mm port. The built in speaker is decent, but not good for music and other audio-rich content. I gave this 5 stars due to its usefulness, ease of use, responsiveness, and the fact it’s always getting better via its “skills.” I do not see this being a novelty device.

author: briley
title: Perfect Option
content: Was torn between not wanting to spend 229 and wanting more than just a dot - this was the perfect option.  I have this in my bedroom and love the little display and she works well.  I plan to buy a dot or two to expand to other areas of my house in the future.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great Product
content: My kids have it each room and they love it. They used to play lullaby's, hear Disney soundtracks or just to tell them kids joke. It great to use as intercom. Great product, easy to use and overall a great item for our house.

author: Emily
title: She was amazed by everything that it could do
content: My daughter received it as an early Christmas present!  She was amazed by everything that it could do!  She said that it was the best gift ever!!

author: Risa
title: OMG my life just changed
content: Who knew a little magic 8 ball looking thing could be so powerful.  From setting morning routines including updates on traffic and news to turning on and off lights and creating shopping lists (not to mention calling people) I'm amazed at everything this thing is doing.  I think I'm going to love it.  Best part is it stops talking when you say "Alexa, please stop,"  Wonder if it can train kids.  ;-)

author: William F. Rogers
title: Expensive but worth it.
content: Great bedside alarm clock. So ma ny positives: choice of alarms, little light at night is just enough. Choice of music. Check weather. I bought a second one for my wife.  One negative: expensive

author: Woogie
title: It's like having a friend as a clock
content: Talk to it, ask for help, call people, nonice product.

author: Petunia
title: Love It!
content: Love the Echo Spot. Love the video on this. Also has great sound. Have it in my bathroom so I get news and music while getting ready to run errands (my kind of “work”) since I am retired. Also check on weather to know what to wear. It’s a great Amazon product.

author: Liz  Van De  Mark
title: It’s like a companion...lol
content: Love it ..it does so it answers so many things .. it’s a timer ...reminder ... spells..recites etc..

author: D. Day
title: Cool new echo addition
content: I got two of this Echo Spot at the Valley Fair Amazon store. Surprisingly the sound quality is pretty good. The image is bright with nice color and wide viewing angle.

author: Lindsay
title: I bought this for my mom to use with her Nest thermostat
content: I bought this for my mom to use with her Nest thermostat since she doesn’t have a smart phone. This way she can turn the temperature up and down.

author: Thomas
title: At first I was in love with all the great things I thought I could ...
content:
At first I was in love with all the great things I thought I could do with an echo spot.
Pros: Looks good as an alarm clock.  Neat gimmick/conversation piece.  Works well with my Ring Doorbell 2 except I have to tell it to show the front door.
Cons: Sound is sub par.  I'd put it just barely above a dot.  Camera is terrible.  $30 webcams do better.  Video is soo small you have to pick it up to watch trailers/how-to's/etc.

Overall it's a neat toy.  Not sure it was worth the $130.  I initially wanted to make it an intercom system in the house but I can do better with far less and get an IR camera (there is no low light gain on the spot).

author: Adam Stallings
title: dot It's front screen display it's pretty impressive and it's responsiveness in the digital clock on ...
content: The echo spot is Sleek and compact and it's speaker is amazingly impressive in comparison to the echo.dot It's front screen display it's pretty impressive and it's responsiveness in the digital clock on the front is a nice addition for your bedside table or really any room for that matter. The voice calling feature is more crisp and clear than the echoDot. Your biscuit I don't want to watch when it comes to the display brightness, I'm relatively unenthused because it seems like it is too dark and the view of the camera it's not quite scene wide enough because you have to almost be completely right up on it to talk to somebody for them to see you across the room well. Overall this product for the price point, quality, capabilities, and Sleek design... I rate this product at four stars only because of the brightness of the screen and that it's hard to see once a person is across the other side of the room.
