When adding a photo for the wallpaper it does line up the same as when you position the image in the Alexa app. For the echo device aimed for bedroom use I think the camera is unnecessary/intrusive. I will still give it three stars for good looks, and the same great functions as a regular echo, but I am taking a star away for price, and a star away for sound quality given the price.

author: John L. Parker
title: Nice Product
content: The Echo Spot is a great companion to the Echo Show I have in my kitchen. I can monitor my security cameras all around the house from my bedroom now. Love the ability to turn off the display at night for a completely dark room to sleep.

author: Private
title: Perfect addition to Alexa Family
content: Love it! Beautiful way to have a clock, get information, play games (skills download necessary but that takes a couple of easy minutes). The alarm sounds are calming and work great. No complaints.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Works great for me.
content: I like that I can add to my shopping list, ask questions, play games, tell her to play certain music.  I like the morning trivia and tells me to sleep well.  I really like it!  I like being able to update my calendar and see what is going on for the week.  I have watched a video or two and made a few phone calls but not used the camera for the phone calls.

author: Tumpaa
title: Great products for a great price must buy!!!!!
content: This is an amazing product that works as an all in one media center. It's very Interactive and very handy. just make sure that this device has location enabled so your amazon.com account is for the place where you want to use your Echo spot otherwise it is not going to pair up with your phone.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love this product. Plan to buy more
content: My first Alexa but I love the visual effects. It does so much more than the ones without a screen. I plan to buy a few more for other rooms in the house. Love it!

author: Holli S.
title: Love, love, love my Spot!
content:
I had just said to myself how I desired an assistant when I came across the Spot!  As a Mom of two things can get hectic really quickly trying to manage everyone’s schedules & my own. I just verbally tell Alexa what reminder or timer I need set and Voila!

Having my Spot has given me the virtual assistant I so desired without having to actually hire someone.  Not to mention the many other awesome features. I have Alexa synced with my Audible & Kindle & Alex can read a book from my libraries to me.

I’m still excited to see what else my Spot can do!

Side note: I had wanted to purchase a Show for a while & probably still will down the line however I sooooo love my sleek little Sopt!

author: Thoughtful
title: Died within 8 months!
content:
Bought a pair, one died suddenly after only 8 months!
Told I'll likely get a refurbished one, not a new one.
Would you want to have someone else's broken Echo Spot they repaired after only 8 months of use?
And they'll warrant the refurb for only the remainder of the warranty.
Very disappointed!!
Will likely not buy again from a company who returns a used product for a broken one!

content: I have two (2) Dots and the Spot is the best of all.  The screen is not a vivid as I would like, but the device is a winner.  I am very happy that I bought it.

content: It was perfect size, works well. Screen is clear. Very loud for the size speaker. It can pick your voice up from across the room. I like how you can set reminders and wake up to music or the news.

author: Marta H.

Also holds photos from my phone and they always bring a smile to my face. One of my favorite options are the soundscapes, the sound of rain or ocean waves makes me sleep like a baby! author: Glen S.
title: Terrible product. Glitchy at best
content:
Terrible product. Glitchy at best. Would stop responding all together . Problem connecting to Bose WiFi speakers . Would freez in need of hard rebooting. Alarm would not work. Voice command non responsive . My other two Alexa’s never had any of these problems

Received a call from amazon from a bice representative 1/2 hour after my review. He was  patient  To walk me through fixing the issue. Unfortunately after all the work we did. Alexa is still in responsive ......

author: J. Chacon

author: John M Mellendick Jr
title: I just love my new Echo Spot
content: I just love my new Echo Spot.  Was looking for a cool new clock radio after our very old one died and hoping for some cool features  - like not having to hold two buttons from very odd angles to try and set it each night.  I got that and so much more!  While pricey for an alarm clock, I just love talking to Alexa, its so easy, and the best part is just telling her when to set my alarm and to what sound or music I wish to wake to AND being able to tell her to cancel it in the am when it goes off!  No more fumbling to find the snooze or off buttons!  Can't say enough about it!  And if you are a fan of Amazon, you'll just love how much more easy Alexa makes it to shop with Amazon.  Don't second guess it!  Buy it!  You won't be sorry.

author: Anne K. Simmons

With my old Wi-Fi setup, I definitely noticed when I plugged it in.

Everything else is awesome.

author: Langolier247
title: Alarm Clock Killer! (Just cover the camera)
content:
The sound quality is miles ahead of It’s older brother the echo dot. It’s cool, makes for a great alarm clock replacement. There are just a few things I think Amazon should  consider  with the second gen. 1) it has a physical switch that can go over the camera. With today’s day and age privacy is huge and a camera that can peep in on my bedroom when ever it wants isn’t a big sell. I have my covered with tape.
2) a bigger screen, the bezels on this are  quite large considering the size of this little guy. And with smart phones going just about edge to edge we know it’s possble.

title: Five Stars

Easy to set alarms and timers and I just ask Alexa to play a radio station and I can speak softly and the microphone is sensitive enough to hear me.

It tells me what is playing, gives me the time, weather, and anything else I need to know.  I am sure I will find more things to love about Spot in the future. author: Glynn Tyson

content: This is my favorite Echo device! It’s got the perks of the show but the convenience of being small. I use it all day long!

author: Alexandre M. Raposo
title: A great little device, but needs some more options and tweaks...hopefully soon!
content:
Just set this up last night and so far I am happy with it. It's not perfect yet...but I'm sure amazon will continue to tweak it to its best potential. Sound quality is MUCH better than an echo dot in my opinion, but not that of a regular echo. Still though I was very impressed with the sound quality for such a small device.

One thing I like is that it auto dims to a VERY dim state at night so you can easy check the time in complete darkness but it isn't super bright.
One thing I don't like is I wish I could change the BOLD-ness or size of the digital time at night. It's still really too small for the screen space and hard to read if you don't have it RIGHT next to you on a night stand (I keep mine on a bureau about 8 feet away). There is plenty of screen room to increase the size I am confident that this will come eventually....(I hope!) The only other option would be putting one on each nightstand of the room.

As far as the other features...all of the alexa features are there and they are, of course, awesome. SO many different things you can do. Pretty much everything you Echo Show....you can do with this.

To me, this device has a bright future for sure!

author: mikey

author: M. McDonough
title: Very Nice Addition to the Echo Family!
content:
I’ve had the opportunity to play with my Spot for just about 24-hours now, and I have to admit that I am pretty impressed so far! The display is very nice, the touch screen is responsive, the ambient light sensor does a great job of reducing brightness of the screen to adjust for lighting in the room, and the speakers are GREAT. (I really think that it sounds a ton better than the Echo Dots do!) I love being able to upload a personal photo to use as the “clock face” and the ability to schedule “night mode” is great. It’s just as nice as having the “always on display” on my phone, and it was dim enough during the night as not to bother me.

My BIGGEST complaint thus far is (what I consider to be) an EPIC failure on behalf of the Echo Spot’s development team. Why in the name of Pete would you NOT give users the ability to display a 24-hour time format??? ASIDE from the practical applications of the 24-hour format, there are HUNDREDS UPON THOUSANDS of military personnel, police, fire, ETC. that use the 24-hour time format as a way of life. I KNOW that it is probably more difficult than just being a “display issue” considering that timers, alarms, etc. are all based on vocal commands, but I somehow doubt that it’s beyond the realm of possibilities.

Aside from that, the only thing that I am a tad bit annoyed with are all the “Things to Try” messages that keep popping up on my screen. I’d like to be able to turn those off. This is a solid product and is HIGHLY recommended!

author: Dadlfxt
title: Alexa is so cool, this is my 3rd device

See who is at my front door via Ring doorbell, adjust ac via Nest, etc. And visual prompts and YouTube videos. Really nice!

author: JMB

The drop in feature has been a blessing as I can place the Show in my mother’s room while I am in another room such as the kitchen cooking and can see and talk to her from my iPhone.  It is also a unit that keeps evolving with new, fun and practical additions to its repertoire of abilities. Don’t know what I would do without it!

author: Mike Klepper
title: Love the Echo Spot!
content:
The Echo Spot is a well-built compact device, has a very solid feel to it, unlike the Echo Show.

The set-up was very easy, especially since Amazon pre-configured the Spot to work with my Amazon account. What made it so smooth was that choosing wifi network and entering the password was done all on the Spot - no need to use the Alexa App. After setup there is a brief video showing you how to do certain things - like how to get to the settings screen by swiping down.

It has a capacitive touch screen, and is very responsive.

I keep my Echo Spot on my desk, so there was no need for the adjustable stand.

The user interface needs some work - it makes minimum use of the fact that the screen is round. For example, the volume slider is a straight line instead of being curved. Since this device has a screen, there ought to be on-screen buttons to snooze or stop alarms instead of saying "Alexa, snooze" or "Alexa, stop".

There are only six analog and six digital clock faces, and the digital ones don't have the option for showing 24-hour time (military time). Also, the font size for the digital clocks cannot be enlarged. There is the option of uploading a background image from the Alexa App, but you cannot adjust size or centering once it is uploaded.

The audio quality is much better than the Dot's, and is close to the full-sized Echo. In other words, the audio quality is GREAT!

I'm an Alexa developer, and can't wait to see what can be done with it once the SDK is updated. Overall, a very good device!

author: S. Detwiler
title: I love the Echo Spot

I do use it to listen to books regularly, and it sounds as good as the Bluetooth speaker I replaced.

I especially like that I can customize the clock face so that the time is not shining bright in my eyes as I'm sleeping.  The face also dims during times you specify at night, which is even better.  I've used it for listening to Audible books too, which is really great.  Love it!

I do like the Spot very much, my only con is that the rotating display with things to do with Alexa is really not necessary and should have a way to turn off but it is a good clock radio with so many more features than typical clock radios

For some reason Amazon does not allow you to play music from you’re Amazon Prime account unless you have the additional Amazon Music Unlimited subscription. This is just oddly inconvenient since I can stream Amazon Music from my iPhone or iPad.

author: Paulo
title: 5 stars
content: Nice little echo spot got it for free on cyber Monday when I bought my phone no complaints.

author: Kal
title: Compact functionality of the Dot, combined with the video capability of the Show
content:
A good addition to the Echo family that combines the compact functionality of the Dot and the video capabilities of the Show. I have mine on my desk, where it replaced a Dot. Although the audio is much better than the Dot's, I'm running the sound through my computer's speakers, since I listen to a lot of music. Stand-alone, the speaker on a par with an average laptop speaker.

Video calling works well. The screen is big enough for a decent view of the person on the other end, and those talking to me reported that they could see everything clearly. The Show is a better choice for those who want to watch longer videos, but the Spot is fine for news clips and similar short-form video. Being able to watch in letterbox or in "full screen" are good options.

Also, worth noting: The device's angle is perfect for viewing while sitting at a desk. I bought the stand, which works well, but it's not necessary.

author: mary ann D

content: I talk to Alexa more than I ever expected, she makes my to do list, gives me daily weather, answers questions, plays music and so much more. I think I need one for work now. I never thought I would Love Alexa so much !

author: Stuart
title: This is the sweet spot!
content: For me, the Spot is the sweet spot of the Echo devices.  I was originally using a Dot in my bedroom and decided to switch to the spot, and I am quite pleased. The speaker is substantially better than the Dot. I also find that it hears me better than the Dot. Since this is being used as an alarm clock, this is where the advantage over the Dot comes in to play. On the Dot, you can either search for the button to hush Alexa, or scream to Alexa to shut up because she doesn't hear well over the alarm.  The Echo Spot allows to you simply tap the screen anywhere for snooze. You can't miss.  You can also swipe up from the bottom to cancel the alarm. I also like "Show me the alarms" and I get a visual display on the screen of the pending alarms.  Play some music and the screen shows me the album art and lyrics of the song playing.  Ask Alexa "Where's my stuff" and I see photos of my items displayed as it reads me the status. The device feels very solid, well made.  I will say it didn't seem right to have to pay an additional $20 for the base that really should be in the box. The base definitely completes the package though and allows it to swivel.  I would suggest if you are looking at an Echo device for the bedroom, the Spot won't disappoint.

author: Cynthia Holzberger
title: EasyPeasy
content: Super easy to setup and use

author: Jeff Watters, Frankford, DE
title: Love it get yourself one
content: And absolutely perfect addition to my Echo Show. I have this Echo dot in my bedroom where I use it as an alarm clock, a source for music, and a picture frame which keeps a picture of my grandson. It does with the Echo Show does only smaller.

author: Yuliet gonzalez
title: I'm in love with Alexa omgggg we can't believe all the things ...
content: I'm in love with Alexa omgggg we can't believe all the things you can do with her my kids love it they have me crazy with the baby shark music lol I will buy again

author: SH
title: Great with one complaint
content: I think this is the best version of the Echo.  My only complaint/gripe is that you cannot turn off the "things to try" home card.  It's really annoying since I consider myself an expert who doesn't need suggestions on how to best use my echo spot.

author: Eric
title: NOT A GOOD ALARM CLOCK
content: TERRIBLE as an alarm clock. EVERY device out there has the functionality to let you wake up to music except this one. All I want is Alexa to wake me up with a song and turn on my smartbulb automatically, and do so at different times for different days of the week, and somehow this device makes it impossible. Also, the Alexa app is super cumbersome, glitchy, and poorly designed in general. Amazon DEFINITELY needs to work on the alarm functionality. Customizability as far as clock faces and info displayed is also terrible. NO standout features, besides being a good-looking device.

author: Katherine Portz Pohlman
title: Overall, the Echo Spot didn’t disappoint
content: Amazon’s Echo Spot is quick to respond to requests, seems to be able to hear a little better than my Echo Dot, and even though the screen is small, the picture quality is better than I expected. I was hoping that the device would also play Netflix and other Subscription Videos, just like Fire TV Stick and tablet devices with Amazon Video; sadly this does not seem to be the case. The music and the Kindle Books’ text to speech capabilities worked great. I am just scratching the surface in testing out it’s other functions...Overall, it did not disappoint, especially for the price, and I would definitely recommend this device.

author: Robin
title: Personal Assistant
content: I love the Spot!

author: kim l fry
title: spot
content: The echo spot arrived on time it is made of good quality and I really enjoy using it I recommend this item

author: Zack
title: I love my amazon echo spot
content: I love my amazon echo spot.  I have it next to the bed, as it serves as my alarm clock every morning, not to mention can give me my flash briefing as I get ready for the day.  I like the different clock face options, and the speaker is very loud, much better speaker than the echo dots that I have.  These amazon devices are great, since getting my first one, I have been able to update things bit by bit, making my house smarter by the minute!

author: Eric K Nelson
title: Echo Spot meets most expectations!
content: I like our new Echo Spot - it is the first device like this I have had.  It is great for phone calls with the kids or grandkids and for getting weather updates, etc.  Have tried setting up with my TV but still having issues there.  I can change the volume and shut off the TV but cannot turn it on or change channel.  Maybe user error so still trying.  All in all very satisfied

author: Chad Cardinal
title: Love this thing
content: Love this thing.  Now I have a smart house,  everything, even my personal weather station is on voice commmand.  Perfect addition to my evil lair.  Bwahaha ha.

author: Jamiiee
title: Not worth the money
content: Hate it expensive for no reason super tiny and service sucks on it its constantly going in and out and i had no problems at all with the echo dot also the speaker is already making crackling noise if your going to spend the money because of the screen i would honestly  just get the echo show

author: D808
title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!!!!!!
content:
Updated this review to include and ongoing issue that has plagued the shows and spots since 2017.  Screen flicker, Google it. Amazon continues to sell this broken product. Buyer beware DO NOT BUY!!!
Also this surprise from AMAZON on Christmas!  I purchased two echo spots as christmas gifts for my nephews.  Yesterday 12/27 I get an email saying my Echo Spot has been activated on my account.  Amazon activated the devices on my account without my authorization!  I contacted support and they explained that I didn't select "this item is a gift" on check out which caused the problem.  So apparently if you do not select "this item is a gift" before check out then your device comes ready to be activated without needing any authorization password or email.  This is a real concern as what if a thief stole my package, activated the device and made purchases!  Honestly with all our digital information these large companies like Amazon, Fb, etc. have.  You would think they would treat your information with the responsibility it deserves.  I'm not going to give AMAZON products as gifts from now on and recommend the same for anyone thinking of purchasing an AMAZON device as a gift.

author: paratwa
title: People like me just want an echo type alarm clock
content:
Amazon, get rid of the camera for goodness sake! People like me just want an echo type alarm clock. Don't want video, don't want weather forecast, don't want  news feeds.

I just wanted to see the time, wake me up and be able to adjust my thermostat and turn the lights on and off.

Get rid of all the other features and this would be perfect. Oh, and lower the price to around $40.

author: Rosebud
title: I enjoy playing the music
content: Really enjoying the Echo, love the good morning trivia. I enjoy playing my music. Chatting with my husband from his office. But there's still a lot of bugs in it. It still needs to be fine-tuned. Looking forward to the Future Days

author: LadyRichards
title: It was for my teens' rooms.
content: The teens enjoy it and can now have now excuses for not setting an alarm for each morning. I'm pretty sure I'll be getting another.  We upgraded the music subscription to Unlimited and they stream for hours on both of their Spots.

author: Amazon Customer
title: best purchase
content: works well with the ring. i keep it in me room.and have the alexa tower too.best purchase ever

author: shopster
title: Alexa is so smart!
content: Really enjoying the Echo Spot.  The music selection is great. I just say "Alexa where is my stuff?" and she tells me when my Amazon order will arrive!  Pretty cool!

author: Amazon Customer
title: It's adorable
content: I love it, you do have to download the alexis app to your phone or tablet to give it access to your calendar and such, however I am still discovering all the cool things it can do.

author: Nick In NC
title: A great addition
content:
I have become a huge fan of the Echo family of devices. Added the Spot on release day. I am using it as a replacement for my Dot/Wave radio combination. So far I love it. The sound is surprisingly full and robust, a huge improvement from the Dot's speaker (which I never used, always connect my Dot devices to older Bose Wave & Acoustomas radios to give them new life) The Spot has taken up residence on my nightstand and has been working much better than I had hoped. Use it to stream music, SXM and podcasts. The alarm has worked well, allowing us to wake up to the included alarm sounds or any media we chose. I has originally planned to pair the Show with a Bose Sound Link Mini, fearing I would need a more robust sound but that has not been necessary.
A great addition to my Echo lineup.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very nice display
content: Easy setup. I wish there were more alarm options. I never could get the alarm volume to work properly. To low

author: Gulliver Traveler
title: Don't Waste Your Money Unless You Want A Fancy Alarm Clock
content: Good for weather, time and jokes or selling you stuff on Amazon. Nothing else works as skills may work initially but then fail and don't work even after reinstalling them. Huge disappointment.

author: Christopher King
title: Sounds great
content:
The Echo Spot is a great addition to our family's electronics. It is easy to set up and use. It has the ability to play very softly or very loudly. I was impressed with how loud the volume goes.

Pros:
*Volume can be controlled manually or verbally
*Contains a huge selection of songs and gives you the option to listen to a sample and then purchase songs that aren't included
*Voice recognition works pretty well
*Can play amazon prime videos. The screen is small but the volume is good
*Has a "find my phone" feature
*Can pause, stop, or skip a song manually or with voice
*Has a subtitle feature so the words scroll down the screen

Cons:
*Echo responds any time Alexa is called. So, if I'm listening to a song and my child say's "Alexa" my song is interrupted and potentially overrided. A simple conversation about proper use with kids fixes this problem.
*Every time Alexa asks if we want to purchase a song we say 'no.' I'm not sure how easy it is to make accidental purchases.

Overall, I am very happy with the Echo Spot. It's a really nice way to listen to music quickly and its easy enough to use even kids can do it. I enjoy writing quality reviews. If you've found this review helpful, and you'd like to give me some encouragement, please click "yes" below.

author: bettina
title: Great product, bad app
content: I like the product it’s self, the speaker on it is great quality, and it’s pretty cool to have I the house. What they really need to imporove on is the app that goes along with this product. The app is slow, confusing and just doesn’t make much sense.

author: Nikki
title: I figured it would be perfect to monitor our cameras
content: I own the echo dot, but wanted to update for an echo with a screen. When I saw that the spot worked with Arlo, I figured it would be perfect to monitor our cameras. Unfortunately, it doesn't work. I linked Arlo with Alexa, but when you ask Alexa to show you the camera, the blue ring turns off, and nothing happens. After reading the reviews, seems everyone had that problem. I do like the size since it doesn't take up much space on my desk, and the sound quality is clear. My only complaint is that the cameras don't work. Other than that, it is a good device.

author: HAB
title: Does not work as expected!!
content: Does not work as an alarm correctly. I have been on the phone and on chat for hours now, two weeks of it. My spot when I use it as an alarm clock and have placed an alarm series in, weekdays, 6:30 a.m., Monday-Friday, when I go to physically dismiss the alarm by swiping up at dismiss on the face or when I ask Alexa to shut alarm, it does shut it but then proceeds to delete the alarm series, every single time since I let it go live. Customer service after 8 attempts finally told me last night that the verbal command does not work and will delete the alarms, it is being worked on by the developer, (the all powerful developer it seems?)? They told me to just use the UI or the swipe gesture. When I told them again for the 17th time that the swipe gesture for me did not work and deleted the series of alarms after it shut alarms, they said it was being worked on by the developer. When I said I have been told this 27 times and nobody is getting back to me and I purchased this mainly to use as a smart alarm clock and the verbal command and the physical UI swipe both should work and not delete the alarm series, again I am back to square one. Waiting for a week for them to get back to me now, if not will pack up and ship it back. Sad for $150 with the stand not to be able to use the spot as an alarm. Who would want to set it every night. My old dumb alarm was a heck of a lot smarter than spot and did not have an all powerful developer?? Very sad!!

author: Dorothy Tipre
title: Lots of "Sorry something went wrong" and "I don't know that.  Not working well and frustrating.
content: Between "I don't know that" and "Sorry something went wrong" I feel that I went wrong in buying this product.

author: Wende
title: Needs Improvement
content: I’m sorry I didn’t return this item. I don’t like the “things to try”.  There is no way to permanently shut it off and it’s very annoying. The sound quality is not as good as the Echo. I really would not recommend it.

author: tamara
title: I love these little gems!
content: I have an Echo Spot in my kitchen and my bedroom, and they're tied into my Ring.  I love these little things, I didn't think I would, but I use them for shopping lists, music, alarm, viewing my "front door" via Ring, they're so useful and so cute, the perfect small size for these rooms!

author: janet
title: ease of use
content: Got these for grandkids, I can talk to them from downstairs, they can talk to each other and the great Alexa ability they are used to having with their dots at their house.

author: J
title: You’ll love this!
content: I love the Echo Spot! It’s wonderful! I use this as an alarm clock regularly. I have also listened to TuneIn radio, Spotify, and watched a movie from my amazon prime account! I’ve asked it about the weather and items on my calendar. I’ve asked it to play specific songs from my amazon music account. The time display also changes to a night time lighting so as not to disturb you while you’re sleeping! However its lighting is clear enough for you to see if you wake up briefly in the middle of the night. I’m sure there are many other features I’ve not tried but will in the near future! It’s a very useful tool!

author: P. Y.
title: Good, but not the best.
content: It's cool, but the camera for a bedroom is creepy. I turned it off. And seems like more false positives, where Alexa just does something out of thin air.

author: Debbie W
title: Very educational and Fun
content: Was given as Christmas Gifts. Enjoyable, amazing, and fun loving

author: Cindy G.
title: Love it!
content: Using as an alarm clock and it is perfect size. Love the different clock faces to choose from.

author: Keith
title: Love the great picture
content: Easy to connect and use

author: R. Dittmer
title: Excellent. I think it doesn't hear my voice as ...
content: Excellent.  I think it doesn't hear my voice as well as the dot does though.

author: maxinminn
title: All that it promised
content: It's just what I needed for my downstairs den.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Bought if for my wife
content: My wife loves it! She uses it almost daily to “Drop In Video Chat” with her famlly especially to see her year old Grand Nephew. It is a great way to keep the family connected even though we are in Florida and they are in Michigan. She also has Alexa wake her up every morning and today I set up the lights with Philips Hue bulbs that she is going to love. The house of the future we imagined as kids is here and her name is “Alexa” the only thing that would make it better is if we could change her name.

author: Linda Gordon
title: ... looking for a clock that would be accurate and easy to use
content: I was looking for a clock that would be accurate and easy to use. This replaced an atomic clock that every time we lost power we had to find a signal for the clock to set to the right time. Also with each power loss the wake up station had to be reset. Using the Echo Spot is easy to use and I am a 69 year old grandmother.

author: Paul decaprio
title: i li like the spot
content: I like the spot much better than the tap

author: Dee N
title: Convenient
content:
I love it... have it placed in the den and as soon as I get home from work I have her (Alexa) play music while I change and cook.
Bought one for home and one as a gift!! It’s perfect.

author: Jocelyn
title: I freaking love this thing
content: I freaking love this thing. I use it for so many things: as a radio, news report, speaker, alarm, Siri, list maker, reminder, and  calendar. I think I like this even better than the first Amazon dot because of the super nice touch screen.  This is easily one of the best gifts that I have gotten in a long time. I would highly highly highly recommend buying this.

author: Mary Rogers
title: Love it
content: Love my Echo Spot!

author: Rachael
title: Must have for your home!
content: We’ve had ours for about a month. We are impressed! It’s a really cool device that I’m sure only gets better as you integrate more smart products into your home. The drop in feature is great for us because my husband is currently deployed. It allows him to drop in and talk to the kids and I whenever he’s available.

author: Clyde
title: Wife Loves It!
content: My wife loves it! She has a hard time going to sleep so the “play waves” command is awesome!

author: Michael Scragg
title: Screen could be better
content: It's not OLED, so the entire screen auto-dims a little too much at night.  I can barely see it.

author: Linda Montague
title: account settings
content: I have an echo but have not used it since my last move 9 months ago.  I received an echo spot for Christmas and have not been able to switch the single device music setting from the echo to the spot.  I have updated the account settings but still no luck getting the spot to play music.  I am paying for single device and the amount has been charged to the account even though it has not been used.  Now I would like music on the spot.  It shouldn't be this hard to do.

author: Jim Annett
title: Touch screen is an awesome improvement over Alexa Dot!
content: Too many features to consider. Video touch screen is the best feature, vastly better than the interaction we have had with the Dot. Amazing too is the ability to interact with Wemo, Pandora, etc. Great product, incredibly useful.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Cool gadget
content: This is an awesome gadget. My daughter loves playing games on it. I wish it had a couple better features but I'm still learning how to use it.

author: Amazon customer
title: Echo dot review
content:
Pretty basic, didn’t do as much as I expected it to. For ex, can adjust your tv - but only turning it on/off and volume settings. You can set up a shopping list but Alexa would not be able to
email or text it out. To play music, you have to purchase and sign up for a streaming app, but it isn’t compatible with YouTube Red which I already have a subscription for.  I am hoping that new updates will allow more features.

author: SKYLAR SIMMS
title: Can do with some updates!
content: Doest stream Pandora or Spotify unless you have a premium membership. Doesnt hear correctly or at all sometimes. Voice volume control should be numberex so you can say "Lower volume to 1/3/5" or something like that.

author: Jeremiah Wayne Johnson
title: Must purchase
content: The echo spot is simply amazing! So easy to use highly recommend!

author: Samantha Harding
title: Its good unless you have a BOSE Speaker
content: I have 4 dots, i wanted a spot for the kitchen. Initially i thought this was the best thing ever until i asked it the weather and it didnt respond! I figured out if i play music then stop the music to ask a question the answer does not come out of my connected Bose speaker! this is a major flaw in my opinion. I called Amazon who have not figured out why this does not work, i put my complaint in 7 months ago!  Apart from this major flaw its great, but if you play lots of music and have a bose speaker, this may not be for you.

author: JD
title: It works well, as expected.  The sound is OK.
content: IT works well.  I like it much better than the Echo Dot.  It sounds nicer, but not as good as either the 1st or 2nd generation Echo.  I recommend getting the screen protector with these that lets you blackout the camera.  You can use the software to do this, but we all know that software gets hacked.

author: J Lakits
title: Simple and Reliable
content: At first I was skeptical, but now I couldn't imagine life without one of these lil bad boys. This lil Echo Spot is responsible for me waking up on time to go to work, controlling household appliances, and having fun with my friends when I'm bored. The only downside is that sometimes it feels like a simple novelty when my phone can do most of the same things the Spot can do. On the upside, most phone batteries tend to drain fast and sometimes I forget, or don't feel like charging it.

author: Debbie Cook
title: Husband loves it!!!
content: Bought this for my husband.  He didn’t realize it did videos and would play audio books and music with lyrics.  He loves it!

author: Lonely
title: I gave this one star because It’s the lowest you can go. Very unhappy
content: This doesn’t work like shown on tv. They make it look like you can set it up and mail it to someone and all they have to do is plug it in. Then say “Alexa call home”. That’s not the case at all. They also did not tell me that the recipient had to have a cell phone to use it. The advertising is very misleading and it took days with Amazon support for them to FINALLY tell me that it would not work for us!!!  I’m happy that I could send the 2 back. So al least there’s that going for it. I don’t want a gadget in my home that is spying on me either and the latest news is very alarming as a consumer.

author: eddie
title: Dont pass up the chance to have this gadget
content: Great edition to our household... fun and easy to use... must have

author: David A  Robarts
title: Device Is Not Useful
content: I have had the device for a few months now, hoping I would use it, but it does not serve a single useful purpose. It allows for video chat, but no one owns one or wants to chat on it when they have facetime. It shows the weather, but so does every other device I own. The default ringtones for alarms are terrible (sharknado warnings, really?), so unless you subscribe to a music program, this function is terrible as well. The only people who would benefit from this product are those who have interconnected devices such as lights and locks that are just too lazy to turn them off themselves. Please do not waste your money on this product.

author: Dwreuter
title: Good item, but..
content: I love the look and for the size the sound is good also... but the is no alarm clock on this item, I can not set a repeat alarm to go off Monday - Friday in the AM, without setting it the night before.

author: Doris
title: but that was easy and free to do
content: This item is greater than I expected.  You need to add skills to it, but that was easy and free to do.

author: Alice M. Grove
title: Versatile and Attractive and Fun
content: I love my Echo Spot!  As time goes on I continually find new features I can use.  I just discovered that it can take pictures with it.  The sound quality is excellent.  It is attractive and the screen gives clear images.  There is so much you can use....weather, radio stations from all over the country, traffic.  The customer support is excellent and they have give quick and accurate information.  This is such a versatile  addition to my home.  I constantly wonder what I did before I had it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love the spot
content: Love the spot, we have 3 other echos in the house and this by far my favorite feature wise.  The only thing is the built in speaker is nowhere near as good as the Echo however, I connect to the soundbar via Bluetooth so no issues there.

author: Ryan C.
title: Perfect for Kitchen
content: Upgraded our Dot to this. Great experience so far. Our kids play music all the time and the lyrics scroll across the screen which they like. The device is in our kitchen and is used a lot. I hope to connect this to the ring doorbell.

author: lakevillan
title: Good speakers
content: Nice modern look, wish it would stay only on the clock though, even without circulating display it still goes to the “thing you can try” screen occasionally (usually at the exact second I want to see the time!).

author: Crystal Trowbridge
title: Love the spot
content: Love the spot.  Was a perfect addition to other non-main rooms where I was not using my main Show.  Connected easily.  Family is enjoying it.

author: Nanz
title: You hear that echo
content: Echo spot is awesome. Got myself a relatively smart house. Alexa is cool and people can facetime from the echo. Its pretty neat. I've really enjoyed it. When I'm bored I ask it various questions and while it usually doesn't know.. when it does know a question...it's deep.

author: hawk
title: I like it
content: It’s use is limited but it make a greAt alarm clock and works well as an alarm. It also is fairly good at reminders but I wish it was a little louder. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase.

author: Paul C Suter
title: Good video
content: Works as expected nice videos. I use it mostly for recipes and music  love it.

author: Sojum
title: Allow LAN music streaming or bring back Amazon storage
content:
Wish it used a USB charging cable like the Dot. No battery for power failures, so I still have to use my cellphone alarm as a backup. No additional clock functions either - where's a timer or a stopwatch? Alexa already does these audibly - show them! Excellent selection of clock faces so far though, and the screen adds just the right touch to make it feel like a worthy successor to Dot.

Now, if Amazon would get their sh&t together and allow streaming of music from a LAN server, we'd hit 5 stars. Especially now that they have eliminated the ability to upload music to Amazon storage - that was the ONE way I could play my music through Alexa.

author: WR8
title: All thumbs, use a stylus
content:
Ordered and shipped this to my dad. He already has echo and echo dot but I like the fact this has a screen but smaller and less expensive than amazon show. Setup was a chore. Me dad had a difficult time with the touchscreen. Maybe it’s his chubby fingers but he has no issue texting on his iPhone. After several attempts, I was observing FaceTime, he finally made it through the WiFi password entry,email entry and password. He’s currently enjoying it in his bedroom and the echo dot has moved to the garage, replacing the radio.
P. S. I have ordered him a stylus, in case he needs to make any updates to the spot.

author: Fabio A.
title: Best Voice Recognition Ability...
content: Love it. Use it all the time. Wish there was more skills, but nevertheless a great voice recognition ability compared to other devices.

author: David
title: Works well
content: Works well just wish I could access the camera and use it to watch my baby when he naps

author: Eduardo Angeles
title: Good, but needs firmware update to fix bugs
content: The echo dot seems like a better product.  I like the Spot, but I have to restart it very often, because the voice speed and music tempo slows down overtime as if Alexa gets tired. It is annoying because one morning music will wake me but it is at an annoying slowed down tempo.... so after the restart, the speech speed and music speed are back to normal.  The echo dot doesn’t have this issue.  Other than that, I hope the next update fixes this and improves on overall experience.  I feel like this device can do so much more than what it does at the moment...

author: Bodach
title: My Favorite Alexa Device
content: like many people, I'm using my Spot as a bedside clock. I love my spot. It is paired with my Bose Revolve+ and I listen to flash briefing each morning and music each night. I appreciate the clock and the visual reminders. I do sometimes watch the CNN briefing video, however, my favorite video function is accessing my Arlo surveillance cameras. The Spot is certainly my most used and useful Alexa device. I highly recommend it.

author: gknucks
title: It's 2018, no smart device should not know the answer to anything!
content: Works well for dropping in on my kids when I'm at work but,  I could also use my cell... What's disappointing is Alexa doesn't know the answers to simple requests,  like what sound does a train make or give me flight information. My smart phone with Google does so much better. Why isn't she programmed to research these things instead of saying,  sorry,  I don't know...It's 2018, no smart device should not know anything!

author: JazzieJJ
title: Great
content: This was my second dot. Love adding them around the house. Easy setup and use. Sound is not very good so I would add a good Bluetooth speaker

author: Alex Engels
title: Amazing
content: I absolutely love my Echo Spot. It is an amazing product and I don't know what I would do without mine. It is amazingly useful for all of my music, entertainment, alarm clock, sound machine, and Fire TV controlling needs.

author: Mr. Sensitive
title: "Things to Try" Ad Sucks
content: "Things to Try" fills the screen after you change a setting or give it a command.  None of the suggested settings disables it.  Unbelievable that they won't allow that "feature" to be turned off.  It's a good wifi clock, but I'm too irritated with it to write about the other aspects.  I don't know why others give 5 star reviews when something so easily addressed remains an issue.  I received two as gifts.

author: AppleSaucy
title: Great alarm clock
content: It works great as an alarm clock, definitely better than the Echo Dot in terms of displaying info. such as the weather and your calendar.  The screen is nonetheless too small for viewing videos.  Like the Dot, you would need to connect the Spot to some real speakers if you want to enjoy high quality sound experience.  Other than that, it does an excellent job as an alarm clock.

author: Eugene
title: I don't know why I like it, but I do
content: I don't know why I like it, but I do. It's like an all-in-one alarm clock.  If you have other alexa devices, you know what it is.  If you are looking to get an alarm clock, this is the one to get (yes, its much more than that).  It shows you the time, it shows you the weather, its touch screen, it shows you music lyrics, and it does all the things your typical alexa device does.  It's quite loud for its size as well (sound way better than echo dot).  It also does video calling, which is pretty awesome.  The viewing angle is great, so even if its sitting fairly high up, you can still see the display well enough.

author: Dhaynes10
title: Echo is Spot on.
content: So very convenient to play music, and get basic information. Inexpensive version. Love it !

author: nelson atwell
title: The hardware is nice, but Alexa is a bit stupid
content: The hardware is nice, but Alexa is a bit stupid. She likes to default to "tomorrow" when she doesn't understand the date for an appointment, which is pretty annoying.  The skills are nice, but the list of them is a bit disorganized, so it is hit and miss if you find something useful.

author: RickC From Boston
title: Great addition
content: Works great with all Alexa and Ring Doorbell

author: Amazon Customer
title: Okay, but more limited than I expected
content: Like it, but it is useless without wifi. I can't even ask the time. Also it does have limitations on software. But it's good for music and miscellany.

author: coach
title: Lots of fun!
content: We love our spot. I have it in our kitchen and have enjoyed listening to music - I have used it to remind me of appointments and to answer questions when we need information.

author: Gaby
title: It’s a nice gadget...if you don’t mind Big Brother!
content: While I am aware of privacy concerns from other customers and the recording of video and audio from ones home, this doesn’t bother me that much since Big Brother is always watching. Alexa is a cool gadget with lots of potential. I am pleased with the product.

author: james theodore
title: Works great
content: We use it everyday

author: H. Drallmeyer
title: Alarm clock sounds awesome.
content: Immensely useful. Great sounding speaker for it's size. Nice little gadget.

author: bug
title: Don’t share with the kids lol
content: I love it.  It does everything I need it to!  I can call my daughter, set my alarms, touch screen, and listen to my music while in the shower!

author: Terrible Terry
title: Best nightable accessory on the market
content: How did I ever get along without this little assistant.  I bought the show for the living room and this little baby to go on the night table  Love, love, love it

author: Jim E. Walsh
title: Overall a Winner
content: More Positive comments than negative- Wish it was "slightly" bigger.  thus the screen was bigger and perhaps a better speaker.  Overall though- I'm pretty impressed.  My guess is the next generation of this will be stunning.

author: Roger T DeAngelis III
title: Nice, but disappointing
content:
This is a nice bedside or desktop clock with Alexa functionality.  However, I find it a bit disappointing and underwhelming.

For having a nice, clear, lovely little touchscreen, you'd think it would have SO much more functionality of things you'd love it to be able to do.  It does not. At ALL.  While there are many clock faces to choose from, you can't really set it to display the info you want, how you want it.  For me, it seems like it should be simple and obvious that I should be able to have a full date and time display showing and in whatever format I like.  M/D/Y or Month, Day, Year, or whatever I want.  It has no option for ANY of this.

Next, theres no calendar display.  Like *actual* calendar display.  This seems like an obvious thing to have on a touchscreen clock, but it's not there.  There is a list of upcoming events which scrolls one day at a time, which is fine, but there's no way to just see where you are in the week or month at a glance.

What I am forcibly treated to instead are things I don't want.  Why does the clock scroll through all it's screens when I hear me walk into the room?  I have the scrolling turned off, and I don't want this, and yet here we are.  I want the *time* to be what's displayed when I walk in.  Why do I have to wait for it to scroll through all the things I didn't ask for to see that.  I'm also treated continually to the "Things to try" screen, which I don't want and am not allowed to turn off.  Why?

So in the end, Google is gonna make their own version of this, and irs probably gonna be a lot better in terms of providing the customizableness and functions you really want, and doing it right.  I WANT to like this sleek little clock more, it IS a sexy little orb which seems like it could have so much better potential... I DO like it as a simple desktop clock.  I just wish I hadn't spent $100+ for something that doesn't really live up to the ideal.

author: rudy
title: Sound is pretty good but quality of picture from camera is just fair
content: The video calling feature is a great feature.

author: Mauricio Arguello
title: The best
content: It is very helpfull, and woks great.

author: Roselyn
title: my only disappointment is it doesn't connect with apple music and it ...
content: my only disappointment is it doesn't connect with apple music and it doesn't connect to youtube. it does connect to Pandora but you don't have the option of editing your Pandora station unless you subscribe, as well as amazon music. it had potential just wish it was a little more universal

author: threejams
title: Cool device. Love the Drop-in feature
content: Cool device.  Love the Drop-in feature.  Sound is good as well.

author: M. Johnson

It can also be used as a bluetooth speaker, the quality of the sound isn't something that would drop your jaw but it's good enough. I usually pair mine up with the echo to provide a better surround sound.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Easy to use

author: Amazon Customer
title: Too small
content: I returned  this product it was way smaller than I anticipated.  The echo show is way better I use is at my job, but I just don’t want to spend that kind of money so I bought the echo spot and was disappointed with the display.

title: One Star
content: Very small' poor screen (dark) expensive for the featurs

author: Dpackard

author: BallaghMan

content: I like it.  Takes a bit of getting used to but replaces the old alarm clock radio nicely, and is programmable with the alexa APP.

author: SmokeeJoe
title: Gift for Grandma!
content: The Echo Spot was a gift from our children for their mother, who lives in a long-term care facility.  The Echo makes talking with the children and grandchildren easier.  That was the main purpose for the Echo.

author: Dianne M.
title: LOVE these!!
content: I will say I think they are over priced at $129. I think $80 would be a fair price. I have two now as I purchased on for my mom for Christmas without realizing it would be here way after so I finally found a remaining one at my local Fred Meyer, tried to return the one on Amazon without realizing it came with another device as a promotion so I can't return it. Well, that means I now have an extra spot for myself and I'm pleased. I do enjoy seeing a screen and think my collection is now complete sans car alexa I'm still hoping to buy. The sound quality is great.

author: Dayron
title: Todo
content: Increíble , es uno de los mejores productos que e comprado en Amazon , el táctil es muy agradable, la nitidez de la pantalla magnífica, la interacción es muy fluida y te muestra a la ves imágenes en la pantalla, no le doy un 5 porque carece de algunas informaciones como por ejemplo buscar un ticket de vuelo específico que Google home si lo da.

author: Ryan W.
title: Great and fun device!
content: This is a great product and my favorite Echo device. The screen is the perfect size to have by the bed and shows information in a beautiful format. The microphone is sensitive and accurately captures when I Say "Alexa." The speakers aren't world class, but they're good for the use. Having a camera in the bedroom is a little strange, but I just cover that with tape.

author: Amazon Customer
title: She doesn't respond to "Alexa" as well as a Dot.
content: Title-- She doesn't respond to "Alexa" as well as a Dot. I need to practically yell "ALEXA!!" for her to hear me. Whereas with my previous echo dot, I could simply say "Alexa" in my normal voice and she'd start listening. It's really annoying to adjust to the new one.

author: Lindakoy
title: Needs the stand to use the camera
content: Pretty neat little device, and it feels much more useful with the display than my original echo.  However, they should have included the stand, or designed it so that it you can adjust the camera location.  The camera is unusable without being about to adjust it.

author: W. Phelps
title: Do not trust Alexa's alarm to wake you up
content: Do not trust this as an alarm clock!  Last night I said "Alexa wake me up at 6:30 am" and she responded "Alarm set for 6:30 am Tuesday".  This morning I was lucky, I woke up at 6:32.  Alexa NEVER activated the alarm.  I checked the log and it is there.  Not good.

author: Christine Maki
title: Love this Echo option
content: Love this Echo option! Sound beats the Dot, and screen options, such as a clock face, videos and song lyrics, enhance the experience.

author: Bud
title: Fun and useful!
content: Makes a great clock that dims at night or when ever you want. Lots of great features and looks good.

author: Henry J. Schaumburger
title: Simply Phenomenal
content: Wow! The Amazon Echo Spot is fantastic. It replaced my alarm clock, radio, and first generation Amazon Alexa. The screen is small, but very useful and easy to read. The speaker is strong and plenty loud enough for my bedroom. My Device came bundled with an electric switch, so it can control my night stand light. I’m very impressed with the quality of the Spot and the almost limitless things it can do. I have not used the built in camera, but that may come in handy in the future. You can even write your own skills if you want.

author: Spohrrrr
title: Where has this been all my life?
content: Why didn’t I get this sooner? It’s so sleek and small and perfect for my computer desk for a cute little clock! You can personally customize it and they have many options for style as well! Alexa is always amazing. I can’t wait to slowly turn my home into a smart home! I have it set up where it tells me my traffic route to work and the weather for the week and also fun interesting fact! Why did I wait for long to start getting echos?????

author: J. Paull
title: Replaced the original Echo in my bedroom
content: Works great, there is enough reviews about this product. Does everything it is supposed to and has loud enough sound and good sound quality. I had previously used the 1st generation Echo in my bedroom, I switched it with this model so I can see the weather and clock.

author: Chase Hill
title: Can’t Turn Off Things To Try
content: I would love this but there is no way to stop the screen from constantly scrolling through “things to try”. If Amazon would make this a setting I would change my review to 5 stars.

author: Jason L. Baucom
title: Nice alarm clock with a useless camera.
content:
I own the Alexa, Dot and the Spot. I was excited to receive this as a gift. Of the 3 Echo's I have the Spot is my least favorite.

First off, it has a built in camera. Why can't I access the camera via my Alexa App? I assume to be forced to buy the more expensive camera's. It's basically useless, for me at least. And $20 for the plastic stand? Really?
I have photo's uploaded to my Amazon account. The photos don't look that great in the background of the screen. Also they don't rotate much at all.
Streaming video on the device is useless. Very limited in what you can actually do with the screen. Basically it's an alarm clock with limited styles to choose from for the clock font. It's not like can use it with iPhone Facetime which I kinda hoped for.

I was hoping this thing would blow me away but I'm very disappointed. Amazon also has decided to remove storage space from it's loyal prime members and start charging like $7.99 a month for it. Not happy about that either.

I was really hoping this thing would rock and have all kinds of uses with the screen. I basically put it in my room. Don't use it except for the clock. maybe they'll update the software to do some better things. But for now it's just an expensive alarm clock. My Echo does rule the house still! And the Dot is on my back porch and makes for nice background music. The Spot is being neglected. Grounded until it can finally do something worth while. And the support isn't all that good too. If I'm missing something cool please let me know. I would love to love my Spot.

author: Lynn V.
title: Love Alexa!
content: We use it all the time for music news etc it’s great!

author: Amazon Customer
title: LOVE!
content: I got this to replace the echo dot in my bedroom. It's a very attractive little device and the sound quality is 10xs better than the dot!

author: Freda
title: Hear "Spot"!
content: Received Echo Spot about a week and a half ago.  Love this Echo more than regular Alexa (sorry Alexa).  Echo Spot has all of Alexa's talent and bit more with her tiny screen.  Next to the bed while I had the flu, Spot was entertaining with little snippits that could be activated to watch or roll on to weather, etc.  The clock is visible, but dims when the lights go out in the room so that it will not keep one awake.  Thank you, Amazon.

author: ABCruz
title: Great to SEE responses as well as hear them!
content: Nice visual version of the Echo. Great to 'see' some responses as well as hear them. I look forward to see what future skills and abilities the Spot will get!

author: Hank Fu
title: Five Stars
content: Bought if for my 9 year old's birthday.  She loves it.

author: B. Jennings
title: Video Chate
content: I use it to video chat with my 3.5 yr old grandson.  It would be great if there were interactive games we could play together while we chatted, but I haven't found any.  Today at his younger sister's birthday party, it kept the older kids busy asking Alexa questions.  The best were when Alexa misunderstood.

author: Amazon Customer

content: I bought the Echo spot to integrate it with the Wyze cam but unfortunately I am told that the skill has not been enabled at India and the Alexa customer support/ development teams has no answer as to when they can enable the skill. Be careful when you buy products which do not have international support . Now using it like a expensive clock

author: Wally
title: Sky is the limit when you use this product.
content: Works nice. Still learning it.

author: Paul W.
title: Needs major update.
content: Many times has trouble responding and lost connection. Very slow compared to Echo and Dot. I have 5 throughout the house and the Spot is the only one we have issues with. Have to constantly unplug and reboot.

author: Justin B.
title: Very cool
content: I was a bit hesitant to buy this, i mainly use it for the alarm clock feature. I will say though since i started using it, i have been waking up at the sound of the alarm. Its the first thing thats worked so i cant complain. Its also a very cool gadget just to mess around with.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Amazon Music not working on Echo Spot
content: Crap! I bought this because it was advertised that I could access Amazon Music with my Amazon Prime account. But apparently I cannot because I don't have a US Cr Card.  Piece of crap.

author: Jamie
title: This thing is pretty cool. It makes for the perfect alarm clock ...
content: This thing is pretty cool. It makes for the perfect alarm clock on my nightstand. Yes, I know there is a camera. If someone wants to hack into my spot and see me snoring, I’m fine with that. I’m sold on everything Alexa now. Finding new skills is an adventure kinda. Lol

author: Ray
title: Five Stars
content: This is an absolutely wonderful invention it's really nice to just ask something out loud and get an answer

author: chibs
title: The only thing that annoys me is the stupid "Things To Try" card that you can't disable
content: Overall It's OK. It's a slight upgrade from the dot. The only thing that annoys me is the stupid "Things To Try" card that you can't disable. I just want to see my clock, weather, and notifications. Why do they make it so you can't disable the annoying "Things To Try" card. If we wanted to know these useless tips we could do a search online or open the Alexa app.

author: DWehrhahn
title: AMAZING
content: Very proud I bought this item.  It works awesomely and has very nice sound.  10/10 would 100% recommend!!

author: Rachel N
title: Very addicting love Alexa
content: I love this. Alexa is my new beat friend. Great alarm clock. Tells the weather traffic and sooo much more

author: Scott Knobloch
title: Junk
content: After playing this POS. I wonder if amazon could even design a cardboard box.

author: TA
title: A Handy Gadget!
content: Great little contraption; I love waking to my own music channels; displaying words to songs, obtaining the weather, etc. Wish the print on screen was larger/brighter for these aging eyes. I have Amazon Echo's all over the house and they will work together if set up correctly. I take this with me when I travel to enjoy the perks.

author: Arman Chowdhury
title: Could not connect to any other smart device.
content: Could not get the echo to use any other previously connected smart device - not the lights, nor the plugs, nor the speakers. Was connected to the same network, reset it twice, updated it - all absolutely for nothing. Very disappointed, relegated just to a glorified alarm clock now.

author: JW
title: Five Stars
content: Love this thing!!!!!

author: anna
title: Was a gift
content: No complaints

author: JohnG
title: Nice Device
content: Installed the Echo Spot about a week ago and it works well.  We uploaded about 20 photos for rotating clock backgrounds.  Nice feature!  The biggest negative for this device is the lack of an option to turn off the 'Things to try' screen.  Many reviewers complain about this.  I do not want this screen.  I will never give the Echo Spot a five star rating until this screen is gone.  What's the problem, Amazon??

author: MomOf2Boys
title: Favorite Echo Device for my Bedside!
content:
This may be my favorite echo product thus far (I have owned them all)!  I have had it for a few months now so I feel like I can now give a solid review.

I am a mom so I love being able to ask for my ‘to-do’ list and SEE it so I can either add to it or check stuff off at night...and in the morning.  We also have Nest cameras and a ring doorbell so I can see all from my bedside.  I can ask for reminders or alarms to be set without having to move from bed (Moms understand this struggle).  Want to set the mood for sexy time?!?! Alexa can do that!  On this topic...you can block this device from the drop in feature!

I love that it senses when to go into night mode (aka just shows time and stays dark for good sleep).

By far my favorite thing has been pairing it with a smart plug for the lights in our bedroom!!!! Our bed is super high and far from our lights so it was always a pain to be reading errrr doing stuff before bed and have to get up to turn off lights ;)!

My only negative, which really isn’t a fault I thing they would be able to anything about is it has a hard time hearing me say the wake word when our noise machine is on.  Again I understand it’s more of my fault for using them together but since noise machines are common I figured I would mention it.

author: PrimeBuyer
title: Disappointing
content: I like that it is an Echo and will do all the other things an ordinary dot will do. I don't like the constant cycling. I bought this to be my bedside clock. The digital display is way too small to be seen. The analog clock is better when you can see it. It is not too bright for a bedroom.

author: Dr. Frank A. Salamone Sr.
title: Great value and fun
content: Great product. Range of use. Only problem is that at times Alexa does not understand

author: Sandra G.
title: Staying in Touch
content: I am enamored by the fact my grands can operate Echo without a thought; on second thought; with a thought to stay in touch with me...(smile) Even for me, ole school, it's just so simple and nice to see whom I'm speaking with...

author: Felix, Trinidad
title: Cool gadget
content: I only have one problem with Alexa sometimes she doesn't understand my Trini accent and does something completely different to what I ask her, but otherwise great company.

author: R. Peary
title: Hard to set up
content: Works same as echo dot. I find it harder to get set up to operate lights and so on. STILL don't have it working but problem is with plugs.  Will update again later.

author: MEG_SKWAREK
title: ... first Alexa product I bought and I am absolutely pleased with the Spot
content: This is the first Alexa product I bought and I am absolutely pleased with the Spot! It’s the best alarm I have ever had, so easy to set, no knobs to turn....no risk of setting it for PM instead of AM! Plus, you can play music, get weather, and so much more! Price is low for everything this awesome product can do!

author: Denise Krueger
title: It sounds great!
content: I like pretty much the same as the Echo original except this one has way better sound, especially if you are playing music.

author: Beach
title: I am disappointed. It should have far more capabilities for the ...
content: I am disappointed. It should have far more capabilities for the cost. I am a tech junkie so I just had to have this. My suggestion is to buy family members a spot so you will get more use out of it. I am sending one to my grandchildren.

author: Lucia
title: Use as alarm clock and radio
content: I mainly use my Echo spot as an alarm clock and a radio, and to check the weather and news updates when I am getting ready. I have it in the bedroom so usually have the camera covered. The sound quality is good for listening to music and the options for music and radio are plenty, I like fairly alternative music and BBC Radio 6 is great. The main use of the screen has been for clock faces, and I have different photos in the background, and it is easy to see without being glaring at night. I also have 4 Echo dots and the Echo Plus in various places around the house, the spot is perfect for how I am using it compared to my other models.

author: Kevin R. Bartoe
title: Great Home Assistant!
content: Overall, very impressed with the Echo Spot.  The only thing I don't understand is why it won't sync with my other Echo Dots for "whole-house" music.  That one simple capability escapes me.  Other than that, has worked wonderfully and as advertised.  Thank you Amazon.

author: Amazon Customer
title: You need to download the system and then sync everything from your phone to the in order for it to learn and work.
content: I receive this for my birthday. It is an incredible item where I can listen to music and plays the words on a screen I can be in the kitchen ask for recipe prints it up for me. Made my shopping list never have to be written down again. When combined with the ring for the front door just products awesome.

author: Cool Daddy
title: Fantastic!
content: We love our Echo Spots! We have two of them and they are used everyday. Works with our Ring doorbell as well.

author: jltirone
title: I’m in love! I love how it doubles as an alarm ...
content: I’m in love! I love how it doubles as an alarm clock. I love the good morning feature and different clock faces. Has great sound when playing music. I use it constantly.

author: K . Stew
title: Great for the kitchen can use it for a timer
content: Great for the kitchen can use it for a timer, ask it to tell you a joke while you are cooking, does all that u ask . Real nice and compact.

author: Michael Bender
title: Great for your nightstand or kitchen counter
content: I love these things. I have a few around the house and have replaced my older Echo Show - White with these. It turns out that no one at home ever wanted to watch videos on the Echo Show so having a large screen taking up counter space didn't make any sense. The Echo Spot is a perfect size for my kitchen counter and bedroom nightstand. Amazon recently fixed a serious Bluetooth bug where the Echo Spot would stop responding to the wake word if it was paired with a TROND TV Bluetooth Transmitter and Receiver, Digital Optical TOSLINK and 3.5mm Wireless Audio Adapter (AptX Low Latency for both TX and RX, Pair with 2 Devices Simultaneously) (kudos to Amazon Echo firmware engineers!) and now these are rock solid.

author: Karen
title: I love, love, love it!
content: Okay, I have the very first Echo, a Spot and a Show. I had a hard time convincing myself I needed/wanted the Spot. I keep the Echo in the bedroom because I wake often in the night and want to know what time it is but don't like a lighted clock in the room. And, I go to sleep listening to music. The Spot then didn't appeal as a clock. The Show is on the kitchen table for phone/TV replacement, etc. Dot is in laundry room because it has the lowest quality sound. So, I put the Spot on the end table next to my recliner. I use it for so many things I wonder why I didn't jump on it the day it came out! It also has better sound than the Dot.

author: Mukaking
title: Beautiful with one flaw
content:
Just wanted to say I received one as a company holiday gift and i had zero expectations going in.

Its really very beautiful. The screen looks awesome and is very responsive. Alexa responds quickly and accurately as expected. I have no complaints at all. Its a really great device.

It loses one star because you cant turn off the "Things to Try" suggestions. I dont know if this was done to prevent "burn-in" on the screen, but all i want to do is maintain the time and weather on the screen. I dont need a constant suggestion of commands i should try.

Please remove this. If you need to prevent burn-in put in some kind of movement in a different way. I hate it.

author: doyouhearwhatihear
title: Best Christmas buy!
content: Love, love, love our Echo Spot. It’s our first Alexa-enabled product. We’re hooked. It’s a total hit for the whole family. We listen to a lot of music. The ability to see the lyrics is a fabulous feature.

author: carmen del aguila
title: The best price!
content: My son love it!

author: Gadget Man
title: Screen to small for daily use.
content: Because the screen is too small I just use it as a regular Alexa device.

author: Duane Pinkerton
title: Almost perfect!
content: I really like my echo spot.  I use it every day, and appreciate the song lyrics when I play amazon music.  My only feedback/suggestion is that it would be better with an OLED display that didn't need a backlight.  The setting where it's bright enough to see the time lets a fair amount of backlighting glow through.

author: Khem
title: Was Hesitant about Alexa, but Now I LOVE IT!!!
content: Wasn't so sure about bringing "smart technology" into my home, but I'm hooked! I love the sleek look of the Echo Spot on my nightstand and how easy it was to set up and use. I also love that it scrolls the news, local weather, and give suggestions of what to ask Alexa. I use this as my alarm clock, speaker, and have it sync'd with the Etekcity Voltson Wi-Fi Smart Plugs to control the lighting in my apartment.

author: Christine DaCosta
title: Five Stars
content: Love the spot great for calling and seeing people and news updates. Also linked to calender.

author: Alex F Smiley
title: Echo Spot Using
content: having problems getting to know the commands and how to get the echo dot to respond to the expected result

author: Jy
title: Spot sound and camera
content: The sound quality in the spot is great very similar to the original echo. The plus side is it has a screen with built in camera for video communication I just love it.

author: kim
title: Very cool product!
content: We enjoy this so much I ordered 2!

author: Justin Baugh
title: Not very impressed
content: Not a huge fan... The speaker is not at all what i expected.. I just received the dot 3rd gen and The speaker is waaay better..  The screen is very small. It is better for say bedroom or bathroom. The drop in feature taskes a while before the camera gives a clear picture.. Overall not very satisfied. I probably will look into getting the show and giving this to my kids or putting it in the bedroom. Hopefully the show will live up to my expectations

author: CapnCaveman
title: Perfect for certain roles.
content: I have the original Echo gen.1 and the Echo show, both of which I like quite a lot, but  there's something about this one that I love.  While the others have better sound quality, and the show has a much larger screen, the spot it more stylish and perfect for a bedroom alarm clock or as a voice activated assistant in a room that demands good looks.  While a good Bluetooth speaker could fill the shoes of the original Echo and adding a kindle to a speaker or an echo actually outshines the Echo show due to app limitations, the Echo Spot fills a niche that the others, and no combination that I know of, just can't touch.

author: Erik Schubach
title: Good device but annoying...
content: The Spot has a lot of promise and is superior to the Dot, but there is one glaring annoyance with the device.  If you want to have the device alternate between the time and weather, you must also suffer through the tips screen which is just advertisements to the things to try with the Spot.  You can't turn off just that information on the home screen.  The only two choices are to let it cycle through all the cards once to show each only one time and then only showing the current time, or leave it on perpetual cycle and have a home screen that is useless 1/3 of the time.

author: sean f mccoy
title: We really like this. I received it for Mother’s Day
content: We really like this.  I received it for Mother’s Day.  Planning on purchasing another one.

author: Mauricio
title: A cool stylish and compact device
content: A cool stylish and compact device!! I can get my weather, national or local news with a video briefing, set an alarm, see music lyrics, see my calendar, and many more options. Echo spot hits the spot and sits on my kitchen counter. I recommend this device as a gift or for yourself.

author: Joan Ayers
title: Greatest gift ever

author: Justin G

author: stargazerlaura

author: BT

content: Love this! Once I got the hang of it, I am able to do everything I want with my echos. Everyday I learn and enable new skills. And Alexa is getting smarter by the minute. Now I need one in my guest room.

We have tried to reinstall the program several times and we have reset our wi-fi system, but no luck.  Hoping for a fix through tech support, but it has been disappointing not to be able to use the ask alexa features and get a response.

content: We love it for s little guy it packs a punch! Were still learning and have not even attempted using the video in fact I have it taped !

content: Love that I can access my cameras around the house. Do not like the fact I can’t stop the “try this” scrolling.

My Echo Spot
My Son got this for me for Christmas  best gift ever ,I am in Ga. And he is in Fl.and so are my Grandchildren now I see them every time we talk I see my Grandson he is in The Air force station in Germany I love my Echo spot for real
