As far as functionality, the Spot is really great. One thing that definitely impressed me is its dimming ability. W/ many smart displays, if they dim at all, they can't go nearly dim enough to avoid disturbing my sleep w/ the amount of light they produce. The Spot absolutely excels at this. It's literally the best smart alarm clock I've ever owned, plus you have all the add'l capabilities of the screen and the Echo functionality.

Dinged it one star because the audio quality could be just a touch better, and the adjustable stand should be included w/ a device that costs $130. Adding $20 for the plastic stand is just a touch insulting.

author: Engineer
title: Helping Spot
content: The Echo Spot is a cheerful addition to my Alexa collection.  This Echo is for the kitchen and coordinates with the other spots in the house.  Great for another question/response opportunity in a central location.  Alexa gives me today's weather, what's on my schedule, play music, convert measurements (I'm not much of a cook or baker), and other tasks that I would normally stop and fire up the tablet to find the answer.

author: DenysnaDRILL
title: What’s wrong the echo spot
content:
Always show me Japanese
I did not settle the Japanese on my device

author: D. from Michigan
title: NOW that I know how to TURN OFF "things to try", I love it.
content:
NOW that I know how to TURN OFF "things to try", I love it.

Previous to this, I was going to send it back.
It arrived 2 days before it was supposed to, so I couldn't click on "RETURN ITEM".
Called Customer Service, which was a pain, having to look up on Google. . .

The short answer:  Do it FROM THE DEVICE, not from your phone.
Say  "Alexa, Go TO Settings"  Which seems to take 2 or 3 tries.  Choose "HOME AND CLOCK"  "HOMECARDS"  Pick ROTATE ONCE and select the things YOU would like, like the Weather.

I have an Android, and as of today you can NOT change the settings to fix this.  It's only on the device.
I complained to customer service, they were not even aware of the Android issue.  Probably works from iPhone??

Anyway, hope this helps.
D from Michigan

author: Love Warm & Style
title: Always there...
content: We find the Echo to be a part of our every day lives.  From knowing what the temperature is outside in the AM , getting music, news report and getting jokes.  We have enjoyed having this Echo from the moment we hooked it up!

author: roger
title: You must buy this!!! Excellent product!!
content: Wow!!!! I got this for the wife for Valentine's day!!! She absolutely loves it!!!! It does so much more than I thought. Thank you Amazon and of course Alexa !!!

author: Angela Stanton
title: Love this!
content: I really enjoy my echo spot. It reads my favorite books, plays music etc.

author: Christopher
title: Much better sound than the Echo Dot that replaced it
content: Much better sound than the Echo Dot that replaced it. It's really handy to have onscreen info for the weather and my Spotify music.

author: David
title: Great for seniors
content: I care for a cancer patient senior and previously purchased the Ring Doorbell and the Echo Show so that he could answer the door without having to go all the way across the house with his cane or walker. This worked great when he was at his desk where the Echo Show is (or in the family room using Fire TV) but still needed when he was in the back of the house or in the bedroom. The Echo Spot worked perfectly. Now I can drop in and check on him when I am not at home or at work. He also uses it to listen to his audiobooks and to read the Bible each day. Thanks Amazon for a great tool to help me, help him. I find great peace of mind knowing that if he should fall while alone, Alexa can hear him from any point in his large home and he can call for help. He can also control the entertainment system, lights, doorlock, sprinkler system, and more!

author: Zack
title: Can’t use routines?! Why??
content: I have 3 Alexa Devices including this one. So, I bought this for my primary alarm clock, thinking it would be awesome as a full time college student, to be able to set routines that wake me up automatically/turn on the lamp/start flash briefing to help me wake up at different times of the week, given that I wake up at different times on Monday, Wednesday, Friday than I do on Tuesday’s and Thursday’s. So I go to set it up and they say that amazon won’t set up routines or groups with the Show or Spot. Why not? Why severely limit your product like that?? It makes no sense. Please change this as it’s totally nonsensical not to allow them to utilize what i think is the most crucial feature of the Alexa Line. I’m totally and completely bummed that the number one reason I bought it is for nothing. I also feel there should be some sort of visible disclaimer stating that it can’t participate in one of your most beneficial features. Totally stupid.

author: joe
title: Love it!
content: I use this for everything! This makes the absolute best alarm clock ever! So easy to use and the screen makes love so easy!

author: DCF
title: Love the Echo Spot
content: Love the Echo Spot...it's chic, compact and looks great on any surface in any room. Also like to see song lyrics, extended weather forecast, foreign languages translated and so much more. And the sound is great. May have to get the Echo Show next! Highly recommend.

author: rosiebearonline
title: The Echo Spot takes up a tiny footprint, wherever you place it!
content: LOVE the info printed on the screen, like words to the music I play... The clock, the group communication and dropping in on someone in another room! Great gift for households to keep families connected! I wish the background would be brighter or backlight on the small screen. I definately will be purchasing more for Christmas gifts!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Best Night Time Sleeping Dim Level Ever!
content:
I just have to note that the Echo Spot is one of the very few items that actually dims the right amount. Most every night-time device is too bright. The Echo Spot is the dimmest I've seen, and I can read the clock easily without glasses. Those that aren't buying this, because they know that it will be too bright, they are likely wrong!

You can dim on a day/night schedule, and it dims on its own with light sensors on top.

They made the hour hand thick in the clockface I use. All you want to know in the middle of the night, is what hour it is, so thats easy too.

This is the best "bedside video clock" ever! I've been through many disappointments over the years. This is what I've been waiting for.

author: CatGirl
title: Can Not Connect to my WYZE Smart Camera!
content: Says it is compatible... Can not connect! - Many people online with the same problem!

author: LV_Tom
title: Great Style.. perfect for a modern looking clock and Alexa device.
content: I Love the style and that it is a great looking clock for the bedroom or anywhere in the house.  The onscreen weather and song lyrics when playing music a nice feature.. you can watch a video cam or have a video call with another echo device that has a screen.. The sound is a bit better than a Dot.. but not on par with the echo2 or full size echo.. so I wouldn't use in place of those.. Other than music its my favorite echo in my house.

author: Eric A. Fetcho
title: it's good but needs more flexibility
content: it's good but needs more flexibility.  You cant shut off the suggested things to try which is SUPER annoying.

author: Joe H.
title: Bedside companion and all the power of Alexa!
content: Love the Echo Spot. Perfect beside the bed and the touch screen is a nice addition. Amazon keeps bringing great additions to the Echo line.

author: El-Maz
title: Very cool
content: Its really very cool you can make video calls, watch videos, shows you the lyrics to the songs and the whole forecast for a week also you can play games. I got 2 one black and the other white and I gave it 4 stars cuz the white one sometimes just starts talking without me asking it but the black one is great.

author: john d hall
title: Four Stars
content: it needs to have a switch so you don't have to unplug the external speaker every time

author: Evie
title: Like that I can customize my "bedside alarm" w/ photos
content: Like that I can customize my "bedside alarm" w/ photos, set multiple alarms, have my books read to me, play MY music, get forecast for anywhere in the world. What I like least is I cannot customize alarm times, for instance, if I want alarms set for only 4 week days instead of all 5, it does not let you set it that way. You must cancel the 5th day every week.

author: Richard Reinke
title: The Wave of the Future is Here!
content: You will not be disappointed!!! Show your photos. Take pictures. News briefings. Watch Prime Video. Watch your home movies. Listen to podcasts. Call for an Uber. Control your lights and appliances. Touch screen control. Volume up and down buttons located on top of Spot! My favorite: Alexa, show my front door cam. What’s not to like!

author: Amazon Customer
title: DO NOT BUY THIS DEVICE
content: This device does not work as an alarm clock. We had it set for a weekday alarm and it often would not go off, causing my wife and I to be late for work and our son to be late for school. I have many Alexa devices and I'm familiar with the app. The alarm would show properly in the app but the device wouldn't work. You can see in the picture that the alarm is set properly but does not appear on the screen of the spot. Works fine as a $140 Echo Dot. Don't get it if you're looking for a reliable alarm clock.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good alarm clock and radio
content: I enjoy listening to music .Alexa sets alarm for 5am .One thing I told Alexa to stop radio and she couldn't do it. There was a problem so I had to unplug it.

author: Trace H Eggers
title: Spot seemed like a solution
content: I debated making this purchase for a while.  I've needed to replace my alarm clock for some time.  But I wanted something that was a bit more functional than a standard alarm.  After reading the review and speaking with friends, Spot seemed like a solution.  Well, I received the order, yesterday. I unpacked the "Spot" and it's sleek and stylish.  It looks really good on the nightstand.  It took just a couple minutes to set up & pair with the application on my phone.  It's easy to utilize all the functionality. The various "skills" are not well explained and there are many to go through.  I've not had the time to explore that further. I was able to wake this morning to music. I was able to tell Alexa "Good Morning" and receive the weather forecast and a fun fact on history. So if you're on the ledge about this purchase, take the dive as I can confidently say that you will not be disappointed.

author: Matthew Kucic
title: Forced Things to Try screen so annoying!  Some marketing person needs fired for this torture to users!
content: Three stars since you cannot turn off the things to try from the rotation of the home screen.  Could easily be fixed.  This is still a bit of a work in progress.  There is so much screen room and they use so little.  When not place the date on the clock face.  All clock faces are essentially the same thing with a different picture.  Amazon would do well to hire one person to just think about the home screen and not all the cool things Alexa wants me to try forcefully (aka the home screen problem) and make this work really well as a usefully visible information display or clock.

author: Sean Logan War
title: Anyone having troubles with Alexa hearing you?
content: I really like the design and most of the functionality of the new little jewel. However, while this one sits right beside me when I'm in bed, she is DEAF! I have several other DOTS throughout the house and even the ones in other rooms pick up my questions better than she does. I even picked her up this morning and told her to stop when she woke me up with her standard alarm and the Dot in the other room is the one that answered! The whole suite is getting smarter all the time and I love the functionality of it all. But for the additional amount of money one pays for this newest piece of tech, it REALLY seems like it should be able to hear so much better than she does.

author: Vikki Brown
title: Love the Spot!
content: Great little gadget. Love it, super easy to setup.

author: D
title: Everything Echo Exemplifies!
content: Everything you can expect from an Echo but the added screen, videos and photos make this a great compliment to any room! Don't want to get out of bed to turn off your alarm? Then this a great model for your bedroom with it's voice activated/controlled alarms. Want to stream your favorite music while getting ready for work or play, check the weather or the news? Then this model is for you, just ask and it will keep you informed or grooving or even help you relax before bedtime. Set up is a breeze!

author: Jae
title: I love it! Plan on getting another to replace my ...
content: This is my 5th echo device. I have three in my home and two in my office. Two are Shows. This is my first Spot. I love it! Plan on getting another to replace my Dot, which is just not cutting it in comparison to this bad boy!

author: Smokey Mtn.
title: AWESOME Device!!
content: Just an AWESOME example of today's technology. Love it! Don't think twice, buy one or any of the Echo devices. Does everything you could want it to do, except maybe wash the car. That skill is probably coming! :)

author: Steve Dickinson
title: Love these. Great for kids rooms
content: Love these.  Great for kids rooms.  Can use for white noise and also a clock.  It can also be used as a "facetime" because it has the camera and screen built in.

author: Cath From Buffalo
title: Great Fun
content: We have the Echo Dot and find it great fun. We use it to play music that we like, we play different games with it, and ask it questions. We really laugh when we say Alexa play Josh Groban, "You Lift Me Up." And she will say "I'm sorry, I'm not familiar with that." The only thing I haven't done is learn to use it with my Kindle Fire 10, or my iphone.

author: Terrance W.
title: Just a non stop advertising screen for amazon
content: Pos! Turn off the things to try.  So annoyed by this I'm switching to Google and throwing this in the garbage.

author: Juan Acevedo
title: Shes ok definetly better than echo Dot bit shes a little deft compared ...
content: Shes ok definetly better than echo Dot bit shes a little deft compared to echo show. I own all three echoes i mention above. And shes a good replacement for echo dot bot not so much for echo show. She looks nice on the living room and shes small so she wont take much space. Over all shes not bad my only complain is she cant hear you sometimes.

author: Dpear
title: Only streams Prime Video!
content: Cool device but Amazon blocking youtube and netflix content makes me second guess my purchase.

author: Missyjujubee
title: Great for kids & adults with developmental disabilities
content: Love it!  Purchased a two pack to add to our growing echo collection at home. Works great for my special needs son who has difficultly setting his alarm and telling time. Now he tells Alexa to set his alarm for the next morning and to play rain sounds to help him fall asleep. He’s so proud when he gets up and ready on his own without parent help!

author: Diana R.
title: Great addition to our Alexa collection
content: Purchased for my daughter spontaneously when a good sale was going on. She previously had the Echo Dot which is now elsewhere in the house. She uses the Spot as a desk clock, alarm clock and as a way to communicate with her friends that also have Echo Dots. She enjoys the games on there as well especially the trivia and riddles. I like that I can also video call her from my phone through the Alexa app on my phone.

author: ShynB
title: More versatile than your old clock radio alarm
content: I have now purchased three of these. The features are nice. Screen has nice resolution. Sound is adequate for the size. I wish there were a bigger selection of clock faces. Hears commands very easily, and obviously has almost unlimited information, which is good and bad I guess. The drop in feature is like FaceTime between echo devices. My echo is synced to my Nest thermostat and Lutron Caseta lighting controls and works well for on, off, and dimming. Pretty versatile piece of electronics. I mainly use it for my daily alarm clock, and it looks nice and doesn't clutter up your nightstand.

author: Cat
title: Smaller than I thought
content: I really like the echo spot, it works well, the speaker in it is good for its size.  I am a little disappointed in the overall size of the spot.  I thought it was bigger,  the TV commercials show a bigger product with a bigger screen.  For me, that is the only draw back.  I guess I should have read the dimensions better so I would not have felt let down when I received my first call on it.

author: VetMom2three
title: Does what i need
content: I have no problems with this. I mainly use it for the Ring doorbell ans it works and alerts  when someone rings which i like

author: Cathy
title: Spot
content: They are great we are very pleased with both of them. Love them.

author: Dee
title: The best echo
content: My favorite Amazon device so far!  I love how this device links to my Ring device!

author: Dad the Maker
title: Nice addition to the Echo lineup
content: Picked this up on Prime Day for a great deal for our kitchen... moved our larger Echo to the living room. The screen and default clock wallpaper is a nice thing to have in the kitchen. I know these are marketed as a bedroom device, but they work just as well in the kitchen. The kids use it for weather updates daily, the clock is big and easy to see from anywhere in the room and of course, the Alexa functions are used constantly... We also stream internet radio non-stop, so this is a well used device!

author: withtude
title: Great Addition to Echo Family
content: This is a great addition to my Echo family! It has all the functionality of the others plus it serves as a clock, and it scrolls other information like the weather on a regular basis. The sound is pretty good for such a small machine. The only down side is that the screen is small and FaceTime is a little more difficult as a result!

author: Kindle Customer
title: it actually works
content: Unexpected bonus.  we placed a phone call to another user and found we had video and faces immediately.

author: MurseJeff
title: Not good for room monitor camera
content: Display to small to be useful for any type of video watching.  Ok for face to face video conferences.  Camera points to high up.  When I log in remotely I got a great shot of my ceiling fan. No way to adjust angle of camera without modifying base of unit. Works exactly like other echo products do, unless you need video conferencing and a cool clock to look at, I'd stick with the regular echo or the large screen echo show. If I were to make purchase again I'd just buy the Show.  I currently own one original echo, 3 dots, and 2 spots. One dot I use at my office at work [off site from home). Still waiting for the AI (artificial intelligence ) to improve.  Google still provides better searches.  Alexa is being integrated in all kinds of home electronics,  so might be useful to try. Good luck.

author: Sharon Poore
title: Echo Spot  -  Winner
content: It is compact and designed well to fit in with any room decor. The speaker is adequat and has the technology of video with audio puts it a step ahead. This product confirmed Amazon’s commitment to affordable quality for me.

author: Chad
title: Amazing little device
content: Amazing little device. Love being able to set my alarm hands free on the fly or have a story read or the sound of rain to help me sleep :)

author: Mike L
title: Fun 21st century device!
content: Nice little gadget.  Would be better if you could customize the swipes screens and remove tips.  We like the convenience of it a lot.

author: Cait O'Sullivan
title: Pretty good, some glitches
content: The Spot is a very nice addition to my Echo collection. The speaker has surprisingly good sound- significantly better than the Dot. I really want to give this 5 stars but I just can’t. There are times when Alexa will stop speaking mid sentence for 3-5 seconds, which is 1. annoying and 2. nervous making because you assume you broke it. With a little software upgrading, this will be the ideal option for folks who want the convenience of the Echo but don’t want to take up valuable real estate on your desk or table.

author: Alex
title: Oh, Amazon, why can't I use the Echo Spot as a CLOCK?!
content: Great product EXCEPT there is no possible way for it to act as a clock the displays the time PERMANENTLY.  When in 'Clock' mode, the screen rotates between the clock face and a 'Things to Try' screen.  I intended on buying several units for my house, but I do not need a screen in the house that is permanently trying to upset me.  Acting as clock should be a BASIC feature of the Echo Spot.  How could you get this wrong, Amazon??  #FAIL

author: Ellen
title: Smart Display.
content: I have owned the Echo since first released. I wanted this type for thr display of music titles and lyrics. Bought some as gifts too.

author: Flossygirl
title: Very small.  We returned and got an Echo Show
content: This Echo spot is very small.  It would be good for an alarm clock, but it's so small for anything else its hard to see the info displayed. It's not much bigger than an Echo dot, and much more expensive.  It's a lot less expensive than an Echo show, but the Show is large enough that you can read recipes  and news articles easily.  I know this  is a review for the Spot, but if you can afford it, get a Show.  The Spot was useless for us.

author: Alexis Romanko
title: Echo spot review
content: I like it! I use it from time to time. It makes my home look a bit more modern. Sometimes you have to work things a special way for it to understand. I love the drop in feature along with the announcement feature.

author: Captain Maureen S. Skaar
title: Five Stars
content:
Love it bought a
second one

author: Strandcity
title: Amazon unwilling to fix software problems
content: The rotate once setting stopped working about 6 months ago. They told me it was a software glitch that they need to fix. I had to spend hours on the phone and email to get them to finally admit this. Here it is September 2018 and they still have not fixed it. It’s actually much worse. If you block the camera it will not rotate which means the camera is watching you and waiting for you. This is very creepy. I have blocked the cameras on my echo spots. If they are unwilling to fix a software problem like this when they know it exists who knows what else they are doing with it. Very unethical and worse than big brother.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great little alarm clock.
content: I like it. The time should be larger on the face but it works well. I use it with my Arlo cameras. Sometimes it doesn’t come up the first time but if you ask for it again it works.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Alexa and a screen with a good speaker
content: The device is small but nicely weighted. It has a sharp screen and Alexa is really sharp, meaning she understands what I'm saying every time with no mistakes. And Alexa is very, very functional. I used this device to start my smart home plans.

author: Charles V Schneider
title: Using as a an alarm clock replacement
content: I like the fact that it can answer questions, play music and set alarms by voice as well as displaying the current weather visually. This is a great replacement for an old iPod/clock-radio that finally gave up the ghost.

author: David B
title: Great as bedroom clock
content: The convenience of Alexa in a small attractive package.  Warnings about nuisance of rotating suggestions is way overstated.  Spot easily controls what you see and when.

author: T. S. Marsh
title: Still trying tk find its niche.
content: I really enjoy the spot. The screen is still a solution looking for a problem and that problem might be “drop in”, but watching security feeds, birds nests and my 3D printer via the spot is intuitive.

author: Carolyn
title: Fixed
content:
Update:
They have since corrected video streaming screen. Works well now.

Unless I’m missing something, this product is terrible for cloud cam/ video streaming. The zoom and mic buttons are blocking a huge portion of the screen. This was not what was advertised (second photo). I have 10 cloud cams, 5 echo dots, 1 echo show and a Ring doorbell. I thought this would be a great baby monitor on my nightstand. So bummed!

author: R. Redyk
title: This device is awesome! Amazon hit another homerun
content: This device is awesome! Amazon hit another homerun!  I bought the big brother for my wife for the kitchen, this was a natural add-on. My wife uses it every single day. The music feature alone makes it worth every single cent. I like the way it looks as well, best alarm clock in the history of alarm clocks.

author: S. Saxton
title: My Third Echo
content: Several months back someone gave me an Echo Dot. From there it was on. The first one took some doing pairing with my home network. Afterwards, my second was a dream to set up.  And this one, the Spot, was no different. I was so used to just asking Alexa something and hearing it. Now thatI get to see it is another. After the mandatory updates, the set up was a breeze. I purchased this in order to fulfill the requirement to get a Ring security doorbell and see who is at my door when I am upstairs. Nice work Amazon!!!

author: brazil2010
title: Nice
content: The only problem is I can't download Alexa app here in Brazil. So I'm using it with limitations.

author: pauline J. Leist
title: The grandkids have fun with it
content: It's great, I just am getting used to it.  It would be easier to use if there were written instructions.

author: RC
title: Sleek
content: If you're looking to get an Alexa product, I would highly recommend this one. The screen adds a lot of functionality that a regular Alexa does not have but it is much cheaper than the other option with a screen, the show. Makes for a great high tech bed side clock. Only cons I would say is that Alexa is not as advanced as Google's offering when it comes to the assistant itself, but it still does great.

author: M. Carlson
title: Nice sized unit. Small but big enough for video clips, video chatting etc.
content: I am retired and live alone. Alexa is so handy to have around. I have 4 different models so far, so she is always near by to play music, monitor cooking times, turn lights on and off etc. now with the ability to see video clips, video chat, etc.  everyday my e his get smarter and smarter.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love this Echo Spot
content: Love this Echo Spot. Going to replace my Dots with the Spots. Being able to glance at these and see the time and weather is a lot more convenient than asking Alexa. The speaker sounds good for having Alexa read your news or other information.

author: Tim
title: Very cool and a great step up from a simple Echo
content: Very cool and a great step up from a simple Echo. The screen is small..but perfect for what its intended to be...a smart clock. I'm not going to be watching movies on this !! The camera is great, the dimming functions perfectly and you can customize your background. The stand was an added bonus so I would suggest getting that. Exceeded my expectations and extended my home automation abilities.

author: Terrence Claggett
title: It's worth everything penny
content: Take some getting used to but I do like having her in the house. I don't realize how much she would come in handy but she has come in handy even with my more random thoughts and questions. Wouldn't trade it for anything

author: Julesmak
title: Meh
content: Hm, I can’t really figure out how the spot is useful. Every time I try to watch video on it, it’s not supported. I don’t love that it has a camera on it since I don’t want to use it to video chat. I like my dots but this is kinda cheesy. The google hub isn’t as user friendly but has a lot more features.

author: Tasha26
title: Ok
content: Trying to get it to notice who I am when asked it won't so I'm still trying otherwise good

author: Smart Home Geek
title: Amazing little echo!  Great sound and a suprisingly convenient display of timers, lyrics, weather, and more!
content:
We are a family of echos (we have 10 in our house).  The new Echo spot is great.  The sound quality is surprisingly good for such a small device and the convenience of the screen is really nice.  We're still deciding if we should keep this in the kitchen or get the Echo Show and move this to a bedroom.

The touch screen is great for quickly pausing, skipping or reviewing song (on Pandora).  It also displays your personal photo, the weather, timers and the lyrics to songs.

Another cool feature is that you can see your Arlo cameras, just by asking Alexa to "show me the backyard camera."  It's a great feature among many others.  Being able to visually see the remaining time on your timers is great for the kitchen (or maybe for a timeout clock for the little ones)!

I think this one will ultimately end up on a night stand for us, so that we have an excuse to get the bigger screen of an Echo Show, but it's really a nice device.  Highly recommend it!

author: Michael Hoffmann
title: Defective - Alexa cannot hear me
content:
The mic-off button on the top of the device remains lit red.  I am not able to press the button to turn the mic on.  So Alexa cannot hear my voice.  Tech support had me try resetting to original factory specs.  That did not fix the problem. I am willing to give it another try.  I'm returning it for another.  Hopefully the new one will work.

Update 2018-12-04:  Amazon exchanged my defective Spot for a new one.  The new unit arrived the next day.  The customer service rep was very helpful.  I had originally given a 2-star rating.  With Amazon's superb customer service, I've changed my rating to 5 stars.  The new Spot works like a charm.

author: Mark B.
title: Works great a an alarm clock!
content: I love the Echo Spot as it is great for checking the weather along with many other things, but most important it works great as your alarm clock in your bedroom!

author: sinamin
title: Most important is the hands free voice activation
content: I like the clearly of the echo spot.  I use it as a faster means to keep in touch with my sister who has cancer.

author: Firewood
title: Looks good, works good, great purchase
content: Use it in bedroom,  more dependable than an alarm clock.... get weather without getting out of bed

author: Linda Schrader
title: This is the perfect little bedside addition to all of my Echo devices ...
content: This is the perfect little bedside addition to all of my Echo devices I already have and absolutely love!  Love that it acts like my old Timex bedside alarm clock!  I know I am dating myself!  Lol!  I know it does many more amazing things, but right now I am enjoying it as an alarm clock, since I have the original echos, dots, show, and now Spot!  Happy! 😊.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great product. Small
content: This is my third type of Echo, the first with a screen. Great product. Small, unobtrusive, does it all. Nice when hooked up to Bluetooth speakers.

author: Linda Clement
title: The Spot is Awesome!
content: This item does so many things.  Also would be great for people living alone.  Seems like you would always have someone to talk to!  Also easy to use and gives useful information.  Keep weather reports at your fingertips and many other facts.  Love my Spot!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Use caution in bedroom
content: I like the clock display in the Spot. I also like the way it displays the lyrics when music is playing. Video skills are mediocre because is a very small screen. But overall is a great kitchen device. Not in the bedroom... Camera and mic disable together with one button.

author: M. Luke
title: Something that you did not realize you need.
content: I brought this device during Prime Week.  I always felt devices like this are not necessary, but I brought one anyway.  And I actually love it.  First, it plays any music I want from my Amazon music.  Instead of hitting a snooze button on my alarm, I just ask Alexa to set an alarm for 15/20 minutes later or set a timer.  Is it a necessity, no! But you will not regret purchasing it.

author: sandra Hernandez
title: We love the SPORT
content: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY SON AFTER HE SAW HIS UNCLE HAD THE LARGER MODEL AND HE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT.

author: WW
title: Great mid-range speaker, vast improvement over the Dot
content:
I love the Spot - the video is a great addition, and the speaker sounds much better than the Echo Dot.  I also have the Echo Plus, which does have a better speaker than the Spot, but for the price and the fact it has video I think the Spot is a much better deal. So between the 3 I would choose the Spot hands down - in fact I plan to get 2 more for other rooms.

The "drop-in" feature is very cool and makes a great room to room video intercom (you can also drop in from a mobile phone anywhere for video calling), although I don't know how often we'd really use it.  We'll see once we have a couple in the house.  But what I really like it for is the ability to view video cameras in the house.

I have the EZVIZ Mini 360 Plus, which is a great camera for the nursery, and I can ask the Spot to show the camera on screen and watch it.  I'm sure there are plenty of other cameras with Alexa support that would work just as well with the Spot, just make sure you research it to make sure it has a supported skill.

author: Pacific Andy
title: Annoying
content: Kind of annoying. Very seldom gives the correct answer or information. Most of the time it’s way off. Even amazon music is a mess to retrieve.

author: Amazon Addict!
title: I love Alexa but I wanted the Spot almost exclusively as ...
content:
Probably the most expensive time piece I have ever purchased! I love Alexa but I wanted the Spot almost exclusively as a clock for my nightstand.
The thing is, I have an Echo in the bedroom already do I had to change the wake word for my Spot so the don't get confused. Now I'm the one who is confused!

author: Stephanie Coronado
title: Love it! Cool features and love how the clock ...
content: Love it!  Cool features and love how the clock options.  Not bright at night either.

author: michael alston
title: It's great
content: I love the spot, it is awesome as my alarm clock and speakers are pretty decent. My only gripe is that the microphones don't listen as well as some of the other echo devices so I do keep an echo Dot at the other end of the room so I'm not yelling commands at it. Other than that it's perfect.

author: Joan G
title: Alexa, thank you :-)
content: Fun. Alexa understands speech better than Siri.  Don’t have a smart home. Would be better if I did. Wish it was webcam too.

author: Mary Sal
title: This Echo is better then we imagined!
content: We love this Echo! My husband uses it as an alarm everyday, my grand kids love the story telling skills and the lullaby songs at bedtime, We go to sleep at night to the sound of a thunderstorm, so many more uses then I imagined.

author: Michael Lee Keksi
title: Five Stars
content: works great like much better than other Alexa devices.  I sure like drop in feature great intercom.

author: SP
title: Ordered as a gift, but we have one too
content: Now the Echo is in the living room, and this is in the bedroom. Awesome speaker, didn't see that coming from its size. In-laws call our show on theirs all the time. Camera comes through pretty decent.

title: big brother is watching and listening
content: While a fun gadget to play music or look something up just by asking we realized when setting up the echo the unintended consequence of this device is that it records all your conversations whether you want it to or not and with the video feature I wonder could it be watching as well. We unplugged it and don’t use it currently. It just felt weird, like Amazon was listening 😄

author: Dog Mom
title: SPOT - whatta girl. She is my fave
content: Spot is great. I love being able to tell what music is playing - never could with Echo or Dot. I have classical music playing for my dog and he seems to love it. He is snoozing to something by London Philharmonic at the moment. He might know that his photo is on the face of Spot. I like her so much that I bought Show for the kitchen (not set up yet). We have a sassy Echo that speaks when not spoken to and a Dot that ignores me a bit too often - she may get the boot if she doesn't shape up. Does not bother me that these girls are spying on me.

author: Marilia Gaboardi
title: I love it!
content: I live in Brazil, but I bought Echo Spot in the USA. I downloaded the application from Alexa and Amazon Music in the USA. I brought it to Brazil and it works perfectly. However, I do not advise buying and trying to install Alexa and Amazon Music in Brazil because you will not be able to. These app are not available neither in the brazilians’ apple store nor in google play . But I think they will soon be. I use Echo Spot to listen to music, turn on the timer, wake up, and even make video calls. But you have to speak English with Alexa. I love my robot Alexa.

author: Amazon Customer
title: You want to have access to a high speed router and Internet.
content: I like the ability  to ask questions of Alexa and the ability of this gadget to blend easily with other smart home devises.  What I dislike is the delay I sometimes experience when I ask Alexa to connect to my wireless security cameras.

author: Damien D Ortiz
title: almost a good alarm clock
content: the echo spot has tons of potential but lacks in ease for its intended purpose. instead of me having to say  "alexa, set an alarm," for every alarm I am trying to set. simplify this function by giving you the option to add alarms directly to the app on your phone or device you are using that links to the echo spot, this ability to not just edit but add alarms would make the setup process much faster. Also when editing alarms it would be nice to have a greater range of customization and not just a setting for individual days or full week days or weekends.  so when you enter the selection for what day you want the alarm  where it would say every monday or every week you get to select more then one, for instance every monday every tuesday every wednesday then you select done so now you have that one alarm set at the same time for those three days and not the entire week.  If or when this function is fixed id be more then happy to add 5 star and actually suggest this product to my friends family and co workers.

author: Dina fehler
title: OMG! I am a convert!
content:
Let me just confess that I am from the generation that actually TYPED my papers in college....So, after I received my Echo as a gift, and after 30 days of staring at it in sheer horror as to how I would even begin to set it up, I took the plunge and booted the baby up!
Well, Alexa plays music for me and reads my audible books and gets my grocery list together, helps me find a recipe for dinner....
I say ‘Good Morning Alexa,’ and she is set up to give me the weather, the traffics and the news headlines!
You May chuckle at this step into the ‘new age of technology,’ for an old chick like me, I immediately bought another for downstairs!  I can see Echo for helpful applications for my Senior father who is in a retirement home,  for people with disabilities, so many possibilities! Wow, just wow!

author: Frank
title: Bedside clock
content:
Great product for a new bedside alarm clock.
I wake up to my preset alarm and listen to the news and weather while getting ready for the day. The red lights and optional ‘screen off’ mode is clutch when i’m Sleeping as I’m accustomed to darkness during that time.

author: cbajhouston
title: Good concept, still needs a lot of work!
content:
The concept is great, the video is horrible. Make sure you have a large amount of light, and I mean large.....My picture is with the standard ceiling light on. The video quality when there is a lot light is very grainy, and still not very bright.

Don't get me started on the viewing angle. A stand that will rotate is a necessity unless you want it below knee level all of the time. My picture is with it at about 20" off the ground. Overall, I think I wasted my money. I got this to keep an eye on my kids while playing video games on a different floor and for an intercom system. I should have just gotten a dot.

author: DB
title: Best alarm clock I’ve ever owned
content: Haven’t yet learned the ins and outs of all it can do, but just for the ease of setting the alarm clock function makes it worth the price.

author: L. obrien
title: Really enjoying the Echo Spot!
content: This is my new alarm clock, I set 2 or 3 alarms to get me up, she tells me weather, news, plays music, tells jokes. I enjoy her humor making the bed, cleaning up. She will answe question, tell jokes etc! Great clock faces, advice.

author: MelOG
title: It works really well with my RING Doorbell and I love the interface when playing music or just being able ...
content: Absolutely loving it so far! It works really well with my RING Doorbell and I love the interface when playing music or just being able to have a cute background.

author: RichMark
title: For the person who needs Alexa on a nightstand
content: So easy great product whole house is Alexa

author: Latham
title: Great gift, arrivEd. Quickly!
content: It was a gift and they are very happy with it.

author: whiteydusang
title: Not Quite Perfect
content: I really like mostly everything about the Echo Spot except when it is having "difficulty understanding" and asks that you try back later and you end up having to reboot the device.

author: greg h.
title: Helpful
content: I like that i can it things with out having to look it up.

author: Melvin Cooper
title: Works great except for CPI camera video
content: Works great except I can't see my CPI security cameras but I think that is more on CPI then the echo.

author: TBone
title: Happy Happy with purchase!
content: Works great. So happy with mine, I ordered one for the wife. Easy to set up and put a picture to display

author: must read
title: Best ever!!
content: Absolutely love this little thing! I use it to control all the lights in my house, it’s my alarm clock and basically does everything! I never knew how much I needed this in my life.

author: Rohit
title: Flickering display
content: Within few months the screen started flickering. Called Amazon and they promptly provided shipping label to ship it for warrenty repair. In few days got email that SW is updated and spot is being shipped back. Received it today, plugged it and immediately it started flickering. I am surprised that it was sent back as ‘fixed’, while the problem persists and is easily visible. See attached video.

author: Alice W
title: Don't forget to let her learn your voice first!
content: I like it, she is so smart. You may find her very difficult to understand you at the very beginning, after let Alexa learn your voice, everything become so fast and clear. She can do a lot of things, I linked my TV, plug, light, etc all to Alexa, I can almost control everything in my place with this little thing on my desk. And the screen is so clear and pretty, can't recommend more!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Loved
content: Great product

author: Edward J. Buttler
title: Worthwhile
content:
I own several different Echo's. I was a bit surprised by how the display is far larger and easier to read than I had thought it
would be. Smaller than Echo Show, but it has impressed me.

author: Brad Isley
title: Sweet display
content: Works great I love it, grand daughter digs the watching of cartoons on it lol

author: lisamariesa
title: Best Mother’s Day gift ever!
content: I needed a new alarm clock. I figured this would do that plus way more than I would ever need. I love being able to check the weather or sports scores or my calendar without lifting a finger. My kids love being able to verbally set timers for brushing their teeth, and they enjoy asking Alexa to tell them jokes. All in all this is a super fun device and I’m so glad to have it in my home.

author: Bob S
title: Echo Spot is neat
content: This was a Christmas gift.  I have been having fun setting it up and adding things to it as I go

author: SUSAN T. SELESKI
title: Its a GREAT Help!
content: I really like the echo dot. I have a hard time remembering so as soon as I know something that is important to me I'll say it to Alexa and she will remind me. Its a great help to me.

author: Jim Hall
title: Echo products are great.
content: Exactly as described and works great.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Echo Spot is a winner.
content: even better than the regular echo.  I have this one in my bedroom.  It looks like a clock until you talk to it.  Fast response.  Pictures and verbiage is large enough although it is small.

author: Shanna M
title: Love it! Easy to set up
content: Love it! Easy to set up.  Disappointed Inhave not seen any video like I had thought I could but have not really tried that hard.  Still learning about it but pleased so far.

author: kyromom
title: can't FaceTime!
content: bought for my 16 year old daughter, all she wanted was to FaceTime her friends on the echo spot!  when she tried to register, it said she can't because she is underage and the phone number associated with her phone is now in their system and we can't register it. sending it back!

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great Device
content: I love my Echo Spot.  Waking to my favorite music.  Being able to completely turn off display at night so my bedroom is dark.  All the skills I have yet to try.  Easy to use.

author: talene harvel
title: Five Stars
content: Love it one of my best purchases this yr!!

author: D. Bellouny
title: I was hoping for a better clock face to make this an alarm clock replacement
content:
I was hoping for a better clock face to make this an alarm clock replacement .  The display brightness dims too much at night to accomplish this task.

The display works well for camera viewing.

It is an attractive device. and a decent value at $99

author: Terrence V Shelton
title: It works great. What I did not like was the extra ...
content: It works great .  What I did not like was the extra 3 days it took to get here.

author: Emma B
title: Fab and fun product!
content: This product has made my life much simpler with a little one. I use it a lot for music and when i have my hands full turning it on/off or up/down is a breeze. The screen is a great novelty where i can watch the news!

author: Teacher
title: I loved it.
content: I ordered the Echo Spot for its ability to show postings.  I loved it... until they came out with the Echo Show.  If I had known they would have a screen that was much bigger then I would have waited.  I wish I could exchange it for the larger screen.

author: J Cook
title: Perfect for the Bedroom
content: This was a gift for my son. I already own one I have many echos this is by far my favorite. Perfect for the bedroom I love the touch screen.

author: paul m linnert
title: The microphone is horrible on this device!
content: I am not satisfied with the microphone on this device. I am an avid alexa user and have a good portion of my home connected for voice activation. To do this operation I have used a gen 1 ECHO and has performed beautifully, this spot is in my opinion not as accurate with the microphone as the echo. I can't even drop in from the spot to my echo because the voice is to choppy. Really I wish I had either purchased another echo or the google device they work better.

author: Kate White
title: Better than the dot
content: Love the echo more than the dot

author: M.Cozad
title: Very informative
content: We love the echo spot!  One of my favorite questions to ask Alexa “3 things to know”.

author: A. GOSIOROWSKI
title: really wanted to love this too because Alexa is probably the best thing ...
content:
I cannot see the font.  It's always dark when I try to look at it at night.  I end up having to ask Alexa what time it is to find out what time it is.  I don't really use the display for anything.  I really, really, really wanted to love this too because Alexa is probably the best thing since the iPhone invention but I just don't get this one.  Maybe in the future it will be great but for now, I don't really like it.

AMAZON-gotta make the font bigger!!!!!  Maybe also add the room temp to it somehow.  Then I might like it!

author: love2travel
title: This Echo is a nice addition to our home.
content: This is my 1st Echo.  I was a little overwhelmed by it in the beginning so searched Google as well as YouTube to learn different ways to use it.  Once I started playing with it & using different commands, as well as coordinating with my app, I realized how easy it was.  I know there are a lot more things I can do with it, but I’m a work-in-progress.  I don’t have any Smart devices & I only have one Echo, so I know I’m using it well below it’s capabilities.  The fact that it’s a touchscreen is really nice and the clock face makes it a great bedside or kitchen clock.  I keep it in the kitchen where it’s easy to see, accepts voice commands from the nearby living room, acts as a timer, & I can hear reminders in the main part of the house.

author: Lenny
title: Perfect Bedside Alarm clock replacement
content: Perfect Bedside Alarm clock replacement. I own several Alexa devices and they all work flawlessly and together,

author: W. Olmsted
title: I love my new alarm clock
content: I love my new alarm clock. Was replacing an old bose, and this is perfect. It is exactly what I wanted small, great speaker, wakes me up to music of my choice.

author: mbresher
title: Just Keeps Getting Better
content: Great design. Updates with new skills every week. It just keeps getting better the more I discover new things it can do!

author: Bruce J. Wong
title: Great product
content: Great bedside clock and Alexa controls - light dims nicely, we have voice control over all our bedroom lamps and thermostat

author: BSEE
title: Good but not for the price
content: Have multiple Amazon products; Dot, Echo, Fire Stick.  Bought this at a sale price $115.  Makes for nice bed stand device.  I primarily bought it for the clock hand face and to display security camera.  Works well for those operations.  Screen is useful but the cost/benefit ratio not quite there.  Would be a no brainier at a $75 borderline $100.  If interested I would wait for sale instead of purchasing full price.

author: D. Michael
title: My favorite Echo device!
content: We’re an Echo home, with Dots or Echos in most rooms.  I use the Spot as my alarm clock and it is my favorite of the Echo devices we own.  Looking forward to more clock faces being added (I’m sure that’ll come) but this is a wonderful device that does Alexa and alarm clock very very well!

author: Jessica
title: 5 Stars!
content: Great addition to my echo dot.  This acts as my clock on my night stand and the screen is great for the time and weather.

author: R. DAVIS
title: Perfect size
content: I love the Echo Spot.  Perfect size screen for the bedroom.  You won't be disappointed.

author: MA
title: SPOT ON
content: This is FUN. Also hands free call capability is a secure feeling. Quick, clear picture. Very responsive to voice requests. BRAVO AMAZON.

author: Delubo
title: Shall be given 4 starts but recently found a BUG ...
content: Shall be given 4 starts but recently found a BUG. When the alarm is snoozing, it cannot hear the voice. Only touch screen can work. I have to restart it.

author: Maxwell
title: Easy to use and so fun.
content: I love Alexa.  She talks to me in the morning, records my shopping list, plays my favorite music station and lets me know the weather.  The white Echo Spot works perfect with kitchen decor.  Very easy to set up!

author: DJay
title: Echo spot is my friend.
content: Echo spot kicked echo dot's butt... My suggestion for all the echo dot to switch to echo spot... However I had to enroll into prime videos and thinking of prime music enrollment..Again it does need some additional things to make it worthy...

author: Jessica Gipson
title: I like it.
content: Great addition to our Alexa family. Works well as an Alexa device, but be careful using as everyday alarm. There is no battery backup, so if you loss power you loss your alarm. Had to take off star because there is no battery backup for the alarm. Overall, happy with my purchase.

author: avid book reader
title: Ms. Alexa
content: Had been trying to keep Ms. Alexa out of my house. I disabled her on my tablet but I received the echo spot for a family christmas gift.  Shes ok. Don't use her much just listen to music when I'm in the kitchen.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love the Echo Spot!
content: Didnt think id get an Alexa device, but this is perfect for my home office.  the screen adds just that little piece that makes it worth the extra cost of the other Alexa devices.  It can show lyrics of songs, play my xm radio, can show videos of movie trailers and news.  Its great!

author: Henry Halladay
title: Echo Spot alarm issues
content: The Echo Spot arrived as scheduled and integrated into my system easily. However, initializing as an alarm had problems. I initially set the alarm OK but turned it off by saying "Alexa cancel alarm" which worked for a couple of days and then NO alarm even though Alexa showed the alarm was still there. I tried with a new alarm with the same result so I contacted technical support. The agent could not help but suggested saying use "Alexa, STOP" which did work, I tried the same alarm on  my Echo SHOW which worked perfectly. I could not find any instructions on Amazon.

author: Jason
title: Great product, was exactly what I had expected when ...
content: Great product, was exactly what I had expected when ordered.  No issues, and website description was accurate.  Kids love playing with it, will ask it questions, jokes, it even recognizes my 4 year old, which is pretty good.

author: rknowles
title: No themes!
content: Not happy with the Spot.  Reset numerous times.  Seems to be in slow mode.  Have to be practically on top of it for it to hear me.  Even after talking with support I still do not have “themes” in the menu to choose from!

author: Berry_Princess
title: Bleh
content: I understand that if I take my time and read up on issues I am having/communicate with vendor blah blah blah I don't care.  This thing comes out of the box showing ads and lacks duplex on the intercom (if someone is talking the other person cannot be heard).

author: Tommy G
title: Such potential but progress in the works
content:
So, have been using for a few weeks now and this is an ok product with some down the road potential tied to connected devices.
Works as a great night stand item or great for an office desk.

Opportunity area:  I keep have to sync back to my bluetooth UE Boom because connection keeps dropping. Never had this issue with Echo Dot and main reason for a four star.

I bought these in a two pack on the Prime day which really made them a better value.

Has been one firmware update and of course, there is constant updates to Alexa for improved features and reason why work in progress.

author: Larry P.
title: Too expensive.
content: Attractive version of Echo.  I was going to use it with the Ring doorbell but discovered that the Echo doesn’t provide full 2 way communication with the doorbell.  Sound is better than the Dot but not as good as the Echo.  It doesn’t seem tas sensitive as other Echo devices to my voice.  I have it paired with Amazon’s Cloud Cam but the small size limits usefulness.  Pretty expensive for what you get in functionality.

author: MS De Gonzalez
title: doesn't always hear me.
content: For some reason, it sometimes can't hear me or hears me erroneously.  I like the product but it's annoying that I have that quirk every now and then.

author: Stef
title: Good buy!
content:
I really like this item and the fact you can ask for a quick weather update, play music or news. I have news recap set to play each morning. It would be perfect if it had a USB port as I can live with the ads.

All in all,  very happy with this purchase.

author: Gary Havenhill
title: Cann't change home screen
content: My spot has an analog clock as the home screen, my daughter's spot has a digital clock with the temperature, I have contact the service center and they couldn't figure how to fix it. Not satified with the analog clock looks childess.

author: Shopaholic72
title: Gadget kid
content: The package arrived as purpose. I am now in love with my do echo spot. Now that I have done training and at skills to the Alexa app. It is working wonderful I love this new gadget.

author: Edman
title: Five Stars
content: I really enjoy using it. However, there should be more accessories for it.

author: roxanne franko
title: Easy to set up
content: I love my Alexa! I bought one for myself and one as a gift for my daughter. It was easy enough for someone like me who is completely illiterate when it comes to electronics to hook up!

author: amy t kays
title: Love that my kiddos and grands can call anytime for ...
content: Have an echo show at home and bought a pair of echo spots during prime week so that my son could have 1 and I could have 1 for the office.  Used daily for music and keeping in touch with family.  Love that my kiddos and grands can call anytime for a face to face conversation!  Alexa is fun to interact with too!

author: Kevin
title: Nice product!
content: I have had my Spot for a while now and love that it has taken the place of my bedside alarm. Works great!

author: Carol11944
title: Great video quality.
content: I love the new echo spot.  Works as well as Echo Show at half the price.  And try taking a photo of yourself.  It is amazing, You are set inside round screen shot just as you will appear on finished photo + you can add a frame with just a click. Pixel of photo is so good every wrinkle shows.  Echo and Alexa seem to improve constantly, and simplicity of use for everyone is amazing.

author: Tia
title: Best alarm clock ever and so much more!
content: I love my echo spot! It’s the best alarm clock but so much more! I listen to music, podcasts and can watch news and weather videos in my bedroom, plus can change the clock face everyday!

author: Tina Fox
title: Really Cool! I like to have my horoscope read to ...
content: I didn't realize at first that you have to go on the app and enable certain skills in order to ask certain questions. It also has music streaming for $3.99/mo. that my son loves! It plays ANY song you tell it to! Really Cool! I like to have my horoscope read to me and the weather in the morning. It's also a perfect alarm clock for my son. He hated the sound of his other one and started the day grumpy. Thanks Amazon! Echo Spot is Awesome!

author: Robbie
title: I just love the echo spot
content: I just love the echo spot.  It is the right size and does everything  I want it to do.  I hooked up my speakers to spot and I now have a great stereo music system along with everything else I want elexa to do.  I just received this product so I am still learning all the great skills that elexa can do.  I like the round screen so that I can also watch the news briefs and see what I am asking for.

author: chris
title: She's always listening.
content:
This thing is pretty cool.  It was a valentine gift to me from my gf.

I use it as an alarm clock on my nightstand.  It's nice to ask what time it is in the morning.  I play my Pandora easily in the mornings on it getting ready for work.  I'm a child so I like the simon says feature.  We also ask it most nights to play sleep sounds.

author: Kimmy
title: Five Stars
content: I love the echo spot! Works pperfectly.

author: Kddelk
title: Very useful device!
content: So far so good with the Echo Spot. I use it for weather, listening to music at night, and a alarm clock.

author: Kristi Stoutamyer
title: Love her in the living room
content: Alexa is now in the bedroom too!!  Love her in the living room, and having her in two places is nice!  I can add grocery items, to do list items, listen to music through the great speaker, have an alarm, and my favorite is the drop in feature....no more yelling downstairs to communicate!!

author: Elizabeth B.
title: May not pick up voice calls too well.
content: It’s so very convenient! My only concern is that it’s hard for anyone to hear you when speaking into it. That seems like a bit of a mechanical flaw.

author: Pal Al
title: Expensive alarm clock
content: Expensive alarm clock. If the price came down I would buy another.

author: kaylynn chapman
title: Does what it is supposed to
content: I love these little things! However, I do not feel as if I should have to buy a separate product so I can arrange it to actually point in a decent angle. It’s like it shoots right towards the ceiling. That is my only issue!!

author: FERNANDO HERRERA
title: Estrellas cinco es poco valor
content: Es quedado sorprendido con esto excelentemente bueno

author: fyerphys
title: Great Device! WiFi issues continue.
content: It is a great little device. My only complaint is that it continually kicks off the WiFi, both devices, every day. I also wish YouTube would work on it but i know that is a general issue with Google. I think it is a lacking some support compared to the other Echo devices.

author: Gregory Mahloch
title: Great little device!
content: Have a few of the Echo Dots, this is a nice upgrade. Lots of good features. You can even watch a movie but the screen is soo small you wouldn't want to. My biggest complaint is that it shuffles through a list instead of just staying on your home page. Always giving hints and things to try, which I do not want to see. I've heard a bunch of people complain about this but as far as I know there isn't a way to shut that off. Overall a good investment. Alexa will keep getting better.

author: Judie Binder
title: Convenience and Choices
content: I absolutely love my Echo Spot!  It’s so convenient. I got it because I was tired of sleeping with my old alarm clock on my bed since I dislocated my shoulder and have tears in my rotator cuff making it very difficult to reach the night table. Now I’ve got my whole bed back and can simply tell Alecto set an alarm or turn it off. I can also choose what music I want to wake up too!  I highly recommend the Echo Spot.

author: Meghan Kopp
title: Amazing purchase, great customer service from amazon
content: Our first one was having issues staying connected to the WiFi for the first 3 week’s or so that we had it. Tech support was struggling to figure it out and fix it. They ended up sending us a new one. They didn’t make us return the old one. Customer service with amazon is fantastic. This picks up voice way better than the echo dot, and even the show. They are both connecting to WiFi now. We love it.

author: Nos4nus
title: Echo Spot...
content: I love this thing, considering that I have 3 dots! To be honest, it has, more or less, become a fancy, modern, 21 century alarm clock, that answers questions, more or less, more often than not. I do love the sound, the sound of music because of its speaker system, considering I still use an external bluetooth speaker, every now and then. The screen is too tiny for me, if I wanted to see something in the middle of the night, I would have to find my glasses and that is no easy feat. And I do hate the fact that it does not broadcast YouTube, which I spend many hours watching, usually in regard to camping. As I was reading some questions and answers, someone mentioned that it has no snooze. But, I just read...that you can just ask Alexa to "snooze the alarm"...learned something new today. I have to try it tomorrow morning. I just usually just say stop and then wake up 30 minutes later. Now I have to get the Echo Show, for a better viewing.

author: Steven Fuller
title: You'll miss the support it gives when its not around.
content: Yes, I'm getting older and more absent minded.  These devices (dot and Spot) are an absolute godsend. Anything I want to be reminded of can merely be spoken to the device (while I'm still seated on the couch ) such as "Alexa, remind to call my daughter today at 3:00 p.m."  At 3:00 p.mp. sharp the dot or Spot (I got both) gives a gentle chime and says "Steven, you asked me to remind you to call your daughter today at 3:00"  Similar reminders can be set for virtually anything.  If you want a shopping list you simply say "Alexa, create a shopping list (you can name the list to be store specific) and Alexa will add anything you want.  If you remember something else to add (5 minutes or five days later) you simply say "Alexa, add socks to my Target list." and Alexa will add it (it gives polite verbal confirmation of everything you add.  At anytime you can ask what is on a specific list and Alexa will  verbally run down your entire list.  you can add, delete, change with just verbal command. If you use the Smartphone App your list will appear on your phone for reference when you get to the store.  Plays music, calculates math, finds recipes, etc. all by just asking the question.  Best butler/secretary ever.

author: Sandie Carney
title: Thanks
content: Love my spot! So helpful in so many ways

author: Pat Taliaferro
title: We love it we have had a lot of fun viewing ...
content: This was gift from our grand daughter. We love it we have had a lot of fun viewing people for chats and information requested for stock market updates to joke of the day.

author: Perry Hunter
title: love it! Haven't had too much time to play ...
content: love it!  Haven't had too much time to play with it, but works well so far!

author: Ryan
title: Cool!
content: Fun device. Love the versatility!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: I believe that this is the best Echo, and I have them all.

author: Angela
title: Surprisingly useful!
content: Alexa picks up my voice quite easily and without the need to shout, which I greatly appreciate. I mostly use the Echo and her for the simple things, like turning off my TV without having to find the remote, things like that, and I like having Alexa tell me Star Wars jokes and funny haikus just for giggles. All in all, not a bad Christmas present!

author: Leos S
title: Cannot tilt forward which isn't helpful with video calls unless you stand on top of it.
content:
No option to tilt forward.
When in a sitting position or laying in bed the screen is facing upward. When making video calls you have to hold and tilt the Echo forward in order for the other party to see your face.
I bought a stand which didn't help much since the tilt optim is very minor.

author: D.A. Thomas
title: It's more that just an alarm clock, it's Alexa!
content: Love this device. It's more that just an alarm clock, it's Alexa!

author: Scott
title: Great Alexa Device
content: The Echo Spot is my favorite of the Alexa devices!  It was easy to set up and full of great features. I use it as a clock in a bedroom. It is so easy to set an alarm and be awakened to music of my choice (not to mention the snooze command without having to open my eyes!  It is nice having the screen as a visual for loads of information. The screen is also very clear and connects great with my downstairs security camera. I would recommend this to anyone!

author: PnwThomas
title: Pretty sleek Echo device
content: This is my first Echo device and so far I'm very pleased with it. It replaces my alarm clock which broke but Spot is like an alarm clock on steroids because it looks way sleeker and does a lot more. It plays my Prime Music playlists flawlessly. Now I just have to get used to talking to an AI device, kinda scary how fast technology is advancing. I am going to get some small speakers to improve the sound. I would rate the stand-alone music sound about a four out of five for a compact device like Spot.

author: DarkClown
title: Where's the manual?
content: The product itself seems very well constructed and works very well for everything I have tried to do with it so far. The one complaint I have is the lack of a good manual or set of instructions. I'm quite familiar with Alexa and Echo devices as a whole, but this is my first experience with one that has a screen on it. I'd like I see the documentation specific to this device.

author: Gene Williams
title: ... three Echo Spots and we think that they are fantastic! It is a reliable alarm clock
content:
We have three Echo Spots and we think that they are fantastic!  It is a reliable alarm clock, a video intercom, a source of pop and classical music, a voice-control for certain household lights, a weather station, a timer, a place to keep notes, etc.  Its ability to respond to voice commands is remarkable; it needed no training to recognize my California "accent" and my wife's Alabama speech.  It worked immediately out of the box -- so long as you have a home WiFi setup.
We can set a particular time for weekday alarms (or individual days) and another for either (or both) of the weekend mornings.  A lot of the digital alarm clocks on the market now are too high-pitched for my hearing and so it is great that we can choose among a large number of different kinds of sounds for the alarm.
When I was confined to bed recently, my wife and I used Echo Spots as an intercom system between my location and my wife at the home office which is at some distance away; and we could see each other while talking.
This device deserves five stars and more.  Sure, it doesn't do the washing and ironing, but it does many jobs and it does them well at a reasonable price.  I have no reservations in recommending the Echo Spot.

author: Mrs. Fitz
title: PERFECT - ALARM CLOCK
content:
We have the Echo in the kitchen & Dots in a couple rooms around the house. I love the Shopping List feature, quick answer to any question & the ability to play whatever music, whenever. Also use it as an intercom to talk to hubby in his remote office.
I wanted to replace my always "too bright" alarm clock with one that would reset automatically & wasn't glaringly bright (even in low mode). So I picked up Spot on a Black Friday Deal & really like it.  I love that I can set the alarm by voice, no more struggling with buttons in the dark. The digital numbers are large enough to see without my glasses but not too bright at all. They adjust depending on the light in the room.  I now can wake to whatever song I feel like instead of the scratchy FM music.  I use it as a speaker when I'm upstairs cleaning or doing laundry too. May seem like alot of money for an alarm clock, but I really like it.
In reading some other reviews I have noted some people say they don't want all the "things to try" displayed just the time & weather. I found out how to set mine to this. I actually just set it to the time. No annoying ads or anything else. So it IS do-able. I put one of my favorite family photos on it as the background as well. The screen IS really too small for watching TV as the ad seems to imply. Unless you are 21 with great eye sight.
It's a great alarm clock, looks good on my night stand.

author: Drew Sandberg
title: Really cool
content: Mine was a gift. Better and more accurate than old bedside alarm. Easy to set up and use.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Despite the negative reviews I bought anyway and  LOVE
content: To answer some of the fake news I read on the reviews... They're are no incessant commercials I read about that I habe seem in one week of ownership.  They backlight dims automatically at night , sounds pretty full for the sound.  Does drop bt connection with my speaker... don't know why.  Haven't tested more devices with  it yet.  Customizable enough for me.  Screen was booger than I expected... was worried since I wear glasses.  Happy overall.  Would buy again and want more video options now that I have this one... excited to use this feature.

author: Darius C. Ellis
title: Get  one
content: This makes my 4th Echo  I like the size of it , smaller than the Echo show , I use it in the bed room

author: Bob
title: Five Stars
content: love this device it takes a little time to set up but it works great.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Pfft.
content: Alexa randomly thinks she's being spoken to.  "it's like a..." will typically trigger her.  She's forever trying to cold call random people.  SMH  And she doesn't understand what spa music and all of the obvious names that are associated with soothing spa music (or trap music, for that matter).  So frustrating.  Still trying to figure out if any use can come of this purchase. :(

author: Terrence L. Zabel
title: Love it!
content: Love it!

author: Harry Sachs
title: Cool device but price is way high for limited useability of tiny screen.
content:
I got this to replace an echo Dot I was using in my bedroom mainly for the clock feature. After a couple weeks with it I love the clock feature but that's about all the little screen is good for. Amazon needs to come up with something else that works well for a small screen to make this thing worth the money.

Sound quality is nothing special. Mine is hooked up to an external speaker like the dot was before but I did notice that the sound before hooking up to the speaker was better than the dot but nowhere near my echo. The sound quality doesn't justify the price.

Camera? Not sure why it has one other than adjusting the brightness on its best feature, the clock. I was hoping to be able to do a video drop in to the babies room or recordable motion sensor security camera functionality or anything useful but no such functionality is available yet.

Overall it is a good looking addition to the echo family but I don't think it is near worth the price tag. I feel like I just spent $130 on a nice looking bedside clock with little unique functionality over the dot it replaced.

author: Vay Mar Bel
title: Such a handce
content: There isn't anything that I dislike about my echo spot.  It is in my kitchen where I use it for music, news, information and most of all recipes.  I love the headlines that appear and most of them are quite interesting.  I use it daily.  Having an echo dot, I may have to change her wake name so they both don't answer.  I took advantage of the sale that offered the two at a discount and gave one to my daughter.  We love talking on it and it had a nice picture.  The sound quality if really great.  Much more depth than the spot.  However, I love them both.  I also have the show.  Will try to add a picture later.

author: APDiMarino
title: Five Stars
content: wish it was brighter or had a option to make the screen bright.

author: ScottS
title: Love this device
content: Love this device. Should have gotten one sooner but the price was great. Love using it as an alarm and of course all the other talents echo has.

author: Daniel padilla
title: Great value, best alarm
content: Every bedroom has one of these now, all my kids use it as in alarm clock for school plus I can video call them individually or they use it as a radio.

author: Ronald Matten
title: More useful than standard Echo or Echo dot.
content:
This is much more useful than the original Echo. I have both. I am able to pull up my ring cameras. I was able to ditch the bedside alarm clock, because it shows a clock face and is very good at setting alarms.I was concerned about the sound, but the sound is quite good. I do not need an external speaker. I can play relaxing sounds prior to bed, which helps me sleep. I would give this 4 starts, but I realize the product is evolving and therefore supplied an additional star.
I relocated the original echo to the living room and I can use the two devices as an intercom.

author: ClearBlueDigital
title: My favorite of all the echo devices
content: I have a first-generation echo, two Echo dots, for fire TVs, Two Fire tablets and this new Echo spot. The echo spot is a home run! I love this little thing. I'm able to do video calling with my girlfriend who has one of them as well. The sound output from this thing is better than I expected but I use it to connect to my Sonos Play speakers and it's awesome! I love the ability to set the alarm and have it wake you up to any music you want. That's very cool. I love being able to drop in on my kids rooms or downstairs using the spot. It's a pretty sexy looking alarm clock too. It looks damn good on my nightstand. And even though I wouldn't say this is the greatest device for watching videos, it is pretty cool that it has that capability. I'm totally sold on the Echo of products and this spot just solidifies that for me. If you've been thinking about getting one of these, just do it! I promise you will not regret it. I'm only regretting why it took me so long to buy one :-)

author: Loretta D Grable
title: Easy to set up with the Alexa App.
content: I’m amazed at how much you can find out about almost everything. It plays songs at you request. Truly amazing.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Compact and easy to use
content: We purchased this to go along with our other Alexa enabled devices.  The camera is slow to turn on and focus right away but has great reception once it warms up.

author: Auntie Nanny
title: Cute & Helpful
content: I like that this has such a small footprint on my night table. It is cute and of course Alexa is as always extremely helpful turning off the lights at night and giving me news and weather in the morning. I like the visuals, if I wake in the night I can easily see the time.

author: Jamal swann
title: Worth the buy. No instructions
content: Zo juzt bought 4 of these and i like the product seems to work gfeat but.......we're are the insfrucrions my god this thing is very difficult to set up im not talking about the initial setup i mean setting ul numbers and calling features . All i can say is take your time and use youtube . Also privacy out the door fof instance someone could acess your phone book and call people at anytime. .

author: Elissa K. O'leary
title: My new favorite Alexa!
content: This is a fabulous little device. I love using it in the bedroom. It is loud for how small it is. All the greatness of Alexa in a small package. Well built. I really love it.

author: Savannah Greenfield
title: Waste of Money
content: This product is a complete waste of money. When you ask Alexa a question "she" either doesn't know the answer, gives you the wrong answer or finds information off of Wikipedia!

author: Bryan B.
title: Great product, love it
content: Works great, sound is loud, video is clear.  I recommend purchasing this but make sure to get the accessory to hold it so the sound is louder.

author: heywatchit
title: Great addition to the Echo line but buttons should be easy to operate by feel alone
content: I have had the original Echo since early 2015 and the original Echo Dot since it was released so I consider myself an Echo veteran. I love these devices and use them to listen to music and control various connected devices in our home like lights, plugs, doorbells and Nest products. The Spot seemed like a natural to replace the Echo Dot and old school alarm clock on my nightstand. I really like how the face gets sufficiently dark at night so it does not distract you from sleeping.
