title: Offline
content: This product doesnt work it says its offline in the app and its not so it wont play any music or spotify becayse it cant link to account and there is no fix for this.  So if you order it dont even bother to unbox it just place it straight in the trash....  have lots of alexa speakers big fan otherwise.

author: Wes
title: Great for all ages!
content: I enjoy using mine every day. The search function is not as robust as Google but it is great to have around the house. I've been using it to help my 6 year old daughter learn to read. She tells Alexa to play her favorite Disney songs and she follows the words right along on the screen. Wish automation accessories would come down in price. Would love to get some hue bulbs to go with Alexa. All in all great experience.

author: Kindle Customer
title: It seems safer with the stand.
content: It makes it a little more stable sitting on the counter. It looks classy too.

author: Losingaltitude
title: The best echo yet!
content: I love my spot! It looks so great in my bedroom and does everything my other Echos does with the benefits of a touch screen! As soon as they slim down the echo show I will buy one of those too!

author: PackerBacker
title: Disappointing user experience for the $$$
content:
Pretty limited in what it brings to the table... much more than anticipated.  Watching video isn't great.  No YouTube.  Doesn't not reliably connect to my Ring camera, which is pretty much a deal-breaker if that doesn't improve fast.

Beyond that, the lack of customization to the display (can't have time and weather on constantly??) - as well as the dull yet rather bright hue still emitted even in night mode.

Was really looking forward to this being released, but it has not lived up to my expectations at all.  Might be returning it.  Like noted above, it fails to connect to Ring sometimes, and that is the only "cool" / worthwhile advantage this would seem to have over a regular Dot that is $100 cheaper.

author: L. Foxwell
title: What Fun!
content: Alexa is a lot of fun! Love he stories, songs and wisdom...LOL. We have had the Dot for a year and now the Spot. We got it to go with Blink and the camera relays the picture to Alexa just fine. So far so good!

author: P. Ericksen
title: My favorited Alexa device
content:
It just arrived today but of all of my Echo devices (several Dots and an standard Echo) I like the spot the most. I placed this one in my bedroom and it's nice because it's like an alarm clock on steroids. It just quietly sits and displays the time but is ready to respond like any of the other devices.

I do like having a screen for what I use my Echos for the most, including:
* Timers and calculations (they'll show on the screen)
* Asking questions answered by web searches and it's nice to have the screen able to display multiple running timers,
* Yelp rating and address for local business you asked about
* "Who starred in..." Images of actors from movies you ask about it'll pull from wikipedia, etc.
* I also use my Echos to control Philips Hue lights, but nothing shows on the screen for that.
* It's also great for re-ordering because you can see on screen that it knows what you mean.

The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that with trends in electronics design, the size of the bezel dates the tech, the larger the bezel, the older it is and that is a trend across all devices with screens: cell phones, tablets, televisions. So, right out of the box, it already has a more dated feel by not having edge-to-edge screen.

author: Elizabeth Herd
title: Love the touch screen!
content: Absolutely love this  I use it for so many things. I really like being able to see the lyrics as the songs play.

author: badmonkey
title: More useful then i expected it to be.
content:
So far i'm impressed with the usability and quality of the SPOT Echo.  The sound quality is far better then the tinny sounding Dot version and the screen makes it far more useful.  My only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the silly round screen that is just for design resigns and makes the already very small display even smaller so it can fit square videos/pictures.  I thought only Apple prioritized design over function!

I also waited until it was on sale as the normal $130 is a bit much for what it actually is and the main purpose i bought it for.

author: Alex
title: You are welcome and thank you for listening!
content: In a matter of minutes it became indispensable addition to our house. Extrimelly useful hub of information, music, automation, communication, and assistant in basic needs. Would love to have a voice personalization. Some things are better not to said aloud but typed (like door unlocking codes) but that is problem of unwitty developers. So far only positive experience. The privacy invasions is happened way before Alexa, it is on your phone no matter brand or carrier. To Alexa defence at list it has a button to turn a microphone off.

author: Alan Krupnik
title: One of the best variations of the line of echoes.
content: By far one of the best variations of the echo. This is the perfect replacement for my old clock. I love how it’s also a music player and can answer my questions during my gaming sessions. One think that would be great would be YouTube support. So you could play content and YouTube exclusive music not on Spotify, Pandora, etc. Overall very great Amazon product and would recommend!

author: Anuar Alarcon
title: Simply amazing!
content: Simply amazing! The exact point between an echo dot and the echo show. The spot is amazing, beautiful to look at, and with the right skills this is a great Alexa!

author: Steven M
title: Near-Perfect Bedside Alarm Clock
content:
I bought this for my bedside table to use as an alarm clock because my Echo Show was taking up too much space, and, for the purpose I was using it for, the Show’s screen was a lot bigger than I needed.

Pros:
- perfect size: I was worried it might be too small or too big based on different reviews I had seen, but it somehow manages to be neither.
- very attractive looking: all of my Echo products are white, as it goes better with all the white trim in our house. I was a bit worried about getting the white Spot because in all the pictures, the speaker grill around the bottom seemed so noticeable compared to the black. However, I went with the white, and it really looks great. Its definitely more attractive than the original Echo or the Show.
-clock faces: these are an upgrade in a way from the Show, which doesn’t emphasize the clock functionality. I do hope that the clock faces become even more customizable, but even as they are I really like them.
-night-time mode: automatically switches the clock face to a softer presentation so there are no bright colors

Neutral:
-speaker sound: the sound is lacking in bass, but what would you expect for such a small device? I’ve paired mine with a 2nd generation Echo, and together they sound great.
-3.5 mm audio jack: the Show doesn’t have this, which is okay because the Show is the best sounding Echo, so external speakers aren't all that necessary. If you want better sound with the Spot and you care about multi-room audio, however, you’ll be happy to have this feature since multi-room audio doesn’t work with paired Bluetooth external speakers. I personally do not plan on using the jack as I don’t want another wire coming out the back of the device that will make it less convenient to reposition depending on whether I’m in bed or whether I need to see it from other parts of the room while getting ready.

Wishlist:
-more clock faces / more customization options
-have an auto shut-off for the screen after a certain amount of inactivity. My Show does this and comes back to life when it detects motion in the room. If the Spot can do this, I haven’t found the setting for it yet (with the Show, you have to turn off the ambient clock).
-"try this" feature: I’d like to be able to disable this in the home cards settings. You can control a lot of individual cards, but not this one. The only way to minimize it is to have the cards rotate once and then stay on the clock until your next interaction. I'd prefer to have it cycle between the clock and the temperature, but in order to do that, I also have to have it show me the "try this" card, which gets old after a while.

All in all, I love this new member of the Echo family. It makes so much more sense as a bedside alarm clock than the Show, and it let me repurpose my Show in another room where I wanted more sound quality.

author: hector
title: Not Impressed
content: The camera is not great at all. Is not really simple to get stuff linked to interact with it. And call quality is not great either.

author: Vikki Y
title: My first Echo product and I love it!
content: I bought this as part of a promotion during Prime Day - I have been eyeing the Spot for the last months since I needed a new alarm clock. My old digital alarm clock has been giving me a problem and instead of buying a traditional digital alarm clock, I thought it was time to move on to a "smarter" one and chose the Echo Spot. Besides the usual Echo features, I'm going to focus on the Spot's feature as a clock. I love that I can change the clock face to whichever I like. The Spot also dims during night hours, which you can choose the range on. It automatically brightens when you turn on the light at night so can you see the time. By default, the Spot's face displays the time like a traditional digital clock. As for the alarm, it can only only set one alarm at a time (by saying, "Alexa, set the alarm to 7AM" among other variations) so when you need a different alarm after your first time, it will erase your earlier set alarm - which is fine, since setting up the alarm is so easy anyway. It can also set up timers and other features. You can choose the sound/tune you listen to as well. This is pretty much the smartest alarm clock you'll get, among the other things this Spot can do (make calls, face time, play music via blue tooth, read to you, etc.). I love this and I would recommend this to anyone who wants to go "smart."

author: Siege
title: 3 and counting...
content: We are a total Amazon Echo family. So much so that we seem to have a few of everything. We like the Echo Spot so much that there is one in every bedroom of our house. They look great and function well. What more needs to be said? Hope this helps. Cheers!

author: scooterapd
title: Perfect for bedroom
content:
Likes: Appearance, ability to view Ring doorbell from bedroom and to watch newsflashes.

So-So: Sound - would be nice if it had better sound.

Overall: This was the perfect new Echo addition for my bedroom. It is now my alarm clock and multi-purpose bedroom smart device.

author: texg1rl
title: Limited view - Advertisements ————— never ending
content: Omg, I get it now. Constant poop advertised bigger than the time. I tried the swipe down to get it stop.... ugh no it’s back in 30seconds seriously the dot is better. I got this to keep an eye on the dogs but limited view is sad I can keep an eye on them by the food bowl.

author: Aline B. Leo
title: The Echo Spot is a joy to own
content:
The echo spot now has a place of honor in my kitchen......it's just the right size to be unobtrusive but also easy to see.
It's takes the place of my clock, stereo/CD player, cooking companion, dictionary, newspaper and dozens of other
companions.  It is so easy to set up and use.....even I was able to master it in no time.  I don't know how I got along
without having my Echo Spot.

author: PA
title: Nice Internet appliance
content: Clean design, easy to operate.  I look forward to learning more Alexa commands to extend this beyond a great clock radio.

author: bambooligan
title: Great product for Alexa
content: Have these in each of our bedrooms. Easy to read  display. Very easy to use can set alarms with the Alexa app on iPhone. Can use  to communicate from each Alexa device. Has some fun trivia games and etc. Able to play music! Can connect to Nest thermostat and Ring door bell. Great product from Amazon with capabilities that are amazing.

author: JKJ
title: Great for small rooms !
content: Great product, work as expected!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Family Fun
content: We love all of our Alexa products. Clear connection and fun to use.  Now that my youngest daughter has the Echo Spot and she tends to sleep thru her morning alarm I will now be able to "drop in" on her with a motivating wake up call...perhaps the Army bugle call!

author: enricoclaudio
title: Great Piece Of Technology!!
content:
This is my first Echo product so I have no way to compare it with other Echo devices but the Echo Spot is really great. It does what is suppose to do and more, period. People who complaint about sound quality have zero idea of physics. Expecting this little thing to sound like a high end stereo system is plain stupid. For its size, it sound really well. If I want good sound then I go to my high end music system and ask the Echo Spot to play music for me. I had no issues setting it up to control my Nest Thermostat and Lutron Caseta system. I got two Echo Spot, one for my bedroom and one for my living room. On each room I have a Harmony Elite remote. It took me some time to figure how to setup two Harmony hubs with to Echos but after some Googling and reading on forums I got them working right with the two Echos in the same Amazon account and the two Harmony Elite remotes in the same Harmony account as well. As a nightstand alarm clock is just perfect. Really glad I waited for the Spot to get into the Echo ecosystem. 100% recommended!!

UPDATE Jan 10th, 2018: After few days working with my two Echo Spots, I found it's very glitchy. The slideshow doesn't work all the time. Sometimes just stays in clock mode even that I has it in Continues mode. Looks like it detects motion so if nobody is near the Spot the home screen remains on the clock. Same thing happens with the night mode dim function. I have mine set to night mode at 10 pm and back to to full at 7 am. Well today was 11:30 pm and that thing was full bright still then as soon I moved in front of it, it changed to night mode. I'm lowering the score to 4 hopping that a firmware update solve these annoying glitches.

UPDATE Jun 4th 2018: After 6 months with the Spot, I can say that this thing is just GREAT!! After a few updates, there are no glitches and now it has LOT of clock faces to choose from. This is by far the best alarm clock you can have in your nightstand.

author: Jacob K.
title: A smart clock that has trouble displaying time.
content: Everything is good except I can’t seem to get Alexa tips to stop popping up over the clock face. Nothing is more annoying then glancing up at a $130 smart clock that’s not telling the time. Turned off all home screen options except the clock and it still does it. Will probably get to calling amazon about it when I have time and enough energy to deal with their customer service of late. It’s worth 5 stars if I can get the thing to stay on the time.

author: MJD
title: Five Stars
content: great product like being able to personalize it as well

author: CrashDad
title: Love my Echo Spot!
content: Love my Echo Spot. The Echo Spot was is a great addition to my home and other Echo devices. The screen is pretty cool. Still looking for more uses. Give lyrics on Amazon Prime Music and shows info when items are added to shopping list and when you get weather updates. Wish flash news updates included more videos. Still lots of potential. The speaker on the Spot is better than Dots but not as good as my original Echo. Overall I’m really happy with the Echo Spot!

author: Riley
title: Good Performance
content:
I bought this when i was in NYC and since then returned to Cape Town, South Africa. The set up was simple and quick. There are a lot of features that need a Prime membership and Alexa sometimes gets a little confused but overall good performance.
Very pleased with the purchase, good buy.

author: Faye Hedrick
title: Echo spot helps me keep organized ...
content: I like the echo spot helps me to keep organized

author: Robin James
title: Sing along!
content:
Xmas present for my 30yo son. He loves it so I bought another for myself.
It fits really well on my desk at home.  When playing music the words to the song appear on the screen so you can sign along....sounds crazy but it's fun.

author: curliq29
title: Helpful
content: I love my echo spot! Love the fact she lists recipes on the screen, I can watch the news while I'm in the kitchen if I need to!

author: Ruth G
title: Best Bedside Clock ever!
content: I am really enjoy the screen and the convenient size for bedside.  It is a cheerful way to wake up in the morning.

author: D. Villanueva
title: Fun device
content: I haven't explored its full potential, but it has been a fun device so far.  Word and research say it can control my Ring system, and if I install thermostats that can speak to Alexa, it can control temperatures in my home too.  Lights as well.

author: M. Stephenson
title: Perfect smart alarm clock.
content: Perfect for night table alarm. I did block the camera however.

author: Chris Hamilton
title: Fantastic bedside clock!
content: Works as a great bedside clock, radio and information service for my wife.  Audio quality is quite good for such a small package.

author: Michael
title: Love it!!
content: Awesome gadget!! It’s fun to play around with and does a lot for such a little thing. I’m thinking about getting another one for downstairs. I like playing the Games with Alexa. Especially question of the day. Learn a lot actually. Like how you can have a background of your own pictures and they change every few minutes. Easy setup!!! Which I loved about it. No issues really except once awhile Alexa taking and she skips here and there.

author: Alan Silverstein
title: works like a charm
content: works like a charm, easy set up, good quality video, good speaker for its size - perfect for the bedroom. Looking forward to more watch faces in the next upgrades.

author: John Gallagher
title: Great to play with and use.
content: Great to use and learn how to automate the home as part of a Wink 2 system.

author: Shah
title: Great device but needs more screen optimization
content: The Echo spot works well but the Alarm function, for example, should let you define multiple days it should repeat instead of just "weekdays" or "every Monday." There should be a basic web browser so Alexa can open websites. There should be more clock faces than just the 6 provided which use fairly similar fonts for digital. YouTube is not supported yet due to issues between Amazon and Google. Arlo and Ring integrations are useful when they work.

author: M. H.
title: Manually set the alarm
content: Not happy.  Cant set the alarm after I climb into bed.  I cant wake my wife by talking, so there needs to be a way to set the alarm on the touch screen.  I dont sleep with iphone at bedside, so no access to the alexa app.  So you either have to get out of bed or wake your wife to set the alarm.  Make a manual access to alarm settings please and ill adjust my review

author: Steve Lucas
title: Worked fine until it didn’t.
content: Quit working already. Reset to factory and started all over. Still, all I can get is; “Sorry, something went wrong.”  It almost lasted a whole month. Great while it worked.

author: guru4you
title: Best alarm ever!
content: I bought it to use as an alarm clock.  The echo dot was not loud enough to wake me.  The original full size echo was loud enough but I had to sit up to get it to hear my voice over the alarm.  (I sleep pretty soundly)  This little guy is lound enough and the display face allowed be to get rid of my clock radio also.  I am pleased.

author: Alberto
title: Lotsa fun
content: It is my first smart device and we all enjoy it

author: Jeffrey Picard
title: I'm Lovin' It!
content: I bought an Echo Spot primarily to use as a bedside alarm, but it's so much more! I'm new to the Amazon Alexa world so I'm still learning just what this thing can do, but it's so much more than an alarm clock: Waking up in the morning with instant access to my weather, calendar, news feeds and music is awesome. Sound quality is on a par with a few of the mini Bluetooth speakers that I've seen and the screen quality is quite good. My few quibbles are minor: The adjustable stand should have been included with the Spot. As an option, it's WAY overpriced. Also, manually accessing a few features needs to more intuitive (volume, alarm controls). One additional thing: My wife discovered that Alexa could bark and meow! The Echo Spot now gets my dog's stamp of approval too!

author: LavenderLady 62
title: Just right for me.
content:
I love my ECHO Spot.  It is just right for me to sits on my table next to me in my bedroom.  I was struggling to buy the Spot or the Echo Show.  I made the right decision.  I don't have a large house nor do I have small children living with me.  I find this is just perfect and very personal.  No one will see this but me.  I love that.  If I had the Show it would be located in a main Family room.  This is just in my room.

I also like the fact that you can change the color of your clock, change it from digital to analog and also change how you want the streaming of Things to Try. It's easy, just swipe down on your screen and go to settings.  There you can make all the changes you want.  I love when I play Pandora every song is seen by title and author on the screen.  You did not get this with the Echo Dot.  The more I find out, the more I am in love with the ECHO spot.

  Thanks Amazon.

author: Alysha
title: Best choice I could have made getting this!
content: Any review that says bad things about this item is a lie. It sets alarms, plays music with lyrics on screen, makes lists, displays clock etc. love it.

author: CAN100
title: had enough of this piece of amazon crap
content:
over one hundred dollars......just to get bombarded with stuff from amazon.  that crosses the line.  would be a great item...size, features...but the damn "ask Alexa" scrolls are pure junk.  fix this......or it is off too google or apple for something that does not annoy me every time I see it.

a buy a lot of stuff from amazon...but this is the most customer insensitive thing I have seen.  DO NOT BUY ONE.  LOOK Elsewhere for better assistants........trust me, you do not want to drop this money just to get 24/7 advertising.......crap product....crap concept (think they can scam customers), crap that they have had years to fix it and are tone deaf to the issue.  it is about time customers start pushing back on amazon.....or all we will get is more self serving junk pushed to our homes.

author: Cass
title: Do not connect your contacts, otherwise I love it.
content:
I love having the spot on my bedside table. I use it as an alarm clock and to listen to music or rain sounds before bed. I also point it at my dogs kennel before work and I can check on her to make sure she's not anxious.

One thing I really don't like is that I accidentally connected my contacts on my phone and there is NO WAY to remove them apparently. Even after revoking the permission (now it just bugs me to regive it every time.) I have absolutely ZERO intention of ever using this device to make calls or contact other people in any way and it frankly makes me very uncomfortable that Amazon has this information with no way for me to remove it.

author: Stephen A. Washburn
title: Video calling
content: Really enjoying the echo spot. Much better than a spot.

author: DMAN
title: MY kids love it
content: I like it fine but my kids love it. They're always asking it random questions and to play music. It's entertaining to say the least. We enjoy the magic 8 ball and jeopardy feature.

author: Steve Moose
title: it’s been a great nightstand companion
content: So far, it’s been a great nightstand companion. Wakes me up in the morning and even lets me snooze a little. No regrets buying this whatsoever

author: AKD
title: Good sound quality, but not needed if you own an Alexa dot.
content: I didn’t really need to upgrade my dot, but this was on sale and I jumped on the opportunity. So far, I’ve enjoyed it. I’m a visual type of person, so being able to see stuff on the spot has been nice. My only complaint with the spot are the “thing trending” and “try” that pops up continuously. It doesn’t bother me, but it’d be nice if it just stayed on a lock screen with the date, time, and weather. But the sound quality on it is 10x better than the dot. But if you have the dot and really don’t hve any complaints about it, there’s no need to upgrade to the spot.

author: Andrew D
title: As my first Alexa centric device I give it a... meh
content: Pretty pricey for a clock. Alexa always hears my words right but struggles with turning that into meaningful actions. Something I didn’t realize when I purchased is that this device has a camera which has made my partner very nervous. It’s a horrible camera so I’m not sure what it would be good for. Removing it would make for a better and cheaper device

author: zimmy
title: Perfect
content: Use this next to our bed as an alarm clock, etc.  Very impressed with the options.

author: Sascha
title: Spot On!
content:
I have owned every type of Echo, except for the Look.  This one is hands down my favorite.  It is about the size of an Echo Dot (just a bit bigger).  The black one looks truly sharp on a nightstand.  My worry was that it would be too bright at night.  However, there is a setting to have it be truly dim within certain hour ranges.  The screen is very sharp.  Much like the Show, I find it useful to see the cards for weather, lyrics for songs, etc. when asking for information.  Amazon definitely has a winner on their hands here.  Best alarm clock ever.

My only criticisms are the following:

* Screen is too small watch a video (my phone's screen is far larger, and I simply use that).
* Setup for Bluetooth is confusing.  On my other Echos, this is done in the Alexa app.  Here, it is done by asking the Echo to "open settings".
* Knowing to ask Alexa to "open settings" is not really well publicized.  I only knew to do so from having an Echo Show.

However, none of these criticisms detract from what is an amazing product.  Happy to give 5 stars.

author: TC IN ETN
title: The most "High Tech" clock you could own!
content:
I am amazed at how much better the Echo Spot is, compared to the Dot. I use this as my nightstand clock, and information device. The default clock face is reminiscent of this old time clocks that was used back in the 60's and 70's. I can wake to the news, weather and traffic reports, or any other customized information I want.
By using the Cloud Camera placed in a window, I can monitor my driveway and yard. All in all, I wish Amazon had the Spot available from the beginning of the Echo device series. I have recommended this to friends and business associates. Everyone who bought one, are very happy with their purchase.

author: Rolando B.
title: It’s nice
content: I love Echo Product, this is awesome the only issues are the sound quality and the camera speed

author: Peter Greene
title: The Spot is the first, best Smart Alarm Clock (at least!)
content: I've had my Spot for several weeks now.  I really love it!  I use mine in the bedroom.  The black and white analog clock face is my favorite so far. The sound is fine for its size.  The video can be fun at bed time.  I search for short videos I can watch for a few minutes while I'm relaxing.  The Spot is heavier than I expected, which I like as it stays put where you set it.  I imagine the Spot is useful in other settings but for me it makes the best alarm clock ever!  I'm hoping to order a second one soon just for traveling!

author: danielle newman
title: Great for ederly but difficult to allow access to others on alexa app
content: I bought this for my mother n law who struggles with memory and couldn't figure out a cell phone. The instructions are lacking and it's near impossible to get others set up to be able to "drop in". I have to leave notes taped up to help her remember what to say. But she gets so excited when I "drop in" and she can see me. She also likes that she can listen to music. I added photos using the Amazon drive app. It does every thing I wanted and then some. Highly recommend it. Just wish they made it easier to set up others on the Alexa app.

author: bsg85
title: whhhhat
content: this thing has a mind of it's own and it won't stop repeating the morning flash briefing to me. i'm a tech-savvy person and have tried everything, looked in every forum, downloaded apps to help with alexa's skills and still no luck. i literally ONLY get the flash briefing every morning out of this and occasionally the time if i look over at it. i'm so mad i spent my money on it :(

author: MG551
title: Love the spot
content: Love the spot!  I have other (non)screen echoes and I like them too but the spot is by far my favorite.  I can have my local tv stations added to my flash briefing and watch the news.

author: kathleen michalowicz
title: Amazingly great gadget for all ages
content: Amazingly great gadget for all ages. Only thing I wished would happen is a follow up on the how to use to utmost potential. I had to delete from my e mails so kids did not see what was baught

author: Jean Krohn
title: IT IS JUST LIKE HAVING A NEW BEST FRIEND!
content: It is just the best thing ever in a compact size....whatever did I do before I got this?

author: browncoat2511
title: Possible Small Piece of Black Tape Required
content: Best alarm clock we've ever had. Hopefully no one is peeking through that camera. Rawr.

author: BSC
title: Hubby Likes Technology Upgrade
content: Got this for my hubby to replace alarm clock and to play music....He lives it!

author: Heather
title: Needs some work
content:
Update: Amazon contacted me and helped put additional content filters on the device. They also are working to get FreeTime available for the spot and train their reps on how to assist with these content issues with media in the future. I still advocate there should be additional information that is VERY specific for protecting our children from adult content. Like a handout card in the box, or a video that shows you how to put additional filters on the device. It’s 2018. Every parent with children has this in their list of requirements for media at home.

How miserable. 10pm at night and my 4 year old is able to access rated R content. What’s worse, free time isn’t available for this devise, making it impossible to filter ANY content for children. Epic fail Amazon. I’ll be throwing this in the trash, since you’re unwilling to allow a return or exchange.

author: Scott G. Newman
title: Better than the echo
content: I like this better than the echo. Better form factor, sounds pretty good as well.

author: laura
title: Four Stars
content: Will not play NPR

author: Steve S.
title: Not really Useful, Won't do Anything Video Except Screen Saver things
content: I tried and tried to really Use the Echo Spot, but it's Not Doing any Video things At All, because it won't use My Amazon Prime Account

author: familyBusyness
title: Fun to use.  Probably better if you can afford lots of Alexa-compatible accessories
content:
We got 1 Alexa Spot and 1 Alexa Dot a few months ago.  It can do a lot of great things, but honestly, we mostly use it as a  $130 timer.  We also have it hooked up to a couple of Hunter Symphony ceiling fans.  IF you can get the phone app to connect to the fans, Alexa will step in and it's really convenient to control our ceiling fans with voice commands.

hooking up our garage door or light switches to Alexa sounds really convenient, but $20 per light switch and garage door accessories that require monthly/annual fees isn't very appealing to me.

If you can afford to deck out your house with Alexa accessories, you can probably do some great stuff.  IMHO, just getting an Alexa device by itself probably isn't worth it.

author: Shelley P.
title: The perfect size
content: This is the perfect size for my office desk.  I love that once I synced my calendar it displays my daily schedule and upcoming meetings.

author: rryan
title: this is a terrific little device!
content: i love the convenience, the video options, the easy bluetooth. and it’s a clock if i want it to be! brilliant. :)

author: AAM
title: Five Stars
content: Just like the echo show but much smaller.  Great on a night stand by the bed.

author: Can I make payments
title: It's great And people are impressed with it I think I ...
content: It's great  And people are impressed with it I think I may have sold a couple...also have the large one next to my bed ..gave some out for Christmas  To family in Tennessee great picture I live in California

author: Joshua
title: Good product
content: Great product, and i like the screen for a alarm clock

author: Brian
title: The best thing you never knew you needed.
content: For me, this thing is simply awesome.  I have it in my bedroom to take the place of my bulky alarm clock.  I go to sleep nightly with various ambient sounds and wake in the morning to crickets chirping as my alarm.  It is my most favorite purchase in a long time.

author: wlc3116
title: Alexa is outstanding
content: I am pleasantly surprised that I now have instant knowledge and more with Alexa.

author: Riggie
title: Handy Device!
content:
This is one great handy little device! I really love the fact that I can set the alarm simply by telling Echo Spot what time I want to wake up. When I wake up in the morning I can automatically get the weather report and get a news update. You can also set reminders with this device which really comes in handy. With the smart plugs that I have installed on my lights I can also have Eccles Spot turn on and off my lights at my command. There are also other features with Echo Spot that I have not yet used. I love my Echo Spot and without any hesitation would buy it again.

Frank!

author: Insp Gadget
title: Like it a lot
content: Works great. Love the screen.  The things to try scoll is annoying but there is a setting to minimize the when the Things to Try scroll appears.  The dimming at night is perfect

author: Gerald Jankowitz
title: Close but no cigar
content:
The echo dot is a very nice member of the alexa suite. It seems to be slightly deaf, however.
This spoils the overall utilization of the device. One has to talk to the front of the "SPOT" If you try to call alexa from the side or back it is deaf.
I like the display, but the "alexa dot" as well as the "alexa" can hear my commands from all sides both front and back.  This makes for a more interesting and effective device

author: Rob Trice
title: The fact that Amazon doesn’t give you complete control over ...
content: The fact that Amazon doesn’t give you complete control over what content appears on the screen is a major design flaw. Buy it if you want Amazon to have a billboard in your house. Otherwise, don’t buy this product.

author: billyS
title: some products exceed your expectation
content: How did I live without this.  Probably would not buy dots because the screen is so useful...words to songs playing, temp, time, video news clips,....really fun to use.

author: hotheelbetty
title: Perfect size for the best alarm clock in the world.
content: This is the most fantastic alarm clock ever (I know it is much more, but it lives on my nightstand), I love the daily briefing as I am getting ready, I love the video capabilities. I can not wait for all the features that will come out for this product!

author: Vitin
title: Black or White Spot
content: Great idea plays music shows pictures of items to buy.  You can dim watch to not distract you from sleeping at night. Alexa is great for all kinds of personal assistance.

author: Rique1972
title: Getting help from Amazon support to help me trouble shoot the pairing issue with my Denon receiver
content:
After my first setup of the Echo Spot it would not pair up with my Denon AVR. The Echo Spot paired up with my laptop and my phone, but no matter what I tried it wouldn't pair with the receiver. I tried pairing through the Echo Spot and the Alexa app, but the Denon receiver would not appear. I was able to easily pair the receiver with my Echo Dot...it paired up within seconds.

Thankfully I was contacted by Amazon support after leaving my first review of the Echo Spot where I described the pairing issue. I was contacted by Amazon support the following morning. They suggested I try to restore the Echo Spot to it's factory default settings. I restored the Echo Spot and went through the setup process and then finally tried pairing the Echo Spot and the Denon again. This time the Denon appeared on the list of devices and paired up within seconds. Thank you to the Amazon support team for reaching out so quickly and helping fix the pairing issue.

author: J. Pittman
title: Five Stars
content: Really like the images and song lyrics.

author: P. S. Mulready
title: Fabulous device!
content: I love this little thing!  It's the most important part of my morning, and keeps me fascinated and amused in the evenings.  I keep learning new stuff about it all the time.  I just used it to make a video call to my sister!  Better than Skype!  I wonder what she'd say if I said, "Alexa, I think I love you."

author: Belle Madame
title: I'm not enjoying it. Evho is not answering my ...
content: I'm not enjoying it. Evho is not answering my questions properly all the time. I need more time. Still experiencing some technical difficulties

author: melissa wiles
title: Lots of fun
content: I really like this. Ask for a recipes, displayed on the screen. Say Alexa, good morning, she tells you the event of the day, and weather. I use her to set my reminders. She will alert, and say out loud, and also show on my phone. Also plays games, can say Alexa, order Tide for me. Places order to Amazon. Can still listen to music while looking at recipes. Connect to blue tooth from my phone. Can access  through phone from a different room. Can also  connect to my dots.

author: Adalina
title: Great gift
content: My husband LOVED getting this for Christmas! He was amazed that it was already connected to our account and he didn't have to do anything. We use it at least 6 times a day. From times, reminders, watching a show, a quick look at the days news, weather forecasts, calling each other, ect.

author: capnpik
title: Great small version.
content: Small, but works great for the location that I wanted it for. Don't expect it to have the sound and volume as the others, but the sound is ok and so is the volume.

author: barnet walker
title: Like it very much
content: Love it. The display of what's playing. Very nice. Thank u

author: deej
title: Buy an Echo Show instead
content: I didn’t realize it was as small as it is. Don’t bother with the Spot and go ahead and get the Echo Show. Other than the size it is fine.

author: Anthony
title: Great addition to my Echo family
content: So I've been slowly adding smart devices to my apartment and have loved using Alexa over Google Home and Siri. I figured for my bedroom, I'd get the Echo Spot because I could use it as a visual alarm clock and see what's going on instead of just hearing it. It's a great addition to my morning routine, but the only thing preventing me giving it 5 Stars is it's sound quality. I have an Echo Dot Get 3 and the speaker quality is much louder and clearer than this spot. Maybe this will be updated soon, but the Dot has better sound.

author: Sheila Borger
title: Terrific for my elderly father.
content: I was given an echo spot for Christmas and thought it was cute, but what has really made it wonderful was giving one to my 88 year old dad, and having his echo spot signed up to our account. We can chat with each other every morning, face-to-face over a cup of coffee. It's great!  Since he is alone, he loves that the echo spot will greet him at the beginning and end of each day and tell him a joke.

author: Janet
title: Nice to wake up to!
content: I use it for my alarm clock mostly.  I did watch a movie once on it.  Not bad for a little screen.  Overall I really enjoy using it.  Once in awhile I ask Alexa questions that she cannot answer but that is o.k..  She at least answers the more important ones.

author: Suzzy Parker
title: Live my Echo Spot
content: I love this Spot.  I bought this for my spare bedroom so I could have a clock and all the advantages that Alexa has to offer.  I have it connected to my Sonos speaker and I can play music or get my news flash briefing whenever I want.  Works like a champ!  You can turn the screen off if you don’t want it on.

author: Laurence Diggs
title: Great product...👍🏾
content: Nothing I set it up in the bathroom and it’s the right size....

author: klm
title: In over a year Amazon still hasn't given this the option to disable Things to Try screen.
content: When you look at this 1/3 of the time you get the Things to try screen and have to wait for it to cycle just to see time or weather.  I will not purchase another until this happens. I don't understand why Amazon just doesn't give and option to do that........

author: David G
title: I am having a BLAST with all the things the ...
content: I am having a BLAST with all the things the Echo Dot does. Especially its Blue Tooth capabilities with my sound system.

author: Alaina Carroll-Brazeau
title: Love Video Calling
content: We bought two of these, one for ourselves, and one for our daughter for Christmas.  It was nice receiving our first video call from them the other night.

author: Mazon11
title: ECHO Spot
content: ECHO Spot is great!  I’m buying two (2) more and giving away my Dots!

author: Julie Lavagnino
title: More awesome than I expected!
content: I knew the minute I saw one and learned some of it’s features, I HAD to have one! I’m slow to get into technology, so I’m not the type of person who HAS to try the latest gadget. I really needed a new alarm clock and the clock feature first caught my attention. I love the clock and the interchangeable faces you can chose and how you can pick one of your own photos! The alarm choices are pretty great also. No more manually setting your alarms, either...just tell Alexa when you want it set!! It’s fabulous! I also love the “skills” you can add to it—like sleep sounds and SO many other skills—-I still have more to learn about it! Mine came with a smart plug, which really is nice at turning on and off my bedroom light that is on the other side of my room. I don’t know if I am going to use it to make video calls, since it’s in my bedroom, but knowing I can one day change that is nice to know. So, I definitely recommend this, and I have absolutely no buyer’s remorse over this purchase!

author: Joe C.
title: Works great!
content: Love this Alexa...loved it so much I recommended it to my parents.  Also have an Eco Dot...they work great together.  I'm able to play music on them at the same time in different rooms.  Only negative is that I have the Spot connected to my Ring and sometimes there is a lag with it showing who is at the front door...not sure if that is an Eco issue or Ring.

author: jt
title: Excellent Echo Spot
content: All the features of the Echo with added video capability- small screen but Echo Spot has many additional applications. Can view home security camera inputs, tv clips (don’t know about longer lengths), and various clock faces, and more.

author: Amy K Sanders
title: Like Gadgets
content: I was looking for an alarm clock and decided to give the echo spot a try.  I got it during Prime Days for a good price so it worth trying it.  Since then my two daughters have added an Alexa product and we are enjoying the items, listening to music, asking Alexa questions, dropping in on each other.  I like the alarm clock feature on the spot.  I like waking up to music that I ask Alexa to play.

author: Nick Alan
title: Love this little ball
content: I love this thing. I love Alexa. And the monthly payment plan made it very affordable.

author: Ray Acker
title: Two Stars
content: does not work well drops wifi signal

author: Carolyn
title: Sweet voice
content: These ease is using it. It is very responsive. We received it as a Christmas gift. We actually had her sing us a song tonight.

author: Susan
title: love this little thing
content:
love this little thing! cute and i am hoping will have more features as it developes.

now, if we are talking software... 4/5. i am not a fan of the options for drop in. I do not like that i cannot edit which contacts i import or use. The echo imported spam numbers and other contacts that would never use.  i love the ability to use the system as a house intercom, but quickly come up with better solutions for the contacts!

author: Ricardo Branch
title: Better than gen 2 echo dot and decent for video calling.
content: I got it for my wife, as a music speaker to replace a gen2 echo dot. The added bonus of using it for video calls made it a no brainer on buying it.

author: Alexandra P
title: This echo spot is game changing. I can video ...
content: This echo spot is game changing. I can video chat with my friends who also have an echo spot just by 'calling' them. Convenient and I use Alexa for everything.

author: Toni
title: Wonderful little Gadget
content:
This has been a great addition to my morning routine.
Love the fact that it is small, compact and nice looking.  I still feel a little expensive, but really cool to have.  Handsfree activation by simply talking to "Alexa" I can ask for music to play from Amazon Prime Music, IHeartRadio and also Pandora.  Love it!

author: IBuyThings
title: Amazon quality
content: Replaced my 15 year old alarm clock. This is great

author: Scurvydog Designs
title: Love them I have 2 and am thinking about buying another...
content: Love this I bought 2 one for my night stand and one to replace the ugly old alarm clock in the living room...works great an with my echo show and 3 other echo dots I have been able to link them all together and have music playing in every room so awesome and affordable...I do wish that I could watch YouTube on there but I'm sure amazon will work that out eventually...sound is awesome

author: J. Cohen
title: The Alexa service is good but sometimes trickier to use
content: Need a lot of improvement, I would revamp the interface and allow more touchscreen interactions. The Alexa service is good but sometimes trickier to use.

author: mark philip smith
title: Well worth the money
content: I liked the fact that it could serve as a clock providing music for wake up; and allows me to see the news on the screen as well as the party I am talking to (like face time) when making a phone call; it also does everything my other Echo devices do.

author: ScoDog
title: Keep connected to WiFi
content: This is not our first one, so we do like them. However it seems to be useless if it disconnects from the internet.  Don’t rely on it  being your only alarm if it happens to lose connection to WiFi.  You would think it could still keep time, but it didn’t.  Overall we’re happy with the two we have.

author: Michelle Dibiase and
title: cool little gadget
content: still trying to figure out how to use the features... this is all new to me but I love it

author: Samantha Griffin
title: The clockface is the best
content: We have not yet used all the features like the video chat. But we love the clock face in our bedroom and have been enjoying all the features of Alexa.

author: Ladonna
title: Better than a man
content: Love her. I talk to her every day and she plays my favorite songs. And we play games and she controls the lights in my house.

author: Annie-
title: Wish I could return
content: Wish I could return.

author: Speed DeMoN 392
title: Amazing little device!!!
content: Best alarm clock ever!!! Love playing around with the skills. VERY FUN!!! Everything you need is an ALEXA away.

author: Austin
title: It is by far the best alarm clock I have ever owned
content: This is my first echo device. The Echo Spot exceeded all my expectations. It is by far the best alarm clock I have ever owned.

author: Paul Giurlanda
title: The only annoying thing was the reminders that kept appearing
content: The only annoying thing was the reminders that kept appearing.  You can remove them easily but need to know how to do it.

author: Ivan
title: they like the music selection and control the security cameras
content: I buy this item for me. But my family take over and I see them play a lot with the echo... they like the music selection and control the security cameras

author: vonxojn
title: Returning
content: I’m returning this product. I have to keep turning it off and on for it to do my commands. I’ve checked my internet connectivity and it continues to be a problem.

author: rdkmco
title: Great Alarm and Info, horrible Alexa
content: I originally gave this a 5 star rating but after a few weeks of use, and comparing to the other major devices, found Alexa to be the worst. As far as speaker goes, this is great, but that is where the greatness ends.  What I really wanted was not only a great speaker (which this is) but MOST IMPORTANTLY I wanted a reputable and consistent personal assistant.  Time and time again Alexa could not find or provide simple data.  I did side by side comparisons between SIRI, ALEXA, and Google and google won all the time. The replies were more detailed and concise. Since I really will not use this device as a home smart hub, it was paramount that I was able to obtain data on demand and all the time. Alexa came in last. Simple questions like "What is Mrs Claus First name" or "What is at the convention center today" or "who played ZUZU"  Alexa could not answer.  GOOGLE did every time.  Sorry Amazon, I  LOVE your company but Alexa really fell short for me.

author: Robert Parker
title: Amazing
content: Amazing!  A wireless intercom system for any/all room in the house with a camera to boot. Plus, smarter than the the average bear, ask Alexa ANYTHING.  Once you have two you will put one on every room.  The music feature make all other music devices obsolete (radio, phono graph, CD player, etc)

author: CEC732
title: A Great Device
content:
I am an Alexa owner. We have several at home. I bought the Echo mostly because it was on sale. My expectations were not super high. I had read a couple of lukewarm reviews. I must say I am
pleasantly surprised. The screen adds to the experience. It is sharp enough and quite bright. My daughter uses it to video chat with me and the experience is just as good as FaceTime. I recommend the device. Wait for a sale though.

author: Psorcon
title: A fun device
content: Great microphone sensitivity and understanding of requests. I am glad that I picked the Spot rather than Dot as I like the clock face and enjoy seeing lyrics. I am still early on the learning curve in use of its capabilities.

author: Chad Tennant
title: A valued part of the home
content: The Echo Spot is a great new appliance, and the hub for much of the automation we have set up in the house. Alexa has become an integral part of my day. I ask her to play music by an artist, and she fills my home with sweet tunes.

author: TerryR
title: Replaced my bedroom clock and Google Mini
content: It has replaced my clock and Google Mini on my nightstand.  Outstanding little device.  I hope an update will give a simple face and font color options for the clock.

author: Harry
title: Small But Nice
content: We use the Echo Spot in our family room so we can see and answer our Ring doorbell.  The picture is a little small, but you can zoom in and it holds the zoom setting for the next time.  I am thinking about moving the Spot to our bedroom and getting an Echo Show for the family room.  Thr Spot will make an awesome alarm clock/bedroom appliance.

author: Angie
title: This was my first Echo product and it’s awesome! I love that the lyrics to the song ...
content: This was my first Echo product and it’s awesome! I love that the lyrics to the song play across the screen! I can see what’s ahead on my calendar. It’s so handy in the kitchen when cooking and setting timers!!

author: Jeff's
title: We really love the Spot
content:
We bought two of them. One for us and for my mother in-law whos has early stages of dementia. Alexa makes it easy to call her and see her with the Spot's built in video camera and she can see us as well. we simply say "Alexa.. Call mom" and it rings her in her Echo Spot and she only needs to say "Alexa... Answer".  She can ask Alexa to wake her in time for lunch or dinner or to remind her of appointments, or just to ask what the date is today or the weather.
We added the Verizon FIOS "Skill" to Alexa and now the Spot can change the channels on her TV... since she can't remember channel the numbers or how to use the Channel Guide, she can just say "Alexa.. change the channel to ABC News".

author: Danny
title: Not working right out the box
content: I can’t get it to answer any questions. I have our echo plus and echo show that work but this won’t and not able to find out what to do. I don’t everything I found on internet and still won’t work screen does turn blue like it’s gint to answer but then won’t. It does make a sound but that’s it. Where can I get help if I can.

author: Lisa Moroni
title: Most up to date Echo Spot
content: I like that it is noise cancellation. Works with household appliances

author: Joanna NaDell
title: poor audio clarity well using to make calls.
content: Poor audio clarity.  Well talking/taking calls,  the units audio breaks up.  I wish it were easier to reach Amazon to see if the issue can be addressed/fixed.  Have tried to use it several times, along with the echo show and same  issue.

author: USERBOSCO
title: 4.0 Now.  Cool, not awesome.
content:
Follow up:  Some weird stuff going on with repeating alarms.  If we play any Amazon playlist to sleep to, which is put on "loop mode" so it will repeat all night, the daily repeating alarms simply won't work.  Tried all the recommendations from tech support, but both our devices do this.  Haven't tried to repeat this on the DOT or Echo, but I'd bet they would suffer the same outcome, since it's basically a back end software issue.  No biggie, we just need to remember to tell Alexa to set an alarm for each device each night and it works as it should.

Additionally, my bride and I listen to "natural sounds" to sleep by (i.e. rainfall).  Since we have two devices in the same room and have differing schedules, I named mine "Echo", and hers the default Alexa.  If either of us goes to bed, we say "Alexa (or Echo), play RAIN playlist", then "Loop".  When we say the same thing to the other device when the first one is playing this playlist, the device always says "playlist rain is playing on another device, do you want to stop playing it on that device and play it on this one".  You must say "YES", which is completely backwards.  Saying YES allows both devices to play the playlist simultaneously, but saying NO, stops you from playing music on the second device.  Weird, right?

Finally replaced my wife's old clock radio with this baby.  She loves it!!  I no longer have to listen to her buzzer every morning, thank God!  Pretty easy set up, as expected.  Am also pretty surprised how okay the sound is out of this little ball.  Head and shoulders over the Echo Dot...not that that's saying much.  Regardless, a really good application is a bedside table.  I'd give it a 4.5, actually, only ding is Amazon's sort of dumb setup requirements. I still don't understand why I can't see all the setup features in the Alexa.  You're forced to go back and forth from app to device to complete ANY Echo device setup.

author: Adam Dominguez
title: Feels like we’re in the same room.
content: I have two of these at the moment. I placed one in my nursery and the other in my upstairs office. They are perfect for my wife to drop in and talk to me while nursing our baby. I can get some work done and we feel as if we’re in the same room. Great product.

author: Chris L.
title: Love this! Keep it next to my bed
content: Love this!  Keep it next to my bed.  I have it play ambient noise at night to help me sleep.. and drown out my tinnitus.  I like the options on clock faces.  Works with just like my other Alexa devices for controlling smart plugs and bulbs.  Also works with my Ring Cameras!

author: Ibizarre
title: Its as awesome as the advertising says.
content: Its as awesome as the advertising says.  Just be sure you're comfortable with the Alexa app on your phone which is required to set everything up.  Once properly configured its fantastic.  Any issues will be human error from mistakes you make in the app.

author: Kathleen C.
title: It fits your needs and wants.
content: You can hear music, any music, alarm, weather, just about everything.  And she gives you an option.  Love it.

author: Brumby
title: Almost great
content: Cute little device but the software is buggy. For instance, if you go to change the clock face there are times that the optional faces are not present. There are supposed to be themes but they too go missing on occasions (more often not present than present). These are minor annoyances but given the price, you should expect it to work as advertised. I wait for that day!

author: Chris
title: Cool!
content:
Cool!
1. Had issue with the wifi connection
2. Small & compact
3. Audio is better than the echo dot but not the echo

author: RH
title: Echo Spot
content: Works just like it should.  Easy to read in the dark.

author: Don Pattee
title: Not enough functionality to be worth the price right now
content: For as awesome as the Echo and Echo Dots are, the Spot is a disappointment. There is very little control over what the screen shows, what the clock looks like, what order things show up in, etc. At this point if I hadn't thrown the box away immediately, I would have sent it back and just got another full size Echo.

author: pumpkinboss
title: Still can't pause and resume audio
content:
I can't believe that after all this time Echo STILL can't manage to resume programs you're listening to after you "pause" it. Well, it can, as long as you don't take too long. As long as you don't pause your show for more than 10-20 seconds you're good. Any longer and she won't be able to resume from where you left off. And there's no way to fast forward (even on the Show) so you'll have to listen to everything you've already heard. Please, Amazon, fix this!!!!

"Alexa Stop" results in the audio continuing to play, but highly muted, and then starts in again a few seconds later. Only pause seems to stop the audio.. but same results as above.

Alexa is connected: "Alexa..."  I'M SORRY,I'M HAVING TROUBLE CONNECTING.
Seriously? The device is connected, internet is working, and she's having trouble connecting? The other two Echos I have are having no trouble!

author: JazzDing
title: Like a hood scoop and a spoiler on a Fiat (irrelevant but silly enough to be fun)
content: A silly goo-gah to pur on your desk.  Buy two and give one to your lover to put on his/her desk too, so you can have pillow talk all day. Honestly, there's nothing you can do with this that you can't do with your phone, but it's still kinda fun.  Be careful, though:  if you enable drop in mode, you're allowing any of your contacts the ability to listen in on you.  There is a warning tone, but what if you are away or distracted when that goes off?  Personally, I think some kind of message should flash continually whenever anyone drops in.

author: Sy Morley
title: Enjoy waking up to temperature for the day
content: I wasn't sure the Spot would do more than the original.  However, it can do more and I love the clock face that I selected. Best of all, I laugh when it tells me to have a good night's sleep.

author: José Ponce
title: no user manual
content: so far the only thing that works well is the time display, having to figure out how to enlarge the font was a true challenge without a user manual it's hard to figure out what features I can take advantage of, so far to have the voice recognition to make calls from my contact list has been unsuccessful, if there's a PDF on how the device works I would appreciate receiving it

author: Moosedoc
title: Love this new addition to the Echo family
content: Love this new addition to the Echo family. Really wish it had a rechargeable battery though, it would be great if it was portable from room to room. It would be great if You Tube could be back on Amazon products- it is a key feature holding back the Spot and the Echo Show’s potential.

author: Louis B. Fowler Jr.
title: alarm
content: of all its uses, one appeals to me: hop in bed half asleep, in the dark and mumble to Alexa: wake me up to so and so song!

author: Charlotte
title: Astonishing
content: Love Alexa...Use her for timing things, a quick weather check, definitions of words, checking on packages, etc.  Each day becomes an adventure with new information at your fingertips.

author: Connor F.
title: Great sound easy to use
content: Perfect for a nightstand if you don’t have that much space or don’t want the bigger show

author: BRIAN RAHM
title: Alexa Spot with Blink Camera
content:
I got this for Christmas and set it up with very little problems. It works great with the Blink Camera system.
.

author: Chun Chao
title: Surprising Accessible Fun
content: I was recommended the Amazon Echo Spot by some friends. Being a Blind/Visually Impaired individual, I was skeptical of how useful it would be for me as opposed to the voice activated Echo speakers. Well, I was surprised to discover the accessibility feature that Amazon built into the Echo devices with a screen known as "Voice View". Even though I may not be able to see the screen, I now get to enjoy the music and sound ambiances that come with the screen saver Alexa skills.

author: AL
title: Love It
content:
I bought this for my daughter's birthday. She absolutely loves it. I can hear her asking it all sorts of questions and setting up reminders.
That will help the whole family. Yippee!

author: Lynn B
title: Not a great buy for the Ring Pro 2
content: I purchased this product to go exclusively with my Ring Pro 2 because I thought the doorbell on the Ring device would ring through this device. This doesn’t work that way. I feel slightly misled. Sadly it really doesn’t add any value to a Ring device.  This device on its own is okay.

author: Gramma
title: Love my little Spot
content: Love my little Spot! Sits nicely in the kitchen waiting to do my bidding. Hands in water doing dishes? Just call out "Alexa" to my spot and she plays my music. Need a recipe? Want the weather report, news, the time? Ask Alexa and she'll tell you. The best thing is hands-free operation. Sweet little companion.

author: Boricua75
title: The best new smart product
content: I ordered the echo spot after the reduce the price and it was worth it , this is the best smart product I have in my home, it was easy to set up, and easy to connect to the Alexa app. With the echo spot I’m able to turn off my smart lights , I’m able to check my security cameras in my house with just using Alexa commands from the comfort of my room. Don’t listen to those negative reviews, this is one of the best smart product you can have in your home, if you’re worry about the front cam, you can always buy from amazon a small webcam covers that let you cover and uncover your cam. If you are anoying about the “things to try “ message on this echo , just go to settings , click home content and turn off any messages you don’t want to see and you can turn off the rotate continuously messsges. The sound is great for your clock alarms, also it has an equalizer for you to custom the sound, for better music sound , connect a Bluetooth speaker or connect a speaker with the output in the back of the echo spot. I’m amaze of all this awesome smart products from amazon , I already have the echo diff and fire tv 4k stick, they all work great together !

author: Mwow!
title: Anyone can use it.

author: Irene warsaw
title: Have fun with Spot
content: My favorite of all the Alexa gadgets . Worth every penny

author: justGary
title: Don't wait for something better.  This is it.

author: Silverlake

We already have 4 around the house but would probably get more to put in the garage,  bathroom,  backyard,  etc.

author: Jonathan Guntert
